46.Safi Kaskas 2024: God said, “Fear not. I am with you both; I hear, and I see.

47.Safi Kaskas 2024: Go to him and tell him: ”We are messengers of your Lord, so send the Children of Israel with us, and do not punish them. We have come to you with a sign from your Lord. And peace will be upon him who follows His guidance.

48.Safi Kaskas 2024: It has been revealed to us that punishment will come upon whoever rejects the truth and turns away.”

49.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Pharaoh] said, “So who is the Lord of you two, Moses?”

50.Safi Kaskas 2024: He said, “Our Lord is He who gave each thing its form and then guided [it toward a purpose].”

51.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Pharaoh] said, “Then what about the former generations?”

52.Safi Kaskas 2024: He said, “Their knowledge is with my Lord in a record. My Lord neither errs nor forgets.”

53.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is He who has made the Earth as a cradle for you and traced pathways for you through it and sent down rain from the sky. With which We bring forth various kinds of plants

54.Safi Kaskas 2024: to eat as well as pasture for your cattle. In this, there are signs for intelligent beings.

55.Safi Kaskas 2024: From the Earth, We created you, and to it, We will return you, and from it, We will bring you forth once again.

56.Safi Kaskas 2024: We certainly showed Pharaoh all of Our signs, but he denied [them] and refused [to believe].

57.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Pharaoh] said, “Have you come to us to drive us out of our land with your magic, Moses?

58.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then we will surely bring you magic like it. So let’s set a time that neither [of us] will fail to keep in a mutually agreed-upon place.”

59.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Moses] said, “Your appointment is on the day of the festival when the people assemble at mid-morning.”

60.Safi Kaskas 2024: So Pharaoh turned away, decided on his scheme, and then returned.

61.Safi Kaskas 2024: Moses said to the magicians summoned by Pharaoh, “Beware! Do not invent lies against God, or He will afflict you with a grievous punishment. He who lies shall fail.”

62.Safi Kaskas 2024: So [the magicians] argued among themselves over their plan but kept their conversation secret.

63.Safi Kaskas 2024: They said, “these are two magicians who want to drive you out of your land with their magic and to abolish your cherished way of life.

64.Safi Kaskas 2024: So gather your resources and line up for the contest. And whoever succeeds today will prosper.”

65.Safi Kaskas 2024: They said, “Moses, either you throw, or we will be the first to throw.”

66.Safi Kaskas 2024: He said, “No, you throw.” And, behold! Their ropes and staffs seemed to him from their sorcery to move [like snakes].

67.Safi Kaskas 2024: Moses felt fear within himself

68.Safi Kaskas 2024: but, God said, “Have no fear. You will have the upper hand.

69.Safi Kaskas 2024: And throw what is in your right hand; it will swallow up what they have crafted, for what they have crafted is a magician’s trick, and the magician will not succeed in whatever he tries.”

70.Safi Kaskas 2024: [So it was, and] the magicians fell in prostration. They said, “We believe in the Lord of Aaron and Moses.”

71.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Pharaoh] said, “How dare you believe him before I permitted you? He must be your leader who has taught you magic. So I will surely cut off your hands and your feet on opposite sides, and I will crucify you on the trunks of palm trees, and you will surely know which of us is more severe in punishment and more enduring.”

72.Safi Kaskas 2024: They said, “Never will we prefer you over the clear proof that has come to us as nor [over] Him who created us. So, decree whatever you will. You can decree only for this worldly life.

73.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have believed in our Lord so that He may forgive us our sins and the magic that you forced us to perform. God is better and more enduring.”

74.Safi Kaskas 2024: Whoever comes to his Lord as an evildoer is destined for Hell, where he will neither die nor live.

75.Safi Kaskas 2024: But whoever comes to Him as a believer, having done righteous deeds, will be the highest ranks and

76.Safi Kaskas 2024: Gardens of Eden beneath which rivers flow, where they will dwell eternally. And that is the reward for one who purifies himself.

77.Safi Kaskas 2024: We revealed to Moses, “Travel by night with My worshipers and strike a dry path through the sea for them, and do not fear being overtaken [by Pharaoh] or fear [drowning].”

78.Safi Kaskas 2024: So Pharaoh pursued them with his soldiers, and they were utterly overwhelmed by the sea.

79.Safi Kaskas 2024: Pharaoh led his people astray and did not guide [them].

80.Safi Kaskas 2024: O, Children of Israel, We delivered you from your enemy, and We made a covenant with you on the right side of the mountain, and We repeatedly sent down manna and quail to you,

81.Safi Kaskas 2024: [saying], “Eat from the good things which We have provided you, but do not abuse them or I will be angry with you. And he with whom I am angry will certainly fall.”

82.Safi Kaskas 2024: Yet I am most forgiving towards those who repent, believe, do righteous deeds, and stay on the right path.”

83.Safi Kaskas 2024: [God] said, “Moses, what made you come in such haste ahead of your people?”

84.Safi Kaskas 2024: He said, “They are following closely upon my heels, and I rushed to You, my Lord so that You might be pleased.”

85.Safi Kaskas 2024: [God] said, “But We have tested your people after you [departed], and the Samaritan has led them astray.”

86.Safi Kaskas 2024: So Moses returned to his people, angry and grieved. He said, “My people, did not your Lord make you a gracious promise? Did the fulfillment [of the covenant] seem too long to you, or did you want the anger of the Lord to fall on you, so you broke your promise to me?”

87.Safi Kaskas 2024: They said, “We did not break our promise to you deliberately, but we were weighed down with the heavy burden of the people’s jewelry, so we threw them [into the fire], following what the Samaritan did.”

88.Safi Kaskas 2024: The Samaritan made them [a statue of] a calf, which made a lowing sound. So they said, ´This is your god, and Moses’ god, but he forgot.´

89.Safi Kaskas 2024: Did they not see that it did not respond to them and that it had no power to either harm or benefit them?

90.Safi Kaskas 2024: Aaron had already told them before [the return of Moses], “My people, you are only being tested by it, and your Lord is the Merciful-to-all, so follow me and obey my order.”

91.Safi Kaskas 2024: They said, “We will never cease being devoted to the calf until Moses returns to us.”

92.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Moses] said, “Aaron, what prevented you, when you saw them going astray

93.Safi Kaskas 2024: from following me? Have you then disobeyed my order?”

94.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Aaron] said, “Son of my mother, do not seize [me] by my beard or by my head. I feared that you would say, You caused division among the Children of Israel, and you did not remember my words.’ ”

95.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Moses] said, “And what is the matter with you Samaritan?”

96.Safi Kaskas 2024: He said, “I gained insight into what they did not see, so I took a handful [of dust] from the messenger’s track and threw it in. This is what my soul tempted me to do.”

97.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Moses] said, “Get out of here. All that you can ask for in this life is not to be physically harmed. But you have an appointment [in the Hereafter] you will not fail to keep. Look at your ‘god’ to which you remained devoted. We will burn it up, and we will scatter its dust into the sea.

98.Safi Kaskas 2024: [People] your true god is God; there is no god but Him. His knowledge encompasses all things.”

99.Safi Kaskas 2024: In this way, We tell you [Prophet] the news of what has happened before, and We have given you a Reminder directly from Us.

100.Safi Kaskas 2024: Whoever turns away from it will bear a heavy burden on the Day of Resurrection

101.Safi Kaskas 2024: carrying it eternally. What a terrible burden to carry on the Day of Resurrection.

102.Safi Kaskas 2024: On that Day, the Horn will be blown, and We will gather those who force others to reject Our messages, blinded [with terror].

103.Safi Kaskas 2024: and they will whisper to each other, “You have spent only ten [days].”

104.Safi Kaskas 2024: We know best what they will say when the most perceptive [among them] will say, “[In fact] you have spent only one day.”

105.Safi Kaskas 2024: And [should] they ask you [Prophet] about the mountains, say, “My Lord will blow them away into dust

106.Safi Kaskas 2024: and He will level them into empty plains;

107.Safi Kaskas 2024: where you will not see a dip or an elevation.”

108.Safi Kaskas 2024: On that day, everyone will follow the Caller from whom there is no escape. Then, all voices will be quieted before the Merciful-to-all, and only whispers will be heard.

109.Safi Kaskas 2024: On that Day, no intercession will be of value except from one to whom the Merciful-to-all has given permission and was pleased with his speech.

110.Safi Kaskas 2024: God knows what is before them and what will be after them, but they cannot contain Him with their knowledge.

111.Safi Kaskas 2024: And [on that day, all] faces will be humbled before the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of existence. And he who bears injustice will despair.

112.Safi Kaskas 2024: But he who does righteous deeds while he is a believer will fear neither injustice nor deprivation.

113.Safi Kaskas 2024: And thus We have sent down [this revelation] as a perfect Arabic Qur’an and have given warnings that perhaps they will remain mindful of Us, or that it might give them a new awareness.

114.Safi Kaskas 2024: Know then that God, the Ultimate Sovereign, the Ultimate Truth is So exalted. [Prophet] do not rush ahead with the Qur’an before its revelation to you is complete, and say, “My Lord, increase me in knowledge.”

115.Safi Kaskas 2024: And We had already made a covenant with Adam, but he forgot [it], and We found him lacking in steadfastness.

116.Safi Kaskas 2024: And [mention] when We said to the angels, “Bow down before Adam,” and they bowed, except Iblīs; he refused.

117.Safi Kaskas 2024: So We said, “O Adam, this is an enemy to you and your wife. Do not let him drive you out of the Garden and make you suffer.

118.Safi Kaskas 2024: In the Garden, you will never go hungry or go naked

119.Safi Kaskas 2024: nor will you go thirsty or suffer the heat of the sun.”

120.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then Satan whispered to him, saying, “Adam, shall I show you the tree of immortality and a kingdom that will never decay?”

121.Safi Kaskas 2024: And they both ate from it so that their nakedness became apparent to them, and they began to cover themselves with the leaves from the Garden. Adam disobeyed his Lord and was led astray.

122.Safi Kaskas 2024: But later, his Lord chose to bring him closer, accepted his repentance, and guided him.

123.Safi Kaskas 2024: [God] said, “Go down from it, all of you, as enemies to one another. But when guidance comes to you from Me, then whoever follows My guidance will neither go astray [in this world] nor suffer [in the Hereafter].

124.Safi Kaskas 2024: But whoever turns away from remembering Me, he will have a life of great hardship, and We will raise him blind on the Day of Resurrection.”

125.Safi Kaskas 2024: He will say, “My Lord, why have you raised me blind, whereas I was able to see before?”

126.Safi Kaskas 2024: [God] will say, “Just as Our Signs came to you, and you forgot them, in the same way, you too will this Day be forgotten.”

127.Safi Kaskas 2024: This is how We repay him, who transgresses and does not believe in the signs of his Lord. And the punishment of the Hereafter is more severe and more enduring.

128.Safi Kaskas 2024: Has it not become clear to them how many generations We destroyed before them, in whose ruined dwellings they now walk? There are signs in this for those with understanding.

129.Safi Kaskas 2024: And were it not for a prior word from your Lord, setting an appointed term, [their punishment] would necessarily have come immediately.

130.Safi Kaskas 2024: So [Prophet] be patient with what they say and exalt your Lord’s limitless glory and praise Him before the rising of the sun and before its setting; and exalt His limitless glory during periods of the night and the day, so that you may be content.

131.Safi Kaskas 2024: And do not gaze longingly toward what We have given some of them to enjoy, [it is merely] the splendor of worldly life by which We test them, but the provision of your Lord is better and more enduring.

132.Safi Kaskas 2024: Order your people to pray and be steadfast yourself. We are not asking you for provision; We provide for you, and the [best] end [comes through] being mindful of God.

133.Safi Kaskas 2024: And they say, “If he would only bring us a sign from his Lord?” Has not clear evidence come to them in the earlier texts?

134.Safi Kaskas 2024: And if We had destroyed them with a punishment before this, they would have said, “Our Lord, if You had only sent us a messenger, we could have followed Your signs before we were humiliated and disgraced.”

135.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, “Each is expectantly waiting, so wait with your expectations. For you will eventually know who is on the path of equity and who is rightly guided.”

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: People’s reckoning draws closer, but they turn away without paying any attention.

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: Every time a new message comes to them from their Lord, they listen to it while they play

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: with their hearts distracted. Those bent on wrongdoing conceal their private conversation, [saying], “Is he not [Muhammad] just a man like you? Do you succumb to magic with your eyes wide open?”

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: He said, “My Lord knows whatever is said throughout heaven and Earth, and He is the All-Hearing, the All-knowing.”

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: But they continue to quibble, “These [revelations] are only confused dreams,” or, “He has just invented it,” or, “He is merely a poet.” “So [they say] let him bring us a sign like those who were sent previously.”

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: We destroyed the communities before them who did not believe, so will they believe?

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those We had sent before you were only men whom We inspired. So, tell those who deny the truth: “if you do not know this, ask the people of earlier revelations.”

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: And We did not give them [the previous prophets] bodies that did not need to eat food, nor were they immortal.

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then We fulfilled Our promise to them, and We saved those We willed and destroyed those who exceeded all bounds.

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have sent down to you a Book containing all that you ought to bear in mind. Will you not reason, then?

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: And how many communities of unjust people have We destroyed, raising up other people in their place?

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: When they felt the might of Our punishment, they fled at once.

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: “Do not flee, but return to the life of luxury you enjoyed and to your homes, so that you may be questioned.”

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: They said, “Woe to us! we were truly wrongdoers.”

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: And that cry of theirs did not cease until We made them like stubble, silent and still

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: We did not create the heavens and the Earth and all that is between them in play;

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: had We wished for amusement, We could have found it within Ourselves- had We so willed.

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: Instead, We hurl the Truth after falsehood, and the Truth destroys it, and it withers away. But woe to you for all your [attempts to] define [God].

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: To Him belongs everything in the heavens and on Earth. And those near Him are never too proud to worship Him, nor do they tire [of doing so].

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: They exalt His limitless glory day and night, [and] do not grow weary.

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: Or have they taken for themselves Earthly gods who resurrect the dead?

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: Had there been in heaven or on Earth any deities other than God, they would both be ruined. But exalted be God in His limitless glory, Lord of the Throne, Who is far above anything they describe.

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: He will not be questioned about what He does, but they will be questioned.

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: Or have they taken gods besides Him? Say, “Produce your proof. This is the message for those with me and the message of those before me.” But most of them do not know the Truth, so they turn away.

25.Safi Kaskas 2024: We never sent any messenger before you [Prophet] without revealing to him that “There is no god except Me, so worship Me.”

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: Yet, some say, “The Merciful-to-all has taken a son!” May He be exalted in His glory! " No! They are only His honored worshipers.

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: They do not speak before He does, and they act only on His command.

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: He knows what is before them and what is behind them, and they cannot intercede [for anyone] except with His approval, as they are in reverent awe of Him.

29.Safi Kaskas 2024: Where any of them say, “I am a god besides Him”— that one We would repay with Hell. This is how We repay the transgressors.

30.Safi Kaskas 2024: Are the unbelievers not aware that the heavens and the Earth were one mass before We separated them and made every living thing from water ? Will they not believe?

31.Safi Kaskas 2024: And We placed within the Earth firmly set mountains, lest it should shake with them, and We made valleys, as roadways that they might be guided [through them]

32.Safi Kaskas 2024: and We made the sky a protected roof, yet still, they turn away from its signs.

33.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is He who created the night and the day and the sun and the moon, each floating in its orbit .

34.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Prophet] We did not grant immortality to any human being before you, so if you die, would they live forever?

35.Safi Kaskas 2024: Every soul is bound to taste death. We test you with evil and with good as a trial, and to Us, you will all return.

36.Safi Kaskas 2024: And when the unbelievers see you, they laugh at you, [saying], “Is this the one who keeps talking about your gods?” Yet when the Merciful-to-all is mentioned, they reject Him.

37.Safi Kaskas 2024: The human being is a creature of haste. I will show you My signs soon, so do not ask Me to show them sooner.

38.Safi Kaskas 2024: And they say, “When will this promise be fulfilled if you are telling the truth?”

39.Safi Kaskas 2024: If the unbelievers only knew the time when they would not be able to divert the Fire from their faces or their backs, and they will find no help.

40.Safi Kaskas 2024: Instead, it will come to them unexpectedly and bewilder them, and they will not be able to repel it, nor will they be reprieved.

41.Safi Kaskas 2024: Messengers before you were also mocked, but those who mocked them were overwhelmed by the very thing they mocked.

42.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, “Who can protect you by night or day from the Merciful-to-all?” Yet they turn away when their Lord is mentioned.

43.Safi Kaskas 2024: Or, do they have gods to defend them from Us? They are unable [even] to help themselves, nor can they be protected from Us?

44.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have allowed these people and their fathers to enjoy life for a long time. Do they not see how We come upon the land, eroding it from its extremities? Will they prevail then?

45.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say: “I can only warn you through Revelation,” but the deaf cannot hear the call when they are warned.

46.Safi Kaskas 2024: Yet, if but a whiff of your Lord’s punishment should touch them, they would surely say, “Woe to us! We have been unjust.”

47.Safi Kaskas 2024: And We place the scales of justice for the Day of Resurrection so that no soul will be wronged in the least for though there be [only] the weight of a mustard seed; We will bring it forth. It suffices that We will do the reckoning.

48.Safi Kaskas 2024: And We gave Moses and Aaron the Furqan [a standard by which to judge right from wrong] a light and a reminder for those who are ever mindful of God-

49.Safi Kaskas 2024: those who stand in awe of their Lord, though He is unseen, and who fear the Hour.

50.Safi Kaskas 2024: And this [Qur’an] is a blessed message that We have sent down. Will you then ignore it?

51.Safi Kaskas 2024: Before [Moses] We gave Abraham sound judgment, and We knew him well,

52.Safi Kaskas 2024: when he said to his father and his people, “What are these statues to which you are devoted?”

53.Safi Kaskas 2024: They said, “We found our fathers worshipping them.”

54.Safi Kaskas 2024: He said, “You and your fathers have gone astray.”

55.Safi Kaskas 2024: They said, “Have you come to us with the Truth, or are you playing games?”

56.Safi Kaskas 2024: He said, “[No], rather, your Lord, who created them, is the Lord of the heavens and the Earth, and I am a witness to that.

57.Safi Kaskas 2024: And, by God, I will surely plot against your idols after You have turned your backs and gone away.”

58.Safi Kaskas 2024: So he broke them into pieces, except for the largest one among them, so that they might return to it [and question].

59.Safi Kaskas 2024: They said, “Who has done this to our gods? He is unjust.”

60.Safi Kaskas 2024: Some said, “We heard a young man mention them; they call him Abraham.”

61.Safi Kaskas 2024: They said, “Then bring him before the eyes of the people so that they may be witnesses.”

62.Safi Kaskas 2024: They said, “Have you done this to our gods, Abraham?”

63.Safi Kaskas 2024: He said, “Rather, this one, the largest of them, did it, so ask them if they are able to speak.”

64.Safi Kaskas 2024: So they turned on one another, saying, “It is you who are unjust.”

65.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then, they reversed themselves, [saying], “You [Abraham] knew that these [idols] do not speak!”

66.Safi Kaskas 2024: He said, “Then do you worship what does not help or harm you at all instead of God?

67.Safi Kaskas 2024: Shame on you, and shame on what you worship instead of God. Will you not use reason then?”

68.Safi Kaskas 2024: They said, “Burn him and support your gods—if you are to act.”

69.Safi Kaskas 2024: But We said, “Fire, be coolness and peace for Abraham.”

70.Safi Kaskas 2024: And they intended to harm him, but We made them the greatest losers.

71.Safi Kaskas 2024: And We delivered him and Lot to the land which We had blessed for all people.

72.Safi Kaskas 2024: And We gave him Isaac and Jacob as an additional gift, and all [of them] We made righteous.

73.Safi Kaskas 2024: We made them leaders, guiding others by Our command. And We inspired them to do good deeds, to establish prayer, and to give the purifying alms; they were our true worshippers.

74.Safi Kaskas 2024: And to Lot, We gave sound judgment and knowledge, and We saved him from the town that was committing wicked deeds. They were evil, disobedient people.

75.Safi Kaskas 2024: And We admitted him into Our mercy. He was of the righteous.

76.Safi Kaskas 2024: Long before that, We answered Noah when he called to Us, so We responded to him and saved him and his family from the great calamity.

77.Safi Kaskas 2024: And We helped him against the people who denied Our signs. They were evil people, so We drowned them all together.

78.Safi Kaskas 2024: And David and Solomon, when they gave judgment concerning the field into which some people’s sheep had strayed [at night]. We were witness to their judgments

79.Safi Kaskas 2024: and We gave an understanding of the case to Solomon, and to each [of them] We gave sound judgment and knowledge. And We caused the mountains and the birds to join David in extolling Our limitless glory; We can do [all things].

80.Safi Kaskas 2024: And We taught him to fashion coats of armor to protect you from your [enemy in] battle. But are you grateful?

81.Safi Kaskas 2024: And to Solomon, We subjected the wind, which sped at his command toward the land that We had blessed. It is We who have knowledge of everything.

82.Safi Kaskas 2024: And among the [devils] rebellious creatures, who dove into the sea for him and did other work, but it was We who kept watching over them.

83.Safi Kaskas 2024: And [mention] Job, when he cried to his Lord, “Great harm has afflicted me, and you are the most merciful of all merciful.”

84.Safi Kaskas 2024: So We responded to him and removed the harm that afflicted him. And We restored his family to him and doubled their number as a mercy from Us and a reminder for God’s worshippers.

85.Safi Kaskas 2024: And [mention] Ishmael and Idris and Dhul-Kifl; all were steadfast.

86.Safi Kaskas 2024: And We admitted them into Our mercy, for they were truly righteous.

87.Safi Kaskas 2024: And [Jonah] Zun-nun, when he went off in anger and thought that We would not punish him. Then he called out from the deep darkness, “There is no God except You; May You be exalted in Your glory. I have been among the unjust.”

88.Safi Kaskas 2024: We responded to him and saved him from his grief. This is how We protect the believers.

89.Safi Kaskas 2024: And Zechariah, when he called to his Lord, “My Lord, do not leave me childless, for you are the best of heirs.”

90.Safi Kaskas 2024: We responded to him, gave him John, and healed his wife for him. They were always eager to do good deeds, calling out to Us in hope and fear, and they humbled themselves before Us.

91.Safi Kaskas 2024: And [mention Mary] the one who guarded her chastity. We breathed into her from Our Spirit and made her and her son a sign for all people.

92.Safi Kaskas 2024: This is your community, a single community [of believers], and I am your Lord, so worship Me.

93.Safi Kaskas 2024: And [yet], they later disagreed and became divided, [but] they are all destined to return to Us.

94.Safi Kaskas 2024: So whoever does righteous deeds while he is a believer —his effort will not be ignored, and We shall record it in his favor.

95.Safi Kaskas 2024: No community that We have destroyed can possibly return

96.Safi Kaskas 2024: until Gog and Magog are let loose, and they rush down from the heights,

97.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then, the real promise will approach, and the eyes of the unbelievers will stare [in horror, while they say], “Woe to us; we were oblivious to this; rather, we were unjust.”

98.Safi Kaskas 2024: You and what you worship other than God are the firewood of Hell. You will be coming to it.

99.Safi Kaskas 2024: Had these [false deities] been [actual] gods, they would not have come to it, but each one of them will stay there [in Hell] forever.

100.Safi Kaskas 2024: In it, they will be wailing, and they will not be able to hear.

101.Safi Kaskas 2024: As for those for whom We have decreed the best [reward]—they will be kept far removed from Hell.

102.Safi Kaskas 2024: They will not hear its sound while they abide eternally in whatever their souls desire.

103.Safi Kaskas 2024: The ultimate horror will not grieve them, and the angels will greet them, [saying], “This is your Day which you have been promised”—

104.Safi Kaskas 2024: the Day when We will roll up the heavens as one rolls up a written scroll. Just as We produced the first creation, [so], We will repeat it. This is a binding promise on Us. We will do it.

105.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have written in the Zabour [Psalms] as We did in previous Scriptures, that My righteous worshipers shall inherit the Earth.

106.Safi Kaskas 2024: Indeed there is a message in this for people who worship!

107.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have only sent you [Prophet] as a mercy to the worlds.

108.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, “It is revealed to me that your god is but one God-so, will you be submissive to Him?”

109.Safi Kaskas 2024: But, if they turn away, then say, “I have proclaimed the message equally to [all of] you. And I do not know if what you have been promised is near or far.

110.Safi Kaskas 2024: He knows what is revealed when you speak, and He knows what you conceal.

111.Safi Kaskas 2024: For all I know [this delay in God’s judgment] may be a trial for you, and you will have enjoyment for a while.”

112.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say [Prophet] “My Lord, judge [between us] in Truth. Our Lord is the Merciful-to-all, the one whose help is ever sought against that which you unbelievers speak.”

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: O Humankind, be ever mindful of your Lord. The tremor of the [final] Hour is a mighty thing.

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: On the Day you see it, every nursing mother will be distracted from the child she is nursing, and every pregnant woman will abort her pregnancy. You will think that people are drunk while they are not-but God’s punishment is severe.

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: Yet, some people still argue about God without knowledge, following every rebellious devil

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: who is destined to lead astray those who ally themselves with him and guide them toward the suffering of the blazing flame.

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: People-If you should be in doubt about the Resurrection, then [consider that] We created you from dust, then from a fertilized ovum , then a leech-like, and then a chewed morsel, differentiated and undifferentiated so We may show you [our power]. And We settle in the womb what We wish for a specified term, then We bring you forth as an infant, and then you may grow to reach maturity. And among you, some will die, and some will reach the feeblest age in which he no longer knows what he once knew. You see the Earth barren, yet when We send down rain, it shakes and swells and produces every kind of beautiful plant.

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: That is because God is the Ultimate Truth and because He alone brings the dead to life, and because He is competent over all things.

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: And [that they may know] that the Hour is coming; no doubt about it, and that God will resurrect all those in the graves.

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: Yet some people argue about God without knowledge, guidance, nor any enlightening Book,

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: turning away [from the truth] in his arrogance to lead [people] astray from the path of God. For him, there is only disgrace in the world, and We will make him taste the punishment of the burning fire on the Day of Resurrection

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: [He will be told] “This is for what you have done. God is never unfair to His servants.”

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: And among people, you would find one who worships God with shaky faith. If good befalls him, he is reassured by it; but if he is tested, he reverts to his old ways, [thereby] losing both [this] world and the next. That is a manifest loss.

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: Instead of God, he calls upon what can neither harm him nor benefit him. That is the ultimate misguidance.

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: He calls on one who is more likely to harm than to help [him]. How miserable are both the protector and the companion?

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: But God will admit those who believe and do righteous deeds to Gardens with rivers flowing through them. God does what He wills.

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: Anyone who thinks that God will not help him [the Prophet] in this world and the Hereafter, let him find a way to reach out to heaven, then try to make headway and see if his scheme will eliminate what enrages him .

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: And thus have We sent the Qur’an down as verses of clear evidence for God guides those who want to be guided.

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: As for those who believed, the Jews, the Sabeans, the Christians, the Magians, and those ascribing divinity to other than God-God will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection. God witnesses all things

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: Do you not see that everyone in the heavens and everyone on Earth and the sun, the moon, the stars, the mountains, the trees, the moving creatures, and many human beings bow down before God? But for many others, their punishment is justified, and he who is disgraced by God cannot have his honor restored by anyone. God does whatever He wills

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: These are two adversaries who have disputed over their Lord. But the unbelievers will have cut out garments of fire cut for them, and boiling water will be poured over their heads-

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: which will melt the contents of their bellies, as well as their skin-

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: and they, shall be held by iron grips.

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: Every time they try to escape [the fire) of it in their anguish, they will be returned to it, and [it will be said], “Taste the punishment of the burning fire!”

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: As for those who believe and do righteous deeds, God will admit them to Gardens with rivers flowing through them. They will be adorned with bracelets of gold and pearls, and their garments will be silk,

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: for they were [willing to be] guided [in this life] to speak the best words, and so they were guided to the path that leads to Him Who is Worthy of [all] Praise.

25.Safi Kaskas 2024: As for the unbelievers who divert [others] from the path of God, and [from] the Sacred House, which We made for all People equally-[both] those who dwell there, and those who come from abroad – We will let those who desire to profane it with wrongdoing taste a painful punishment.

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: For when We showed Abraham the site of the House, [We told him], “Do not associate anything with Me and purify My House for those who will circle it, and those who stand to pray and those who bow down and prostrate themselves.

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: "And proclaim the Pilgrimage to all people: they will come to you on foot and every kind of swift and lean mount, through distant passes;

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: so that they may receive benefits for themselves and to celebrate Godâ€™s name on appointed days. He has provided [sacrificial] animals for their purposes. So eat of them and feed the miserable and poor.

29.Safi Kaskas 2024: So let the pilgrims perform their acts of purification and fulfill their vows. And then circle the Ancient House.â€

30.Safi Kaskas 2024: All of that [has been commanded]. Whoever honors the sacred ordinances of God, it is good for him in the sight of his Lord. Livestock has been permitted to you, except what has been explicitly forbidden. So turn away from the filth of idols, and turn away from telling lies

31.Safi Kaskas 2024: inclining [only] to God, not associating [anything] with Him. And he who associates others with God- it is as though he had fallen from the sky and was snatched by the birds or the wind carried him down into a remote place.

32.Safi Kaskas 2024: Thus it is, and whoever venerates the sacred rites of Godâ€”[their acts] proceed from a pious heart.

33.Safi Kaskas 2024: You have benefits in these animals marked for sacrifice for a specified time; then, their place of sacrifice is at the Ancient House.

34.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have appointed a rite [of sacrifice] for every nation, so that they may mention the name of God over whatever [sacrificial] animals He has provided them. Your god is one God, so submit to Him. And, give good news to the humble of heart-

35.Safi Kaskas 2024: those whose hearts tremble when God is mentioned, and those who patiently persevere over what has afflicted them, and those who establish prayer and those who spend from what We have provided them.

36.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have appointed sacrificial animals for you among the rituals of God. There is much good for you in them, so mention Godâ€™s name over them when they lined up [for sacrifice], and, when they are [lifeless] on their sides, then eat from them and feed the needy and the beggar. Thus We have subjected them to you so that hopefully, you may be grateful.

37.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is neither their meat nor their blood that reaches God: what reaches Him is your piety. Thus He has made them subject to you so that you may glorify God for having guided you. And give good news to those who do their best at whatever they do.

38.Safi Kaskas 2024: God will defend believers. God does not like the treacherous and ungrateful.

39.Safi Kaskas 2024: Permission [to fight] has been given to those who were unjustly treated. God is undoubtedly capable of giving them victory.

40.Safi Kaskas 2024: [They are] those who have been driven from their homes unfairly, for only saying that â€œOur Lord is God.â€ And, if God did not intervene by using some people to drive out others, many monasteries, churches, synagogues, and mosques, where Godâ€™s name is much remembered, would have been destroyed. God is sure to help those who help His cause, for truly God is Strong, and Revered.

41.Safi Kaskas 2024: [And they are] those who, if We give them authority in the land, establish prayer, and pay the purifying alms, and order what is known to be right, and forbid what is known to be wrong. And to God belongs the outcome of [all] matters.

42.Safi Kaskas 2024: And if they deny you [Prophet], so did the people of Noah and Aad and Thamud denied [their prophets],

43.Safi Kaskas 2024: as did the people of Abraham and the people of Lot

44.Safi Kaskas 2024: and the inhabitants of Midian. And Moses was called a liar. So, I indulged the unbelievers for a time, and then I seized them, and how [terrible] was My reproach.

45.Safi Kaskas 2024: And how many a town did We destroy while it was committing a wrong, so It is [now] fallen into ruin, and [how many] an abandoned well, and [how many] a lofty palace?

46.Safi Kaskas 2024: Have they not traveled through the land so that their hearts gain wisdom and their ears learn to listen? For it is not the eyes that are blind, but the hearts within the breasts.

47.Safi Kaskas 2024: They challenge you [Prophet] to bring on their punishment [if you can]. But God will never fail to deliver His promise. A day with your Lord is like a thousand years as you count them.

48.Safi Kaskas 2024: And how many a community did I indulge while it was unjust? Then I seized it, and their [final] destination is up to Me.

49.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say [Prophet), â€œO People, I am sent only to deliver a clear warning to you.â€

50.Safi Kaskas 2024: And those who have believed and done righteous deeds - for them is forgiveness and generous rewards.

51.Safi Kaskas 2024: But those who oppose Our message, [seeking] in vain to cause it to fail-those are the companions of Hell.

52.Safi Kaskas 2024: Yet, whenever We sent a messenger or a prophet ahead of you, and he was hoping [that his warning will be headed], Satan would cast [doubt] on his hopes. But God destroys that what Satan insinuates, and God confirms His messages, for God is All-Knowing and All-Wise.

53.Safi Kaskas 2024: He makes what Satan spews forth a temptation only to those whose hearts are sick or hardened-surely the unjust are profoundly opposed to the Truth.

54.Safi Kaskas 2024: So that those who have been given knowledge may understand that it is the Truth from your Lord and believe in Him, while their hearts humbly submit to Him. God will guide the believers to a straight path

55.Safi Kaskas 2024: but the unbelievers will continue to be in doubt about it until the Hour comes suddenly on them, or punishment strikes them on the Day of desolation.

56.Safi Kaskas 2024: [All] sovereignty on that Day will belong to God; He will judge between them. So, those who believed and did righteous deeds will be in the Gardens of Delight.

57.Safi Kaskas 2024: While the unbelievers and those who reject Our signs will receive a humiliating punishment.

58.Safi Kaskas 2024: And those who emigrated for the cause of God and then were killed or died-God will surely provide for them handsomely, for God is surely the best of providers.

59.Safi Kaskas 2024: He will surely admit them into a place that well pleases them, for God is All-Knowing and Forbearing.

60.Safi Kaskas 2024: That [is so], and whoever responds [to an act of aggression] only with an equivalent force and is then wronged again, God will surely help him. God is pardoning and forgiving.

61.Safi Kaskas 2024: Thus it is, because God merges the night into day and merges the day into night and because God is All-Hearing and All-Seeing.

62.Safi Kaskas 2024: Therefore it is, because God is the Ultimate Truth, and anything they call upon other than Him is a falsehood because God is the Most High, the Most Great.

63.Safi Kaskas 2024: Do you not see that God has sent down rain from the sky, and then the Earth becomes green? God is Most-Subtle, All-Aware.

64.Safi Kaskas 2024: To Him belongs all that is in the heavens and Earth. God is the Rich Beyond Need, the Praiseworthy.

65.Safi Kaskas 2024: Do you not see that God has made everything on the Earth of service to you-including the ships that run through the sea by His command- and that He prevents heaven from falling on the Earth without His permission? God is the Compassionate, the Merciful-to-all.

66.Safi Kaskas 2024: He is the One Who gave you life and then will cause you to die, and then will bring you back to life. The human being, however, is ungrateful.

67.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have appointed acts of worship for every nation, which they [are to] observe. So, let the unbelievers not contend with you over the matter but invite them to your Lord. You are on the straight path

68.Safi Kaskas 2024: and if they argue with you, then say, â€œGod knows best what you are doing.

69.Safi Kaskas 2024: On the Day of Resurrection, God will judge between you regarding your differences.â€

70.Safi Kaskas 2024: Do you not know that God knows what is in heaven and Earth? All this is written in a Record. This is easy for God.

71.Safi Kaskas 2024: Nevertheless, they worship others besides God, something for which He has granted no authority and about which they have no knowledge. There will not be any helper for the unjust.

72.Safi Kaskas 2024: And when Our verses are recited to them as clear evidence, you will detect disapproval in the faces of the unbelievers. They all but assault those who recite Our verses. Say, â€œShall I inform you of [what is] worse than that? [It is] the Fire that God has promised the unbelievers. How miserable is their destination.â€

73.Safi Kaskas 2024: People, an example is presented, so listen to it. Those you call on besides God will never be able to create [as much as] a fly, even if they all gathered together for that purpose. And if the fly robs them of anything, they will not be able to retrieve it. How feeble are the petitioners and those they petition?

74.Safi Kaskas 2024: They do not give God His due esteem. God is Strong, and Revered.

75.Safi Kaskas 2024: God chooses messengers from among the angels and people. God is All-Hearing and All-Seeing.

76.Safi Kaskas 2024: He knows what lies before them and what is behind them, for all matters will go back to God.

77.Safi Kaskas 2024: Believers: bow, and prostrate, and worship your Lord and do good, so that you may succeed.

78.Safi Kaskas 2024: And strive for God as He deserves. He has chosen you and has not imposed hardships on you in religion- the faith of your father, Abraham. He named you Muslimsâ€ [submitters] before [in former Books] and in this [revelation], so that the Messenger may be a witness over you, and you may be witnesses over other human beings. So, establish prayer, and give the purifying alms and hold fast to God. He is your Protector. How excellent a Protector and how excellent a Helper. "

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: The Believers have prospered.

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: They are those who humble themselves in prayer,

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: who turn away from the meaningless talk,

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: pay the purifying alms,

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: and who protect their chastity

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: except with their wives or with those whom their right hands held in trust, for which they will not be blamed.

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those who desire anything beyond that are transgressors,

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: whereas those who honor their trusts and their promises

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: and who keep up their prayers,

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: those are the inheritors

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: who will inherit the Paradise of Ferdous, where they will dwell for eternity.

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: And We did certainly create man from an extract of clay.

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: and then We placed him as a fertilized ovum in a safe place

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: and then We transformed the fertilized ovum into a clinging leech, and the leech into a chewed morsel, and [from] the chewed morsel, We created bones, and We covered the bones with flesh, and then we structured him into yet another creation. Blessed is God, the best of creators.

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then, after that, you will surely die.

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then, on the Day of Resurrection, you will be resurrected.

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: And We have created above you seven heavenly dimensions, and We have never abandoned [Our] creation.

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: And We have sent down rain from the sky in a measured amount, and we settle it into the Earth, [although] We have the power to withdraw it.

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: With [water] We bring forth gardens of palm trees, and vines with abundant fruit for you, from which you may eat ,

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: and a tree growing out of Mount Sinai that produces oil and relishes for those who eat.

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: And there is a lesson for you in livestock; we give you milk to drink from their bellies, [you derive] numerous other benefits from them: you eat [their meat]

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: and ride upon them as you do on ships.

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: We sent Noah to his people, and he said, “My people, worship God alone; you have no god other than Him. Will you not then be conscious of Him?”

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: But their leaders, who were among the unbelievers from his people, said, “He is but a human being like you, trying to gain dominance over you; if God had so willed, He would have sent down angels. We have never heard of anything like this from our forefathers.

25.Safi Kaskas 2024: He is only a man possessed, so put up with him for a while, and let’s see what happens to him.”

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Noah] said, “My Lord, help me because they have accused me of lying.”

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: So We instructed him, “Build the Ark under Our watchful eyes and [according to] Our revelation. When Our command comes, and the valley overflows, take on board pairs of every species and your family, except for those among them against whom judgment has been proclaimed. And do not plead with Me on behalf of the unjust; they will all be drowned.

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: When you and those with you are settled on the Ark, then say, ‘All praise is due to God, who has delivered us from the oppressive people.’

29.Safi Kaskas 2024: And say, ‘My Lord, let me land at a blessed landing-place, as You are the best to provide.’ ”

30.Safi Kaskas 2024: There are signs in all this, and We are always putting people to the test.

31.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then, after those people, We raised up a new generation.

32.Safi Kaskas 2024: And We sent them a messenger from among them, [saying], “Worship God for you have no god before Him. Will you not, then, be aware of Him?”

33.Safi Kaskas 2024: But the leaders among his people, who denied the truth and denied the encounter with the Hereafter, and to whom We had given ease and plenty in this worldly, life said, “This is only a man like you, who eats what you eat and drinks what you drink

34.Safi Kaskas 2024: and, if you should obey a human being like yourselves, you would then fail.

35.Safi Kaskas 2024: Does he promise you that when you have died and become dust and bones that you will be brought forth [to a new life]?

36.Safi Kaskas 2024: What You have been promised is sheer nonsense.

37.Safi Kaskas 2024: Life is only our worldly life: we live and die, but we will not be resurrected.

38.Safi Kaskas 2024: He is just a man who has invented a lie about God, and We will never believe him.”

39.Safi Kaskas 2024: He said, “My Lord, help me because they call me a liar.”

40.Safi Kaskas 2024: [God] said, “After a little while, they will surely regret [what they have said].”

41.Safi Kaskas 2024: So the blast justly struck them, and We swept them away like scum. Away then with the oppressive people.

42.Safi Kaskas 2024: After them, We gave rise to new generations.

43.Safi Kaskas 2024: No community can speed up or hold back its appointed destiny.

44.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then We sent Our Messengers in succession. Whenever a messenger came to a community, he was invariably rejected, so We destroyed them one after the other until they became mere tales. Away, then, with the people who do not believe

45.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then We sent Moses and his brother Aaron with Our signs and a clear authority

46.Safi Kaskas 2024: to Pharaoh and his inner circle, but they were arrogant, proud people.

47.Safi Kaskas 2024: They said, “Should we believe two human beings like us while their people are serving us?”

48.Safi Kaskas 2024: So they called them both liars and were consequently destroyed.

49.Safi Kaskas 2024: And We gave Moses the Book so that they might be guided.

50.Safi Kaskas 2024: We gave them shelter on a peaceful meadow and a flowing spring

51.Safi Kaskas 2024: [God said], “O Messengers, eat good things and do good. I know all that you do.

52.Safi Kaskas 2024: This community of yours is one community, and I am your Lord, so be ever conscious of Me.”

53.Safi Kaskas 2024: Yet [your followers] tore their unity piece by piece, each faction rejoicing in what it has.

54.Safi Kaskas 2024: So, leave them in their confusion for a while.

55.Safi Kaskas 2024: Do they think that We provide them wealth and children

56.Safi Kaskas 2024: because We rush to give them good things? No, but they are oblivious [to what is going on].

57.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those who stand in awe of their Lord

58.Safi Kaskas 2024: who believe in the messages of their Lord

59.Safi Kaskas 2024: who do not associate anything with their Lord,

60.Safi Kaskas 2024: and who give whatever they can while their hearts tremble at the thought that they will be returning to their Lord,

61.Safi Kaskas 2024: these are the ones who vie to do good deeds, and they will be the first to attain them.

62.Safi Kaskas 2024: We do not burden any soul with more than it can bear. There is a record with Us which speaks the Truth, and they will not be treated unjustly.

63.Safi Kaskas 2024: However, the [unbelievers’] hearts are in confusion about this [message], and they even do worst deeds

64.Safi Kaskas 2024: until We bring those corrupted with opulence for punishment. Only then will they suddenly start crying [to God] for help.

65.Safi Kaskas 2024: “Do not cry out today. You will not get any help from Us.

66.Safi Kaskas 2024: For [every time] My verses were recited to you, you turned away from them

67.Safi Kaskas 2024: in arrogance, amusing yourself by talking nonsense about them far into the night."

68.Safi Kaskas 2024: Have they not thought about what We tell them, or has something come to them that did not come to their forefathers?

69.Safi Kaskas 2024: Or do they not recognize their messenger? Is that why they do not acknowledge him?

70.Safi Kaskas 2024: Or do they say, “He is crazy?” when in fact, he brought them the Truth. But most of them hate the Truth.

71.Safi Kaskas 2024: If the Truth conformed to their desires, indeed, the heavens and the Earth, and whoever is in them would have been corrupted. Instead, We have given them their Reminder, but they turn away from it.

72.Safi Kaskas 2024: Or [do they think that] you are asking them for compensation when your Lord’s reward is best? He is the Best of Providers.

73.Safi Kaskas 2024: You call them to a straight path

74.Safi Kaskas 2024: but those who do not believe in the Hereafter deviate from that path.

75.Safi Kaskas 2024: Even if We were to show them mercy and relieve them of the harm afflicting them, they would persist in their blind transgression.

76.Safi Kaskas 2024: Even when We afflicted them with suffering [as a warning], they did not humble themselves to their Lord, nor were they submissive

77.Safi Kaskas 2024: but when We open a gate of severe punishment to them, they will immediately be crushed with despair.

78.Safi Kaskas 2024: And it is He who created your hearing and vision and hearts; how seldom are you grateful.

79.Safi Kaskas 2024: And it is He who spread you over the Earth, and to Him, you will be gathered.

80.Safi Kaskas 2024: And It is He Who gives life and causes death, and to Him is the alternation of night and day. Will you not then use your reason?

81.Safi Kaskas 2024: However, they are content to say what their ancestors said.

82.Safi Kaskas 2024: They said, “When we die and become dust and bones, are we to be resurrected?

83.Safi Kaskas 2024: We and our forefathers were promised this before. These are just ancient legends.”

84.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, “To who belongs the Earth and all that is in it, if you know?”

85.Safi Kaskas 2024: They will say, “To God.” Say, “Then will you not take heed?”

86.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, “Who is Lord of the seven heavens and Lord of The Mighty Throne ?”

87.Safi Kaskas 2024: They will say, “[They belong] to God.” Say, “Then will you not be mindful?”

88.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, “In whose hand is the dominion over all things. Who protects, while none can protect against Him if you happen to know?”

89.Safi Kaskas 2024: They will say, “[All belongs] to God.” Say, “Then how can you so mislead?”

90.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have sent them the Truth, but they lie.

91.Safi Kaskas 2024: God has not taken any son, nor has there ever been any other god but Him. [Had there been], then each god would have taken aside what it created and sought to overcome the others. May God be exalted in His glory, far above what they ascribed to Him.

92.Safi Kaskas 2024: The Knower of all that is beyond human perception, as well as all that can be witnessed by humans. May He be exalted above all whom they associate with Him!

93.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, “My Lord, if You are going to show me what you have promised them

94.Safi Kaskas 2024: then, My Lord, do not place me among such unjust people.”

95.Safi Kaskas 2024: We are surely able to show you what We have promised them.

96.Safi Kaskas 2024: Repel evil with good- We are well aware of what they are saying.

97.Safi Kaskas 2024: And say, “My Lord, I seek refuge in You from the incitements of the devils

98.Safi Kaskas 2024: and I seek refuge in You, my Lord, so they may not come near me.”

99.Safi Kaskas 2024: When death comes to one of them, he says, “My Lord, send me back

100.Safi Kaskas 2024: so that I may make amends for what I left undone.” Never! It is but a word he is saying, A dimensional barrier shall stand behind such people till the Day they are resurrected.

101.Safi Kaskas 2024: So when the Horn is blown, no ties of kinship will bind them on that Day, nor will they ask about one another.

102.Safi Kaskas 2024: And those whose balance [of good deeds) is weighty, it is they who will be successful;

103.Safi Kaskas 2024: but those whose balance is light, those are the ones who have lost their souls and will remain in Hell forever.

104.Safi Kaskas 2024: The Fire will sear their faces, distorting them horribly and painfully.

105.Safi Kaskas 2024: “Were not My verses recited to you, and did you not reject them?”

106.Safi Kaskas 2024: They will say, “Our Lord, our defiance overcame us, and we were led astray.

107.Safi Kaskas 2024: Our Lord, get us out of here, and, if we go back to our evil ways, we would be unjust.”

108.Safi Kaskas 2024: He will say, “Remain despised where you are and do not speak to Me.

109.Safi Kaskas 2024: Among My worshipers, some used to say, ‘Our Lord, We have believed, so forgive us and have mercy on us, for You are the most merciful.’

110.Safi Kaskas 2024: But you were so preoccupied with mocking them that you forgot about Me while you were laughing at them.

111.Safi Kaskas 2024: I have rewarded them this Day for their patient endurance – they are successful.”

112.Safi Kaskas 2024: He said: “How many years were you on Earth?”

113.Safi Kaskas 2024: They will say, “We were there a day or part of a day; ask those who keep track of it.”

114.Safi Kaskas 2024: He would say, “You stayed but a little if only you had known.

115.Safi Kaskas 2024: Did you think, then, that We created you in vain, or that you would not be returned to Us?”

116.Safi Kaskas 2024: How sublimely exalted is God, the Ultimate Sovereign, the Ultimate Truth; there is no deity except Him, Lord of the Noble Throne of His majesty.

117.Safi Kaskas 2024: Whoever calls another deity besides God with no evidence for its existence, then his reckoning will be with his Lord. the unbelievers will never triumph.

118.Safi Kaskas 2024: And, say, “My Lord, forgive and have mercy, and You are the most merciful.”

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: [This is] a chapter which We have sent down and made it obligatory, revealing clear messages so that you might take heed.

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: The [unmarried] woman or man found guilty of adultery lash each one of them with a hundred lashes, and do not let compassion for them prevent you from obeying God’s law if you believe in God and the Last Day. And allow a group of believers to witness their punishment.

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: The adulterer shouldn’t marry except an adulteress or idolatress and let none marry her except an adulterer or an idolater. All this is forbidden to believers.

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: And as for those who accuse chaste women and then do not produce four witnesses, lash each with eighty lashes, and do not accept their testimony again, for they chose to deviate from the truth,

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: except for those who repent later and reform, for God is the Most Forgiving, the Mercy Giver.

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: As for those who accuse their wives [of adultery] and have no witnesses except themselves, let each call on God four times to witness that he is telling the truth,

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: and the fifth [testimony will be] that the curse of God is upon him should he be lying.

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: But she will not be punished if she gives four testimonies with God as her witness that he is lying,

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: and the fifth [testimony will be] that the wrath of God is upon her should he be truthful.

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: Were it not for God’s favor to you and His mercy…and because God is accepting of repentance and Wise?

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: There is a group among you who spread slander. Do not think it bad for you; instead, it is a good thing. Every one of them shall bear the sin that he has earned, and he who took the most significant part in it will have a painful punishment.

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: When you heard about it, why did the believers-men and women-not think well of one another and say, “This is an obvious lie?”

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: And why did they not produce four witnesses to it? When accusers do not produce four witnesses, then in God’s sight, it is they who are the liars.

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: Had it not been for God’s favor upon you and His mercy in this world and the Hereafter, you would have already been afflicted by terrible suffering for indulging in such talk.

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: When you received it on your tongues, and your mouths uttered things about which you did not know, you thought it a trivial matter, while in God’s sight, it was most serious.

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: And why, when you heard it, did you not say, “It does not behoove us to speak about this. May you [O God] be exalted in Your glory; this is a great slander?”

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: God warns you never to repeat this [conduct] if you are true believers.

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: God makes His messages clear to you, for God is All-knowing and All-Wise.

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those who enjoy hearing that immorality has spread among the believers will have a painful punishment both in this world and the Hereafter. God knows, and you do not.

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: [you would have suffered] were it not for God’s favor to you and His mercy, and because God is the Compassionate, the Mercy Giver.

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: Believers do not follow Satan’s footsteps, for he who follows Satan’s steps joins immorality and wrongdoing. Were it not for God’s favor to you and His mercy, not one of you would have been purified, ever, but God purifies whom He wills, for God is All-Hearing and All-Knowing.

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: Let not those among you who possess affluence and wealth swear against giving to their relatives, the disabled, and the emigrants for God’s sake, but let them pardon and forgive. Would you not like for God to forgive you? God is the Most Forgiving, the Mercy Giver.

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those who [falsely] accuse chaste women [who are] incautious but believing are cursed in this world and the Hereafter; they will have a great punishment

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: on the Day when their tongues, their hands, and their feet will bear witness against them regarding what they used to do.

25.Safi Kaskas 2024: On that Day, God will pay them in full their just due, and they will know that God is the Manifest Truth.

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: Wicked women are for wicked men, and wicked men are for wicked women. Good women are for good men, and good men are for good women. The good [men and women] are innocent of what has been said against them; they will have forgiveness and a generous provision.

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: Believers do not enter houses other than your own until you have asked permission to do so and greeted their residents. That is best for you so that you will be reminded [of each other’s rights].

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: And if you do not find anyone in, do not enter until permission has been granted, and, if It is said to you, “Go away,” then go away. This is purer for you, for God knows well what you do.

29.Safi Kaskas 2024: [However] there is no blame on you for entering houses not inhabited but serve a purpose useful to you. God knows what you reveal and what you conceal.

30.Safi Kaskas 2024: Tell believing men to lower their gaze and guard their private parts. That is purer for them. God is acquainted with what they do.

31.Safi Kaskas 2024: And tell the believing women to lower their gaze and guard their private parts and not expose their charms beyond what may be [acceptable to] display. Let them drape [a portion of] their head-coverings over their breasts, and not reveal their charms except to their husbands, their fathers, their husbands’ fathers, their sons, their husbands’ sons, their brothers, their brothers’ sons, their sisters’ sons, their womenfolk, their slaves, or those male attendants having no sexual desire, or children who are not yet aware of women’s private parts. And let them not stamp their feet to make known what they conceal of their charms. And believers-all of you turn to God in repentance, that you may succeed.

32.Safi Kaskas 2024: Marry off those among you who are unmarried and those who are righteous among your male and female slaves. If they should be poor, God will enrich them from His favor; God is All-Encompassing and All-Knowing.

33.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those who are unable to marry should keep chaste until God gives them sufficiently from His favor. If any of those whom your right hands held in trust seeks a contract, then, draw one with them if you know there is goodness within them and share with them the wealth that God has given you. And do not compel your female servants to prostitution if they desire chastity, seeking the temporary gains of worldly life. And if someone compels them, then indeed, Allah is, after their compulsion, Forgiving and Merciful, to them.

34.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have sent down to you clarifying messages and examples from those who passed on before you and a warning for those who are ever mindful of God.

35.Safi Kaskas 2024: God is the illuminator of the heavens and the Earth. His light may be likened to [the light emanating from] a niche containing a lamp that is enclosed in glass; the glass [is shining] like a brilliant star fueled from a blessed tree, an olive tree that is neither of the East nor of the West-its oil is nearly luminous even if untouched by fire. Light upon light. God guides to His enlightenment whoever wills [to be guided]. God presents such examples to people since God [alone] has full knowledge of all things.

36.Safi Kaskas 2024: In houses of worship that God has allowed to be raised, His Name will be remembered, and His limitless glory is celebrated morning and evenings

37.Safi Kaskas 2024: [by] people whom neither commerce nor business can distract them from the remembrance of God, establishing prayer, and the payment of the purifying alms. They fear a Day when hearts and eyes will be convulsed

38.Safi Kaskas 2024: hoping that God may reward them according to the best of what they did and give them more from His favor. God provides limitlessly for anyone He will.

39.Safi Kaskas 2024: But the unbelievers, their deeds are like a mirage in a desert that the thirsty mistake for water until, when he comes to it, he finds it is nothing. Instead, he finds only God there, and God will pay him his full due, for God is quick to take account.

40.Safi Kaskas 2024: Or [their deeds are] like darkness over a stormy sea covered by waves, over waves, over which are dark clouds, layer upon layer of darkness. If one holds out his hand, he can hardly see it. For him to whom God gives no enlightenment, there is no enlightenment. (24:40]

41.Safi Kaskas 2024: Do you not see that God’s limitless glory is exalted by all in the heavens and the Earth, even by the birds with wings outspread [in flight]? Each [of them] knows how to pray to and glorify [Him], and God well knows that they do.

42.Safi Kaskas 2024: To God belongs the dominion of the heavens and the Earth, and to God [all things] ultimately return.

43.Safi Kaskas 2024: Do not you see that God drives the clouds, then brings them together, and then piles them into heaps until you see the rain come pouring from them? He sends down from the sky mountains [of clouds] filled with hail, striking with it whom He wills and averting it from whom He wills. The flash of its lightening almost blinds the eyes.

44.Safi Kaskas 2024: God revolves around the night and the day. In [all], this is a lesson for those who are insightful.

45.Safi Kaskas 2024: God has created every living creature from water. Some of them creep on their bellies, some walk on two legs, and some walk on four. God creates what He wills, for God is surely able to do all things.

46.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have indeed sent down messages clarifying everything. God guides to a straight path whoever wills [to be guided].

47.Safi Kaskas 2024: Some declare, “We believed in God and the Messenger, and we obey,” but then, a group of them turn away. Such people are not true believers.

48.Safi Kaskas 2024: When they are called to God and His Messenger to judge between them, some of them turn away

49.Safi Kaskas 2024: but if they think that the right is on their side, they then come to him [the Prophet] in prompt obedience.

50.Safi Kaskas 2024: Is there a sickness in their hearts? Or are they in doubt? Or do they fear that God and His Messenger will be unjust to them? Rather, it is they who are unjust.

51.Safi Kaskas 2024: When the believers are called to God and His Messenger to judge between them, they respond, “We hear and we obey.” Those are the achievers

52.Safi Kaskas 2024: for whoever obeys God and His Messenger, and is in awe of God and is ever mindful of Him, and it is they who are successful.

53.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Others] solemnly swear by God that if you [Prophet] ordered them, they would go forth [in God’s cause]. Say, “Do not swear. [Such] obedience is [expected]. God is well aware of all you do.”

54.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, “Obey God and obey the Messenger, but if you turn away, he is responsible only for what he has been given to do, and you are responsible for what you have been given. If you obey him, you will be [rightly] guided. The Messenger’s only duty is the clear delivery of the message.”

55.Safi Kaskas 2024: God has promised those among you who have believed and done righteous deeds that He will make them successors upon the Earth just as He did those before them and that He will establish for them the faith that He has chosen for them. He will exchange the fear they have experienced with security, [for] they worship Me [alone], not associating anything with Me. But whoever denies the truth after [having understood] this, then those are disobedient.

56.Safi Kaskas 2024: Establish prayer, give the purifying alms, and obey the Messenger, so that you may receive mercy.

57.Safi Kaskas 2024: Do not even think that the unbelievers can ever escape God on Earth. Their refuge will be the Fire. What an evil destination.

58.Safi Kaskas 2024: Believers, let your slaves and those who have not [yet] reached puberty among you ask permission of you [before entering your presence] at three times of the day: before the dawn prayer, and when you take off your clothing [for rest] at noon, and after the evening prayer. [These are] three times of privacy for you. At other times, there is no blame on you or them if you move about freely, tending to each other’s needs. In this way, does God make the message clear to you? God is All-Knowing and All-Wise.

59.Safi Kaskas 2024: And when your children reach puberty, let them ask your permission to enter, just as those before them have done. In this way, God makes His messages clear to you, for God is All-Knowing and All-Wise.

60.Safi Kaskas 2024: As for older women who have no desire to marry-there is no blame upon them if they remove their outer garments without displaying their charms, but to modestly refrain [from that] is better for them, for God is All-Hearing and All-Knowing.

61.Safi Kaskas 2024: There is not any restriction on the blind, the lame, the ill, or yourselves when you eat from your [own] houses or the houses of your fathers, your mothers, your brothers, your sisters, your father’s brothers, your father’s sisters, your mother’s brothers, your mother’s sisters or [from houses] whose keys you possess, or from any of your friends’ houses. There is nothing wrong with your eating [either] together or separately, but when you enter any house, give greetings of peace upon each other, a greeting from God, blessed and good. In this way, God makes His messages clear to you so that you may understand.

62.Safi Kaskas 2024: The Believers are those who believe in God and His Messenger and who, when they meet with him about some matter of common concern, do not depart until they have asked his permission. [Prophet], those who ask your permission are the ones who [truly] believe in God and His Messenger. So, when they ask your permission to attend to their affairs, then give permission to any among them you will, and ask God to forgive them. God is the Most Forgiving, the Mercy Giver.

63.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Believers], do not call the Messenger as you call one another. God knows those of you who slip away, [from meetings with the Prophet] stealthily, so let those who dissent from the Prophet’s order beware, lest some trial befall them [in this life] or a painful punishment [in the next].

64.Safi Kaskas 2024: To God belongs everything is in the heavens and Earth. He knows what you stand for, and one day, when all return to Him, He will inform them what they have done, for God knows all things.

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: Blessed is He who sent down to His Servant the Furqan [the Standard by which we judge right from wrong), so that he may be a warner to all people.

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is He to whom the dominion over the heavens and the Earth belongs, and who has not taken a son and has no associate in His dominion, for He has created all things according to precise measures.

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: Yet some have chosen to worship gods other than Him, gods who cannot create but are themselves created, who have no power to protect themselves from harm or benefit themselves, and who have no power over death, or life, or resurrection.

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: And the unbelievers say, “This is but a lie he has devised, made possible with the help of other people.” In truth, they have committed injustice and falsehood.

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: They [also] say, “These are just legends of the ancients that he [directed to be] written down and dictated to him morning and evening.”

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, “It has been sent down by Him who knows [every] secret within the heavens and the Earth. He is the Most Forgiving, the Mercy Giver.”

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: And they also say, “What sort of messenger eats food and walks in the markets? Should not at least an angel has been sent down to him, to help him with his warning?”

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: Or, “Why hasn’t he been given a treasure?” Or, “Why does he not have a garden from which he eats?” And the unjust say, “The man you follow is simply bewitched.”

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: Look at the examples they are using to describe you, [Prophet], but they have strayed and now cannot find their way.

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: Blessed is He Who, if He wishes, can give you [Prophet] better than these; Gardens with rivers flowing through them and can grant you palaces.

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: Denying that there is an Hour [of resurrection] is their main issue. [Hence], We have prepared a blazing fire for those who deny the Hour.

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: When [Hell] sees them from a distance, they will hear its fury and roaring

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: and when they are thrown, shackled together, into a narrow place therein, they will pray for death.

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: [They will be told] “Do not pray today for one death, but pray for many deaths.”

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, “Is that [fate] better for you, or is the Garden of Eternity, which is promised to those that were ever mindful of God, better? For them, It will be a reward and a destination.

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: Where they can have whatever they wish forever. This is a binding promise from your Lord.

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: And on the Day He will gather them [the unjust] along with those they worship beside God, and [He] will say, “Was it you who misled My servants, or did they stray from the path by themselves?”

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: They will say, “May You be exalted in Your glory! It was not for us to take any protectors beside You. But You provided comforts for them and their fathers until they forgot your message and became a worthless people.”

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: [God will say] “They [whom you claimed as divine], are refuting you and what you claim. Hence, you cannot avoid [punishment] or [find] help. And whoever commits injustice among you, We will make him suffer great punishment”.

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Prophet] Every messenger we ever sent before you ate food and walked in the markets. But We have made some of you a test for others to see if you will be steadfast? For your Lord is ever insightful.

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those who do not expect that they are destined to meet Us say, “Why were not angels sent down to us, or [why] do we [not] see our Lord?” They have certainly become too proud of themselves and excessively insolent.

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: On the day they see the angels, there won’t be any good news for those who denied God, and [the angels guarding the gate to paradise] will say, “Stop, stay out.”

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: We will examine their deeds and scatter them like dust.

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: Meanwhile, those who are destined for paradise will, on that Day, be securely settled in the best resting place.

25.Safi Kaskas 2024: The Day when heaven will split open with clouds [emerging] and the angels are sent down successively in streams.

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: True sovereignty, on that Day, will belong to the Merciful-to-all. For unbelievers, it will be a day of distress;

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: on that Day, the one who was unjust to himself will bite his hands [in regret] and will say, “How I wish I had followed the way of the Messenger.

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: Woe to me! I wish I had not taken so and so as a friend.

29.Safi Kaskas 2024: He led me away from the remembrance [of God] after it had come to me. Satan has always let the human being down.”

30.Safi Kaskas 2024: The Messenger will say, “My Lord, This Qur’an was abandoned by my people.”

31.Safi Kaskas 2024: Thus We have assigned to every prophet an enemy; those who force others to reject Our messages. But your Lord is sufficient as a guide and a helper.

32.Safi Kaskas 2024: And the unbelievers say, “Why was the Qur'an not sent to him in one single revelation?” [It was revealed in stages] so that We may strengthen your heart. And We revealed it in well-organized portions.

33.Safi Kaskas 2024: And every time they come to you with an argument, We will give you the [full] Truth and the best explanation.

34.Safi Kaskas 2024: As for those who are dragged facedown to Hell, they will be in the worst place as they are the most misguided from the path.

35.Safi Kaskas 2024: And We gave Moses the Book and appointed his brother Aaron to help him.

36.Safi Kaskas 2024: We said, “Go together to the people who have rejected Our signs.” Then We obliterated them.

37.Safi Kaskas 2024: And the people of Noah-when they denied the messengers, We drowned them, and We made them a sign for people to come. And We have prepared a painful punishment for the unjust,

38.Safi Kaskas 2024: [And the people of] Aad and Thamud, the people of the Al Rass and many generations in between.

39.Safi Kaskas 2024: in each case, We, [warn them with] examples, and each We utterly destroyed.

40.Safi Kaskas 2024: They must have come upon the town that was showered with horrible rain; have they not seen it? But they do not expect resurrection.

41.Safi Kaskas 2024: And whenever they see you [Prophet], they ridicule you, [saying], “Is this the one God sent as a messenger?

42.Safi Kaskas 2024: He would almost have misled us from our gods had we not stood firmly by them.” But soon, when they see the punishment, they will know who is the most misguided.

43.Safi Kaskas 2024: Have you seen the one who has taken his whims as his god? Are you responsible for him?

44.Safi Kaskas 2024: And do you think that most of them hear or understand? They are just like cattle; indeed, they are [even] more lost.

45.Safi Kaskas 2024: Have you not considered how your Lord lengthens the shadow [when], had He so willed, He could have made it stationary? [Instead], We have made the sun its guide

46.Safi Kaskas 2024: and We draw it back toward us gradually.

47.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is He who made the night a veil for you and sleep for rest and the daytime for rising.

48.Safi Kaskas 2024: And it is He who sends forth the winds, bringing the good news of His mercy. And We send down from the sky pure water

49.Safi Kaskas 2024: so that We may bring dead land to life and provide drink for the multitude of beings, animals, and people that We have created.

50.Safi Kaskas 2024: Indeed, We have distributed it among them so that they might take heed, but most people continue in their denial of the truth.

51.Safi Kaskas 2024: And if We had willed, We could have sent a warner to every town,

52.Safi Kaskas 2024: so do not go along with the unbelievers, but strove hard against them with this [Qur’an).
