53.Safi Kaskas 2024: He is the one who has merged the two seas, one fresh and sweet, the other salty and bitter, and He placed between them an insurmountable barrier.

54.Safi Kaskas 2024: He created human beings from water and made them kin by blood and marriage. Your Lord can do all things.

55.Safi Kaskas 2024: Yet, instead of God, they worship what can neither benefit nor harm them. The unbeliever is always biased against his Lord.

56.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have sent you [Prophet] only to bring good news and deliver a warning.

57.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, “I ask you no payment for doing this- only that whoever wills may take a path to his Lord.”

58.Safi Kaskas 2024: Put your trust in the Everlasting who does not die, glorify Him, and celebrate His praise. For it is sufficient that none knows His worshipers’ transgressions as fully as does He,

59.Safi Kaskas 2024: who created the heavens and the Earth and everything in between them in six days and then established Himself above the Throne of His majesty- the Merciful-to-all! Ask about Him, then, the well informed.

60.Safi Kaskas 2024: Yet, when they are told, “Prostrate yourselves before the Merciful-to-all,” they say, “And who is the ‘Merciful-to-all’? Should we prostrate ourselves before whatever you order us [to worship]?” And they turn farther away.

61.Safi Kaskas 2024: Blessed is He who has placed constellations in the sky, radiant light, and glowing moon.

62.Safi Kaskas 2024: And It is He who has made night and day succeed each other, [revealing Himself to] for anyone who wishes to be mindful or shows gratitude.

63.Safi Kaskas 2024: The worshipers of the Merciful-to-all are those who walk upon the Earth with humility, and when the ignorant address them, reply with “peace”;

64.Safi Kaskas 2024: those who spend the night prostrating themselves and standing before their Lord;

65.Safi Kaskas 2024: and those who say “Our Lord, spare us the punishment of Hell. Its punishment is dreadful;

66.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is an evil abode and resting-place.”

67.Safi Kaskas 2024: They are those who, when they spend, are neither wasteful nor tightfisted, but maintain balanced spending habits,

68.Safi Kaskas 2024: [as well as] those who never invoke another god alongside God nor kill the soul that God has forbidden [to be killed], except in the pursuit of justice, nor commit unlawful sexual intercourse. Whoever does these things will be committing sins (and will face a penalty)

69.Safi Kaskas 2024: that will be multiplied for him on the Day of Resurrection, and he will remain in humiliation forever,

70.Safi Kaskas 2024: except those who repent, believe and do righteous work, [in that case] God will replace their evil deeds with good ones for God is the Most Forgiving, the Mercy Giver.

71.Safi Kaskas 2024: Whoever repents and acts righteously has truly returned to God in repentance.

72.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those who do not testify to falsehood, and, when they pass near ill speech, pass by with dignity;

73.Safi Kaskas 2024: and those who, when reminded of their Lord’s revelations, do not turn a deaf ear or a blind eye;

74.Safi Kaskas 2024: and those who say, “Our Lord, give us joy in our spouses and offspring, and make us a good example for those who are ever mindful of You.”

75.Safi Kaskas 2024: All of them will be awarded the highest paradise for what they patiently endured, and they will be received with greetings of peace

76.Safi Kaskas 2024: and will live there for eternity. What a wonderful home and place of rest.

77.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say [to unbelievers], “What would my Lord care for you if not for your prayers to Him?” But since you have denied the truth as lies, [punishment] will inevitably befall you.

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: Ta Seen Meem,

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: these are the verses of the Book that make everything clear.

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: Perhaps, [Prophet] you punish yourself with grief because they will not believe.

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: If We so will, We can send down from heaven a miracle that will force their necks to remain bowed in humility.

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: Whenever a new revelation comes to them from the Merciful-to-all, they turn away.

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: They have already denied the truth, but the news of what they used to ridicule will come back to [hunt] them.

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: Do not they see the Earth, and how many kinds of noble pairs of plants We have caused to grow in it?

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: There is a sign in this, but most of them will not believe.

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: Indeed your Lord is the Revered, the Mercy Giver.

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: When your Lord called on Moses, [saying], “Go to the unjust people,

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: the people of Pharaoh. Will they not be mindful of Me?”

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: He said, “My Lord, I fear that they will call me a liar,

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: and that my breast will tighten, and my tongue will be tied, so send for Aaron.

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: Besides, they have a charge against me, so I fear that they will kill me.”

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: [God] said, “No. Go both of you with Our signs; We are with you, listening.

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: Go to Pharaoh and say, “We are messengers from the Lord of the worlds ,

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: let the Children of Israel go with us.”

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Pharaoh] said, “Did we not raise you among us as a child, and did you not live among us for many years?

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Then] you committed that crime of yours; you were so ungrateful.”

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Moses] said, “At the time I did it, I was of the misguided.

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: So I fled from you because I feared you. Then my Lord gave me wisdom and made me one of the Messengers.

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: As for that favor of which you remind me, was it not because you enslaved the Children of Israel?”

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: Pharaoh said, “But what is the Lord of the worlds?”

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: He said, “The Lord of the heavens and Earth and all that is between them if you only knew.”

25.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Pharaoh] said to those around him, “Do you hear [what he said]?”

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Moses went on], “Your Lord and the Lord of your forefathers.”

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Pharaoh] said, “This messenger who has been sent to you is really mad.”

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Moses] said, “Lord of the east and the west and that between them, if you [would just use your] reason.”

29.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Pharaoh] said, “If you take a god other than me, I will surely imprison you.”

30.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Moses] said, “Even if I show you undeniable proof?”

31.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Pharaoh] said, “Bring it, then, if you are telling the truth.”

32.Safi Kaskas 2024: So [Moses] threw down his staff, and behold, it was an undeniable snake.

33.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then he drew out his hand, and behold- it was [shining] white for all to see.

34.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Pharaoh] said to the notables around him, “This is a skilled magician.

35.Safi Kaskas 2024: He wants to drive you out of your land with his magic, so what do you recommend?”

36.Safi Kaskas 2024: They said, “Let him and his brother wait for a while, and [meanwhile] send marshals to all the cities

37.Safi Kaskas 2024: to bring every skilled magician.”

38.Safi Kaskas 2024: So the magicians were assembled at the appointed time on the appointed day.

39.Safi Kaskas 2024: It was said to the People, “Have you assembled

40.Safi Kaskas 2024: so that we might follow the magicians if they win?”

41.Safi Kaskas 2024: When the magicians arrived, they said to Pharaoh, “Is there a reward for us if we win?”

42.Safi Kaskas 2024: He said, “Yes. You will be in my inner circle.”

43.Safi Kaskas 2024: Moses said to them, “Throw whatever you will throw.”

44.Safi Kaskas 2024: So they threw their ropes and their staffs, and said, “By the reverence of Pharaoh, We will surely win.”

45.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then Moses threw down his staff, and it devoured their deceptions.

46.Safi Kaskas 2024: And down fell the magicians in prostration [to God],

47.Safi Kaskas 2024: saying, “We believe in the Lord of the Worlds,

48.Safi Kaskas 2024: the Lord of Moses and Aaron.”

49.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Pharaoh] said, “How dare you believe in Him before I have given you permission? He [Moses] must be your leader who has taught you magic. But soon, you will know. I will cut off your hands and feet on opposite sides, and I will crucify all of you.”

50.Safi Kaskas 2024: They said, “We do not care! We will be returning to our Lord.

51.Safi Kaskas 2024: We hope that our Lord will forgive us our sins because we were the first believers.”

52.Safi Kaskas 2024: We later revealed to Moses, “Travel by night with My worshipers, for you will be pursued.”

53.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then Pharaoh sent his marshals to the cities,

54.Safi Kaskas 2024: [ saying], “[The Children of Israel] are a small band,

55.Safi Kaskas 2024: but they are offending us,

56.Safi Kaskas 2024: and we are a vigilant society.”

57.Safi Kaskas 2024: So We expelled them from [their] gardens and springs

58.Safi Kaskas 2024: treasures and honored estates.

59.Safi Kaskas 2024: Thus it was. [In time], We caused the Children of Israel to inherit all of this.

60.Safi Kaskas 2024: So, they [the Egyptians] pursued them at sunrise,

61.Safi Kaskas 2024: and when the two sides sighted one another, Moses’ companions’ said, “We will be overtaken!”

62.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Moses] said, “No! my Lord is with me; He will guide me.”

63.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then, We revealed to Moses, “Strike with your staff the sea.” It parted, and each part looked like a mountain.

64.Safi Kaskas 2024: We brought the pursuers right into it

65.Safi Kaskas 2024: and We saved Moses and all who were with him

66.Safi Kaskas 2024: and We drowned the others.

67.Safi Kaskas 2024: There is a sign in this, but most of them will not believe.

68.Safi Kaskas 2024: Truly your Lord is the Revered, the Mercy Giver.

69.Safi Kaskas 2024: Tell them the story of Abraham

70.Safi Kaskas 2024: when he asked his father and his people, “What do you worship?”

71.Safi Kaskas 2024: They said, “We worship idols, and we always attend to them.”

72.Safi Kaskas 2024: He asked, “Do they hear you when you call on them?

73.Safi Kaskas 2024: Or do they benefit you, or harm you?”

74.Safi Kaskas 2024: They said, “But this is what we found our fathers doing.”

75.Safi Kaskas 2024: He said, “Have you really thought about what You have been worshipping,

76.Safi Kaskas 2024: you and your forefathers?

77.Safi Kaskas 2024: They are enemies to me. [I worship none] except the Lord of the worlds,

78.Safi Kaskas 2024: Who created me. It is He Who guides me.

79.Safi Kaskas 2024: and He who feeds me and gives me drink,

80.Safi Kaskas 2024: and He who heals me when I am ill,

81.Safi Kaskas 2024: and He who will cause me to die and then bring me back to life,

82.Safi Kaskas 2024: and who, I hope, will forgive my sins on the Day of Judgment.”

83.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Abraham then said], “My Lord, grant me wisdom and allow me to join with the righteous,

84.Safi Kaskas 2024: and grant me a lasting mention as one who told the truth among later generations.

85.Safi Kaskas 2024: And make me among those who will inherit the Garden of Bliss.

86.Safi Kaskas 2024: Forgive my father, for he has been of those who were misguided,

87.Safi Kaskas 2024: and do not disgrace me on the Day they are [all] resurrected,

88.Safi Kaskas 2024: the Day when neither wealth nor children will benefit [anyone]

89.Safi Kaskas 2024: except the one who comes to God with a flawless heart.”

90.Safi Kaskas 2024: [On that day], Paradise will be brought near to those who were mindful of God

91.Safi Kaskas 2024: and Hell will be brought forth for those who were misled.

92.Safi Kaskas 2024: It will be said to them, “Where are those you used to worship

93.Safi Kaskas 2024: other than God? Can they help you or help themselves?”

94.Safi Kaskas 2024: So They will be hurled into Hell with those who misled them

95.Safi Kaskas 2024: with Iblīs’ helpers, all together.

96.Safi Kaskas 2024: While bickering with each other they will say,

97.Safi Kaskas 2024: “By God, we were obviously misguided

98.Safi Kaskas 2024: when we equated you with the Lord of the worlds.

99.Safi Kaskas 2024: No one misguided us except those who forced us to reject God’s messages.

100.Safi Kaskas 2024: So now we have no intercessors,

102.Safi Kaskas 2024: If we can only go back [to the world), we will be believers.”

103.Safi Kaskas 2024: There is a sign in this, but most of them will not believe.

104.Safi Kaskas 2024: Truly your Lord is the Revered, the Mercy Giver.

105.Safi Kaskas 2024: The people of Noah denied the Messengers

106.Safi Kaskas 2024: when their brother Noah said to them, “Will you not be mindful of God?

107.Safi Kaskas 2024: I am a trustworthy messenger to you.

108.Safi Kaskas 2024: So be mindful of God and obey me.

109.Safi Kaskas 2024: I ask no reward from you for doing this; my reward comes only from the Lord of the worlds.

110.Safi Kaskas 2024: So be mindful of God, and obey me.”

111.Safi Kaskas 2024: They said, “How can we believe you when you are followed mostly by the lowest [class of people]?”

112.Safi Kaskas 2024: He said, “What do I know about what they have been doing?

113.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is for my Lord alone to bring them to account if you [could] only understand.

114.Safi Kaskas 2024: I am not one to drive away the believers.

115.Safi Kaskas 2024: I am only a clear warner.”

116.Safi Kaskas 2024: They said, “If you do not desist, Noah, you will surely be stoned.”

117.Safi Kaskas 2024: He said, “My Lord, my people have denied me.

118.Safi Kaskas 2024: Judge between us decisively, and save me and the believers with me.”

119.Safi Kaskas 2024: So We saved him and those with him in the laden ark,

120.Safi Kaskas 2024: and then We drowned the rest.

121.Safi Kaskas 2024: There is a sign in this, but most of them will not believe.

122.Safi Kaskas 2024: Truly your Lord is the Revered, the Mercy Giver.

123.Safi Kaskas 2024: [The people of] Aad denied the Messengers

124.Safi Kaskas 2024: when their brother Hud said to them, “Will you not be mindful of God?

125.Safi Kaskas 2024: I am a trustworthy messenger to you,

126.Safi Kaskas 2024: so be mindful of God and obey me.

127.Safi Kaskas 2024: I ask no reward from you for doing this; my reward is only from the Lord of the worlds.

128.Safi Kaskas 2024: Do you build a tower on every hill just to amuse yourselves,

129.Safi Kaskas 2024: and construct for yourselves mighty castles hoping to live there eternally?

130.Safi Kaskas 2024: And when you attack, why do you attack like tyrants.

131.Safi Kaskas 2024: So be mindful of God, and obey me,

132.Safi Kaskas 2024: and be mindful of Him Who provided you with everything you know-

135.Safi Kaskas 2024: I fear for you the punishment of a terrible day.”

136.Safi Kaskas 2024: They said, “It is all the same to us whether you preach or not;

137.Safi Kaskas 2024: this is only what our forefathers used to do.

139.Safi Kaskas 2024: They denied him, so We destroyed them. There is a sign in this, but most of them will not believe.

140.Safi Kaskas 2024: Truly your Lord is the Revered, the Mercy Giver.

141.Safi Kaskas 2024: [The people of] Thamud denied the Messengers

142.Safi Kaskas 2024: when their brother Salih said to them, “Will you not be mindful of God?

143.Safi Kaskas 2024: I am a trustworthy messenger to you,

144.Safi Kaskas 2024: so be mindful of God and obey me.

145.Safi Kaskas 2024: I ask no reward from you for doing this; my reward [comes) only from the Lord of the worlds.

146.Safi Kaskas 2024: Do you think that you will be left secure in what you have here,

148.Safi Kaskas 2024: fields of crops and palm trees with softened fruit?

149.Safi Kaskas 2024: And the fine homes that you skillfully carved out of the mountains?

150.Safi Kaskas 2024: Be mindful of God and obey me,

151.Safi Kaskas 2024: and do not obey those given to excess,

152.Safi Kaskas 2024: who spread corruption on Earth and do not set things right.”

154.Safi Kaskas 2024: You are only a man like us, so bring a sign if you are telling the truth.”

155.Safi Kaskas 2024: He said, “This is a camel. She will have time to drink, and you will have a time, [each) on an appointed day.

156.Safi Kaskas 2024: Do not harm her unless you want to be seized by the punishment of a terrible day.”

157.Safi Kaskas 2024: But they hamstrung her and woke up fully regretful

158.Safi Kaskas 2024: and the punishment seized them. There is a sign in this, but most of them will not believe.

159.Safi Kaskas 2024: Truly your Lord is the Revered, the Mercy Giver.

160.Safi Kaskas 2024: The People of Lot denied the Messengers

161.Safi Kaskas 2024: When their brother Lot said to them, “Will you not be mindful of God?

162.Safi Kaskas 2024: I am a trustworthy messenger to you,

163.Safi Kaskas 2024: So be mindful of God, and obey me.

164.Safi Kaskas 2024: I ask no reward from you for doing this; my reward comes only from the Lord of the worlds.

165.Safi Kaskas 2024: Why do you get intimate with men

166.Safi Kaskas 2024: and leave the mates your Lord has created for you? You people have transgressed all bounds.”

167.Safi Kaskas 2024: They said, “If you do not stop this, Lot, you will surely be kicked out.”

169.Safi Kaskas 2024: My Lord, save my family and me from (the consequence of] what they do.”

170.Safi Kaskas 2024: So We saved him and his family, all of them

171.Safi Kaskas 2024: except for an old woman who stayed behind.

173.Safi Kaskas 2024: We poured upon them a rain of destruction. How terrible is such rain on those who had been forewarned?

174.Safi Kaskas 2024: There is a sign in this, but most of them would not believe.

175.Safi Kaskas 2024: Truly, your Lord is the Revered, the Mercy Giver.

177.Safi Kaskas 2024: When Shu‘ayb said to them, “Will you not be mindful of God?

178.Safi Kaskas 2024: I am a trustworthy messenger to you,

179.Safi Kaskas 2024: so be mindful of God and obey me.

180.Safi Kaskas 2024: I ask no reward from you for doing this; my reward comes only from the Lord of the worlds.

181.Safi Kaskas 2024: Give full measure, and do not cheat.

183.Safi Kaskas 2024: and do not mislead people into thinking that their goods are worth less than their real value, and do not spread corruption on Earth.

184.Safi Kaskas 2024: Fear Him who created you and the former generations.”

186.Safi Kaskas 2024: You are a man like us, and we think you are a liar.

187.Safi Kaskas 2024: Make a fragment of the sky fall on us if you are telling the truth.”

188.Safi Kaskas 2024: He said, “My Lord knows best what you are doing.”

189.Safi Kaskas 2024: But they did not believe him, and the punishment of the day of shadow seized them truly, the punishment of a terrible day.

190.Safi Kaskas 2024: There is a sign in this, but most of them will not believe.

191.Safi Kaskas 2024: Truly your Lord is the Revered, the Mercy Giver.

192.Safi Kaskas 2024: This [Qur’an] is the revelation sent as you received it from the Lord of the worlds,

193.Safi Kaskas 2024: and brought down by The Trustworthy Spirit

194.Safi Kaskas 2024: to your heart, that you may (Prophet] be of the warners

196.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is mentioned in the scriptures of the ancients.

197.Safi Kaskas 2024: Is it not a sign that the scholars of the Children of Israel knew it?

198.Safi Kaskas 2024: Yet even if We had revealed it to a non-Arab,

199.Safi Kaskas 2024: and he had recited it to them, they would still not believe in it.

200.Safi Kaskas 2024: This is how We make it go unheeded through the hearts of those who force others to reject Our messages;

201.Safi Kaskas 2024: they will not believe until they see the painful punishment

202.Safi Kaskas 2024: that will come upon them suddenly when they do not expect it.

203.Safi Kaskas 2024: They will say, “May we have more time?”

204.Safi Kaskas 2024: Why do they ask that we hasten Our punishment?

205.Safi Kaskas 2024: Do you see that, if We gave them years of enjoyment,

206.Safi Kaskas 2024: then inflicted the punishment as promised,

207.Safi Kaskas 2024: what good would the years of enjoyment be to them?

208.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have never destroyed a town without sending messengers to warn

209.Safi Kaskas 2024: and remind it, for We have never been unjust.

210.Safi Kaskas 2024: The devils did not bring it [this Qur’an] down.

211.Safi Kaskas 2024: They are not able, nor are they capable.

212.Safi Kaskas 2024: As they are indeed barred from hearing [what goes on around the throne of His majesty].

213.Safi Kaskas 2024: So do not invoke another deity besides God, or you will incur punishment.

215.Safi Kaskas 2024: and be humble and kind to the believers who follow you,

216.Safi Kaskas 2024: but, if they disobey you, then say, “I am not responsible for what you are doing.”

217.Safi Kaskas 2024: And rely upon the Revered, the Mercy Giver,

218.Safi Kaskas 2024: Who sees you when you arise

219.Safi Kaskas 2024: and when you move among those who prostrate themselves.

220.Safi Kaskas 2024: He is the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing.

221.Safi Kaskas 2024: Shall I inform you upon whom the devils descend?

222.Safi Kaskas 2024: They descend upon every sinful liar

223.Safi Kaskas 2024: who readily lends an ear, but most of them are liars.

224.Safi Kaskas 2024: As for the poets, [only] the perverse follow them;

225.Safi Kaskas 2024: Do you not see that they wander aimlessly in every valley

226.Safi Kaskas 2024: and say what they do not do?

227.Safi Kaskas 2024: But except those [poets) who believe, do righteous deeds, remember God often, and defend themselves after they were wronged. Those who do wrong will soon know the kind of reversal they will receive!

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: In the name of God, the Merciful-to-ll, the Mercy Giver: Ta, Seen. These are the verses of the Qur’an, a book that makes everything clear,

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: a guidance and good news to the believers

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: who establish prayer, give the purifying alms, and are sure of the Hereafter.

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: As for those who do not believe in the Hereafter, We have made their deeds seem right in their own eyes. so that they will wander blindly.

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is they who will receive the worst punishment, and, in the Hereafter, they are the most failing.

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: You have received the Qur’an from the Grace of the All-Wise and All-Knowing.

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Mention] when Moses said to his family, “I think I see a fire. I will bring you information or will bring you a burning torch that you may warm yourselves.”

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: But when he reached it, a voice called to him: “Blessed is He who is in the fire and whoever is around it. And may God be exalted in His Glory, the Lord of the Worlds .

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: Moses, It is I-God, the Revered, the Wise”

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: “Throw down your staff.” But when he saw it moving as if it were a snake, he ran away and did not turn. [God said], “Moses, do not be afraid. In My presence, the Messengers do not have anything to fear.

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: I am Forgiving and Merciful to him who does wrong, but [who then] replaces his bad deeds with good ones.

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: And put your hand in your garment; it will come out white yet unharmed-one of nine signs [you will take] to Pharaoh and his people. They have been disobedient people.”

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: But when Our enlightening signs came to them, they said, “This is evident magic.”

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: Even though they were convinced, they rejected them out of spite and pride. So consider what happened to those who spread corruption.

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: We gave knowledge to David and Solomon, and they said, “Praise God, who has favored us over many of His believing servants.”

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: And Solomon was David’s heir. He said, “People, we have been taught the language of birds, and we have been given a share of everything. This is clearly a blessing.”

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then one day, Solomon’s troops of jinn and men and birds were assembled before him, and they were [marching] in rows.

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: When they came upon the valley of the ants, one of the ants said, “Ants enter your dwellings so that you will not be crushed by Solomon and his soldiers without their knowing it.”

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: Solomon smiled, amused at what she said, and said, “My Lord, enable me to be grateful for the blessings You have given me and my parents, and that I may do righteous deeds accepted by You. And admit me by Your mercy into [the ranks of] Your righteous worshipers.”

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: [One day] he inspected the birds and said, “Why do I not see the hoopoe, or is he absent without permission?

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: I will surely punish him severely or kill him unless he brings me a convincing excuse.”

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: But the hoopoe did not stay away for long. It said, “I learned something that you do not know, and I have brought you news from Sheba.

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: I found a woman ruling them. She has been given [an abundance] of all things, and she has a magnificent throne.

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: I found that she and her people bow to the sun instead of God. Satan has made their deeds seem right to them and has turned them away from the right path, so they cannot find their way.

25.Safi Kaskas 2024: Should they not bow to God, who brings forth what is hidden within the heavens and the Earth, and who knows what you conceal and what you declare?

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: He is God. There is no god except Him, Lord of the awesome Throne.”

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Solomon] said, “We will see whether you told the truth or were a liar.

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: Take this letter of mine and deliver it to them. Then withdraw, but see what response they will have.”

29.Safi Kaskas 2024: The Queen said, “Counselors, a gracious letter has been delivered to me.

30.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is from Solomon, and it is, ‘In the name of God, the Merciful-to-all, the Mercy Giver,

31.Safi Kaskas 2024: do not allow yourself to think that you are above me, come to me in submission’ ”

32.Safi Kaskas 2024: She said, “Council, advise me on the matter before me. I will not decide on a matter unless I hear from you.”

33.Safi Kaskas 2024: They said, “We are powerful and have great military might, but the decision is yours, and we stand ready to follow your orders.”

34.Safi Kaskas 2024: She said, “When kings enter a town, they ruin it and humiliate its proudest inhabitants. This is what they do.

35.Safi Kaskas 2024: I am sending them a gift, and I will see what the messengers bring back.”

36.Safi Kaskas 2024: So when her messengers gained an audience with Solomon [and presented the gift], Solomon said, “Do you bring me wealth when what God has given me is better than what He has given you? It is people like you who will rejoice in a gift like this.

37.Safi Kaskas 2024: Go back [and tell] them that we will come to them with soldiers whom they will be unable to face, and We will expel them from their land in humiliation and disgrace.”

38.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then he said, “Council, which of you will bring me her magnificent throne before they come to me in submission?”

39.Safi Kaskas 2024: A daring one from among the jinn said, “I will bring it to you before you rise from your council. I am strong enough to do it and can be trusted.”

40.Safi Kaskas 2024: But one who had knowledge from the Book said, “I will bring it to you before your glance returns to you.” And when [Solomon] saw it placed before him, he said, “This is from the grace of my Lord to test me whether I will be grateful or ungrateful. And whoever is grateful, it is for his good. As for the ungrateful, then my Lord is rich beyond need and generous.”

41.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then he said, “Disguise her throne; We will see whether she will allow herself to be guided [to truth] or will be among those who reject guidance.”

42.Safi Kaskas 2024: So when she arrived, she was asked, “Is your throne like this?” She said, “It is as if it were the same.” [Solomon thought], “We were given knowledge before her, and we have been submissive to God,

43.Safi Kaskas 2024: while what she worshiped besides God prevented her from believing, as she is from a people who deny the truth.”

44.Safi Kaskas 2024: She was told, “Enter the courtyard.” But when she saw it, she thought it was a pool and uncovered her legs. He said, “It is a courtyard paved with smooth glass.” She said, “My Lord, I have been wrong [because of my limited knowledge], and I submit with Solomon to God, Lord of the Worlds.”

45.Safi Kaskas 2024: And We sent to Thamud their brother Salih, [saying], “Worship God,” but they were split into rival factions.

46.Safi Kaskas 2024: He said, “My people, why are you so anxious to rush towards evil instead of good? Why you do not ask God for forgiveness so that maybe you will receive mercy?”

47.Safi Kaskas 2024: They said, “We consider you to be a bad omen, you and those with you.” He said, “Your omen is with God. Rather, it is you who are being tested.”

48.Safi Kaskas 2024: And in the town, there were heads of nine clans who spread mischief in the land and did no good.

49.Safi Kaskas 2024: They said to each other, “Let’s take an oath by God that we will kill him and his family tonight. Then we will say to his protector, ‘we did not witness the destruction of his family, and we are truthful.’”

50.Safi Kaskas 2024: So they devised their plan, and We too had a plan, but they were not aware of what We were planning.

51.Safi Kaskas 2024: Look, then, at the outcome of their plan: We destroyed them and all their people.

52.Safi Kaskas 2024: Here are their houses desolate because they were unjust. There is a sign in that for people who know.

53.Safi Kaskas 2024: And We saved those who believed and were mindful of God.

54.Safi Kaskas 2024: And Lot, when he said to his people, “How dare you commit such immoral act with your eyes wide open?”

55.Safi Kaskas 2024: You lust after men instead of women? You are ignorant people.”

56.Safi Kaskas 2024: But his people’s answer was, “Expel Lot and his family from your town. They are people who keep themselves pure.”

57.Safi Kaskas 2024: So We saved him and his family, except for his wife; We determined she would be with those who stayed behind.

58.Safi Kaskas 2024: And We rained upon them a rain. Horrible was the rain for those who were forewarned.

59.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, “Praise be to God, and peace is on His worshipers whom He has chosen. Is not God better than those they associate with Him?”

60.Safi Kaskas 2024: Is He [not best] who created the heavens and the Earth? Who sent down rain from the sky for you, causing gardens full of beauty to grow; you could not have grown the trees on your own. Is there another god alongside God? [No], but there are people who take others to be equal to Him.

61.Safi Kaskas 2024: Is He [not best] who made the Earth a stable ground, and placed rivers within it, and set mountains firmly on it, and placed a barrier between the two seas? Is there a god with God? [No], but most of them do not know.

62.Safi Kaskas 2024: Is He [not best] Who responds to the desperate when he calls upon Him, and Who removes his distress and makes you successors on Earth? Is there a god with God? Little do you remember.

63.Safi Kaskas 2024: Is He [not best] Who guides you through the darkness of land and sea and who sends the winds, bringing advance news of His mercy? Is there a god with God? Exalted is God above whatever they associate with Him.

64.Safi Kaskas 2024: Is He [not best] Who begins creation and then repeats it, and Who provides for you from heaven and Earth? Is there a god with God? Say, “Show me your evidence, if you are truthful.”

65.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, “None in the heavens and Earth knows what lies beyond our senses except God, and they do not know when they will be resurrected.”

66.Safi Kaskas 2024: Rather, their knowledge cannot comprehend the Hereafter. They are in doubt about it; they are, in fact, blind to it.

67.Safi Kaskas 2024: So the unbelievers say, “When we and our fathers become dust, will we then be brought out of the graves?

68.Safi Kaskas 2024: We and our forefathers have been promised this before. This is only a legend of an ancient people.”

69.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, “Travel around the Earth and observe the fate of those who are guilty of forcing others to reject God’s messages.”

70.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Prophet,] do not grieve over them or be distressed by what they conspire.

71.Safi Kaskas 2024: They say, “When is [the fulfillment of] this promise if you are truthful?”

72.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, “Perhaps some of what you seem eager for is closer than you think.

73.Safi Kaskas 2024: Verily your Lord is bountiful to people, but most of them do not show gratitude.”

74.Safi Kaskas 2024: Certainly, your Lord knows what their hearts conceal and what they declare,

75.Safi Kaskas 2024: for there is nothing [so] hidden in heaven and Earth that it is not in a clear record.

76.Safi Kaskas 2024: This Qur’an narrates to the Children of Israel most of what they are in dispute over.

77.Safi Kaskas 2024: And It is guidance and mercy for the Believers.

78.Safi Kaskas 2024: Your Lord will judge between them by His [wise] judgment, for He is the Revered, the All-Knowing.

79.Safi Kaskas 2024: So put your trust in God; you are on the path of clear Truth.

80.Safi Kaskas 2024: You will not make the dead hear, nor will you make the deaf listen to the call when they have turned their backs and gone away

81.Safi Kaskas 2024: and you cannot guide the blind away from their error. You cannot make anyone hear you except those who believe in Our signs and submit to [Us].

82.Safi Kaskas 2024: And when the judgment comes against them, We will bring forth a beast from the Earth to tell them that, truly, people had no true faith in Our signs.

83.Safi Kaskas 2024: And [warn of] the Day when We will gather from every nation a crowd of those who deny Our messages, and they will be formed into groups,

84.Safi Kaskas 2024: until, when they arrive [at the place of Judgment], He will say, “Did you deny My messages without even trying to understand them? What were you doing?”

85.Safi Kaskas 2024: The verdict will be handed down for their wrongdoing, and they will not speak.

86.Safi Kaskas 2024: Do they not see that We made the night for them to rest and the day to see? There are signs in that for people who believe.

87.Safi Kaskas 2024: And [warn of] the Day on which the Horn will be blown, and everyone in the heavens and on Earth will be terrified except whom God wills, and all will come to Him completely humbled.

88.Safi Kaskas 2024: And you will see the mountains, thinking they are solid, going by like clouds. [It is] the work of God, who is proficient with all things; He is well aware of all you do.

89.Safi Kaskas 2024: Whoever comes [at Judgment] with a good deed will be rewarded with something better, and they will be safe from the terror of that Day.

90.Safi Kaskas 2024: And whoever comes with an evil deed, they will be cast face down into the Fire, [and will be asked] “Are you being repaid for anything except what you have done?”

91.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Say], “I have simply been ordered to worship the Lord of this town, Who made it sacred and to Whom all things belong. And I have been ordered to be one of those who submit to God

92.Safi Kaskas 2024: and recite the Qur’an.” Whoever is guided is guided only for his own good, and to whoever strays, say, “I am only one among those who give warnings.”

93.Safi Kaskas 2024: And say, “All praise is due to God. [In time] He will show you His signs, and you will recognize them. Your Lord is never unaware of what you do.”

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: Ta Seen Meem,

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: these are the verses of the Book that make everything clear.

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: We recite to you from the story of Moses and Pharaoh, setting out the Truth for people who believe.

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: Pharaoh exalted himself and divided the people into factions: oppressing a segment of them, slaughtering their sons while sparing the women. He was one of those who spread corruption.

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: But, We wanted to favor those who were oppressed in the land, and make them leaders and make them inheritors of the land

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: and to empower them and show Pharaoh, Haman, and their soldiers through them the very thing that they feared

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: So, We inspired Moses’ mother, “Nurse him for now; but when you fear for his safety, put him into the river; do not be afraid and do not grieve. We will return him to you and will make him a messenger.”

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: And Pharaoh’s people picked him up, to become later an enemy to them and a source of grief, [since] Pharaoh and Haman and their soldiers were sinners.

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: Pharaoh’s wife said, “He will be a delight for my eyes and yours. Do not kill him; He may be useful to us, or we may adopt him as a son.” They did not realize [the consequences of] what was going on.

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Later] Moses’ mother felt her heart empty. She was about to disclose the matter had We not strengthened her heart that she would be counted among the believers.

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: And she said to his sister, “Follow him,” so she watched him from a distance without being noticed.

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: And We made him reject all wet nurses, so she said, “Shall I tell you about a household that will feed him for you and be good to him?”

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: And We returned him to his mother so that she might delight her eyes with him, not grieve, and know that God’s promise is true. But most people do not know.

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: And when he attained his full strength and maturity, We gave him judgment and knowledge. And thus, We reward those who do good.

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: [One day] he entered the town unnoticed and found two men fighting, one from his people and the other from his enemy. The one from his people cried out to him for help against the enemy, so Moses struck him and killed him. [Moses] said, “This must be from Satan’s doing. He is an enemy who leads [people] astray.”

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: He said, “My Lord, I have done wrong. Please forgive me,” and He forgave him. He is the Most Forgiving, the Mercy-Giver.

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Moses] said, “My Lord, with all of Your blessings to me, I will never support those who do evil.”

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: The next morning, he entered the town, fearful and anxious, when suddenly the man who sought his help the previous day cried out to him again for his support. Moses said to him, “You are a troublemaker.”

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: As [Moses] was about to strike the one who was an enemy to both of them, [the man] said, “Moses, do you want to kill me as you killed that man yesterday? You want only to be an oppressor in the land and do not want to put things right.”

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: And a man came from the far end of the town, running. He said, “Moses, they are talking about killing you, so leave; I am giving you good advice.”

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: So [Moses] left the town, fearful and on his guard. He said, “My Lord, save me from these oppressive people.”

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: And as he made his way toward Midian, he was saying, “Perhaps my Lord will guide me in the right way.”

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: When he came to the well of Midian, he found there a crowd of people watering [their flocks], and beside them, he found two women holding back their flocks. He said, “What is going on?” They said, “We cannot water until the shepherds take their flocks away, and our father is an old man.”

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: So he watered their flocks for them. Then he went back to the shade and said, "My Lord, I am very much in need to whatever blessing You send me."

25.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then, one of the two women came walking toward him shyly and said, “My father would like to pay you for having watered [our flock] for us.” So when Moses came to him and told him his story, he said, “Don’t be afraid. You have escaped from those oppressive people.”

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: One of the women said, “Father, hire him. A strong and trustworthy man is the best that you can hire.”

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: He said, “I want to marry one of these two daughters of mine to you, on [condition] that you work for me for eight full years, but if you complete ten, it will be seen [as a favor] from you. I do not wish to make things difficult for you. You will find me to be, God willing, a fair man.”

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Moses] said, “That is a deal between us. Whichever of the two terms I complete, there should be no bad feelings toward me. May God be Witness over what we say.”

29.Safi Kaskas 2024: When Moses completed the term and was traveling with his family, he noticed a fire from the direction of the mountain. He said to his family, “Stay here; I have seen a fire. Perhaps I will bring you from there [some] information or burning wood from the fire that you may warm yourselves.”

30.Safi Kaskas 2024: But when he came to the fire, a voice called from the right side of the valley from the tree on the blessed spot, “Moses, I am God, Lord of the worlds .”

31.Safi Kaskas 2024: “Throw down your staff.” But when he saw it moving as if it were a snake, he fled in fear and would not return. “Moses [he was called again], come back and do not be afraid. You are one of those who are safe.

32.Safi Kaskas 2024: Insert your hand in your garment; it will come out white but unharmed. And hug your arms to your sides to still your fear, for those are two proofs from your Lord to Pharaoh and his inner circle. They have been disobedient people.”

33.Safi Kaskas 2024: He said, “My Lord, I killed one of them, and I fear they will kill me.

34.Safi Kaskas 2024: My brother Aaron can speak better than I, so send him with me to support me and confirm my words. I fear they will call me a liar.”

35.Safi Kaskas 2024: [God] said, “We will strengthen you through your brother, and We shall give you both power so that they cannot touch you. With our signs, you and those who follow you will be victorious.”

36.Safi Kaskas 2024: But when Moses came to them with Our clear signs, they said, “This is only false magic. We have not heard of this from our forefathers.”

37.Safi Kaskas 2024: Moses said, “My Lord knows best who has come with guidance from Him and whose end will be best in the Hereafter. Those who are unjust do not succeed.”

38.Safi Kaskas 2024: Pharaoh said, “Counselors, I have not known you to have a god other than Me. Haman, light me a fire to bake clay and then build me a tower that I may climb up to Moses’ God. I think he’s a liar.”

39.Safi Kaskas 2024: He and his soldiers behaved arrogantly in the land, as they did not know the Truth, and they thought that they would not return to Us.

40.Safi Kaskas 2024: So, We took him and his soldiers and threw them into the sea. See what became of the unjust.

41.Safi Kaskas 2024: We made them leaders calling [others] to the Fire, and on the Day of Resurrection, they will receive no help.

42.Safi Kaskas 2024: And We pursued them with a curse in this world, and, on the Day of Resurrection, they will be among the despised.

43.Safi Kaskas 2024: After We had destroyed the earlier generations, We gave Moses the Book as enlightenment to the people and as guidance and mercy so that they might be reminded.

44.Safi Kaskas 2024: You [Prophet], were not on the western side [of the mount] when We gave Our command to Moses, and you were not a witness.

45.Safi Kaskas 2024: But We produced [many] generations [after Moses], and life dragged on for them. You were not dwelling among the people of Midian, reciting Our Verses to them, but We have always sent messages to people.

46.Safi Kaskas 2024: Nor were you on the side of the mount when We called [Moses], but [you were sent] as a mercy from your Lord to warn a people to whom no messenger had come before, so that they might be reminded,

47.Safi Kaskas 2024: that if a disaster struck them for what they have done, they would not be able to say, “Our Lord, if You had only sent a messenger to us so we could have followed Your instructions and became believers.”

48.Safi Kaskas 2024: But even when the truth came to them from Us, they said, “Why Was [the Prophet] not given signs like those given to Moses?” Did they not previously deny what Moses was given? They said, “[These are just] two magicians supporting each other, and we deny each of them.”

49.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, “If you are truthful, then bring a Book from God that gives better guidance than either of them that I may follow it.”

50.Safi Kaskas 2024: But if they do not respond to you, then know that they are only following their whims and desires. And who is more lost than one who follows his own whims and desires without guidance from God? God does not guide unjust people.

51.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have continuously conveyed the Word to them that they might take heed.

52.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those to whom We gave the Book before [are bound to] believe it.

53.Safi Kaskas 2024: When it is recited to them, they say, “We believe in it. It is the Truth from our Lord. We had devoted ourselves to God even before this came to us.”

54.Safi Kaskas 2024: They will be given their reward twice for what they patiently endured, and [because] they ward off evil with good and give from what we have provided for them.

55.Safi Kaskas 2024: When they hear useless talk, they turn away from it and say, “We have our deeds, and you have your deeds. Peace be with you; we do not seek the company of the ignorant.”

56.Safi Kaskas 2024: “You [Prophet] cannot guide [to the Truth] whom you love, but God guides him who wants to be guided. And He knows best those who are guided”.

57.Safi Kaskas 2024: They say, “If we were to follow the guidance with you, we would be torn from our land.” Have we not established for them a safe sanctuary, to which are brought all kinds of fruits, as provisions from Us? But most of them do not understand.

58.Safi Kaskas 2024: How many towns have We destroyed, which lived in ease and plenty but were ungrateful? Here are their dwellings, virtually uninhabited since their time. We have inherited them.

59.Safi Kaskas 2024: Your Lord never destroys cities unless He [first] sends a messenger in their midst reciting Our verses, nor would We destroy cities unless their inhabitants were evil.

60.Safi Kaskas 2024: [People] whatever you are given is only for the [passing] enjoyment and vanity of this life, but what is with God is better and more lasting. Will you not, then, use reason?

61.Safi Kaskas 2024: Is the one who sees the fulfillment of the good promise We gave him [about the Hereafter] like the one We provided with worldly enjoyment [but] who, on the Day of Resurrection, is summoned [for punishment]?

62.Safi Kaskas 2024: On that Day, He will call them and say, “Where are My partners whom you used to claim?”

63.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those against whom the charge will be proved will say, “Our Lord, these are the people we led astray, just as we, too, were led astray. We declare our innocence to You; it was not us; they were worshipping.

64.Safi Kaskas 2024: It will be said to them, “Call those ‘partners.’ ” They will call them, but they will not respond to them, and they will see the punishment [that awaits]. If only they had followed Our guidance!

65.Safi Kaskas 2024: On that Day, He will call them and say, “How did you respond to My Messengers?”

66.Safi Kaskas 2024: All their usual arguments will be of no use to them that Day, and they will not [be able to] ask one another.

67.Safi Kaskas 2024: As for the one who has repented, believed, and done righteous deeds, he can hope that to be counted among the successful.

68.Safi Kaskas 2024: Your Lord creates whatever He wills and chooses; The choice is never theirs. May God be exalted in His Glory, and far above all, they associate with Him.

69.Safi Kaskas 2024: Your Lord knows what their hearts conceal and what they declare.

70.Safi Kaskas 2024: He is God; there is no god except Him. [All] praise belongs to Him in this world and the next. The judgment is His, and to Him, you will be returned.

71.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, “Just think, if God were to make the night continuous for you until the Day of Resurrection, what god other than God could bring you light? Will you not listen?”

72.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, “Just think, what if God should make daylight continuous for you until the Day of Resurrection, what god other than God could bring you the night in which to rest? Will you not see?”

73.Safi Kaskas 2024: But, out of His mercy, He made the night and the day for you so that you may rest, and seek from His favor, and perhaps give thanks.

74.Safi Kaskas 2024: On the Day He will call them and say, “Where are those you used to claim as My partners?”

75.Safi Kaskas 2024: We will pull out a witness from every nation and say, “Produce your evidence.” They will then know that the Truth belongs to God alone, and [the gods] they have invented have forsaken them.

76.Safi Kaskas 2024: Korah was one of Moses’ people, but he exploited them. We allowed him to have treasures, the keys to which would burden even a band of strong men. When his people told him, “Don’t gloat. God does not like it when people gloat.

77.Safi Kaskas 2024: Seek the Hereafter with what God has given you, but do not neglect your share of this world . Do good as God has done good to you. Do not seek to cause corruption in the land, for God does not like those who spread corruption.”

78.Safi Kaskas 2024: His answer was, “I was able to obtain this [wealth] because of the knowledge I have.” Did he not know that God had destroyed many generations before him, who had greater power than he and greater wealth? But the criminals will not even be asked about their transgressions.

79.Safi Kaskas 2024: So he came out, in his splendor, before his people. Those who desired this worldly life said, “How we wish to have been given like what Korah had been given; he is truly a most fortunate man.”

80.Safi Kaskas 2024: But those who had been given knowledge said, “You are wrong! God’s reward is better for him who believes and does good deeds; only those with great patience will obtain this.”

81.Safi Kaskas 2024: And We caused the Earth to swallow him and his house. There was no one to help him against God, nor could he help himself.

82.Safi Kaskas 2024: And those who had wished in the previous day to be in his place said, “As if God gives abundantly or sparingly, to whomever He wishes of His worshipers. Oh! If God had not been gracious to us, He would have caused the Earth to swallow us too. Alas, those who deny the truth will never succeed.”

83.Safi Kaskas 2024: We grant The Home in the Hereafter to those who do not desire superiority on Earth or to spread corruption, for the [best] outcome is for those who are mindful of God.

84.Safi Kaskas 2024: Whoever comes [on the Day of Judgment] with a good deed will have a better reward, and whoever comes with an evil deed will be punished only for what they have done.

85.Safi Kaskas 2024: He who ordained the Qur’an for you [Prophet] will see you back to your destination. Say, “My Lord best knows he who brought true guidance, and he who is clearly lost.”

86.Safi Kaskas 2024: You [Prophet] could not have expected that the Book would be conveyed to you, but [It is] a mercy from your Lord. So do not back up the unbelievers

87.Safi Kaskas 2024: and never let them turn you away from God’s revelations after they have been revealed to you. [Instead], invite people to your Lord. Never be one of those who associate others with God

88.Safi Kaskas 2024: and do not invoke another god besides God; there is no god except Him. All things will perish except His Face. Judgment belongs to Him, and to Him, you will be returned.

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: Alif Lam Meem,

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: do people think that they will be left to say, “We believe,” without being tested?

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have tested those who lived before them, so God will note those who prove to be truthful and will note the liars.

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: Or do those who do bad deeds think they can escape Us? [That is] bad judgment on their part.

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: As for those who look forward to meeting God, God’s appointed time is coming. He is the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing.

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: And whoever strives, strives only to benefit himself, for God is rich beyond any needs of the world.

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: As for those who believe and do good deeds, We will remove their bad deeds and will reward them according to the best of what they have done.

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have commanded the human being to honor his parents; But do not obey them if they try to make you serve anything besides Me of which you have no knowledge, for you will all return to me, and I will tell you about everything you have done.

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those who believe and do good deeds, We will admit them with the righteous [into Paradise].

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: Some people say, “We believe in God,” but when they suffer for God's sake, they equate the persecution of man with the punishment of God. But when help comes to you from God they say, “We were always with you.” Does God not know what is in everyone’s heart?

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: God will surely note the believers and will note the hypocrites.

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: The unbelievers said to the believers, “Follow our way, and We will bear your sins.” But they will not bear any of their sins. They are liars.

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: They will surely carry their burdens and other burdens along with their burdens, and they will be questioned on the Day of Resurrection about their false assertions.

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: We sent Noah to [call] his people [to God]. He remained among them a thousand years minus fifty, and the flood seized them while they were unjust.

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: But We saved him and the ark’s occupants, and We made it a sign for the worlds.

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: And [We sent] Abraham, who called on his people, “Worship God and be always mindful of Him. That is best for you if you should know.

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: You worship mere idols instead of God and formulate falsehood. Those you worship instead of God have no power to provide for you. So seek provision from God and worship Him and be grateful to Him, for to Him you shall return.”

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: If you deny [Our message], there are nations before you who have denied it. The Messenger’s only duty is the clear delivery of the message.

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: Have they not considered how God begins creation and then repeats it? That, for God, is easy.

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, “Travel throughout the Earth and observe how He brings life into being. Then God will bring the next life into being, for God has power over all things.”

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: He punishes whom He wills and has mercy on whom He wills, for to Him you will return.

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: You will never be beyond His reach on Earth or in heaven, and you have none other than God to protect you or help you.

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those who deny God’s signs and their preordained meeting with Him–have lost hope of My mercy, and they will have a painful punishment.

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: The only answer of [Abraham’s] people was “Kill him or burn him,” but God saved him from the fire. In that, there are signs for people who believe.

25.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Abraham] said, “You have chosen [to worship] idols other than God, but your bond of affection with them will be only in this worldly life. On the Day of Resurrection, you will deny and curse one another, and your refuge will be the Fire, [where] you will have no helpers.”

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: Lot believed him. He said, “I will flee to my Lord. He is the Revered, the Wise.”

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: And We gave Isaac and Jacob to Abraham and placed prophets and the Book among his descendants. We gave him his reward in this world, and he is in the Hereafter among the righteous.

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: And Lot, when he said to his people, ‘How dare you commit such an immoral deed as no one has preceded you with from among the worlds?

29.Safi Kaskas 2024: You lust after men, obstruct nature’s way, and commit [every] shameful act in your gatherings.” His people’s answer was: “Bring us God’s punishment if what you say is true.”

30.Safi Kaskas 2024: He said, “My Lord, support me against these wicked people.”

31.Safi Kaskas 2024: And when Our Messengers came to Abraham with the good news, [of Isaac’s birth], they also said, “We will destroy the people of that town. Its people have been wicked.”

32.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Abraham] said, “But Lot is there.” They said, “We know who is there better than you do. We will save him and his family, except for his wife. She is to be among those who remain behind.”

33.Safi Kaskas 2024: And when Our Messengers came to Lot, they were mistreated, and he was troubled and distressed on their account because he felt powerless to protect them. They said, “Fear not, nor grieve. We will save you and your family, except your wife; she’s among those who will remain behind.

34.Safi Kaskas 2024: We will bring down punishment from the sky on the people of this town because they have deviated from God’s orders.”

35.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have a remnant of that town as clear evidence for people who use their reason.

36.Safi Kaskas 2024: And to Midian [We sent] their brother Shu‘ayb, who told them, “My people, worship God, and look forward to the Last Day, and do not spread wickedness on the Earth.”

37.Safi Kaskas 2024: But they rejected him, so an Earthquake seized them, and the next morning they lay dead in their homes.

38.Safi Kaskas 2024: And Aad and Thamud-what happen to them is evident to you from their [ruined] dwellings. Satan made their deeds pleasing to them and diverted them from the path [of God] even though they had been able to see the truth.

39.Safi Kaskas 2024: [The same fate befell] Korah, Pharaoh, and Haman. Moses came to all of them with clear evidence, but they chose to be arrogant on Earth, and they couldn’t escape Our punishment.

40.Safi Kaskas 2024: So We seized each of them for their transgression: upon some, We sent a storm of stones, and some were seized by a blast [from the sky], and some We caused the Earth to swallow, and some We drowned. It was not God who did them an injustice; they did themselves an injustice.

41.Safi Kaskas 2024: The example of those who take protectors other than God is like that of the female spider that made itself a home, for the weakest of homes is the spider’s web. If they only knew.

42.Safi Kaskas 2024: God knows whatever they call upon other than Him, for He is the Revered, the Wise.

43.Safi Kaskas 2024: Such examples We offer to people, but only those with knowledge will grasp their meaning.

44.Safi Kaskas 2024: God created the heavens and the Earth in Truth. There is in that a sign for the believers.

45.Safi Kaskas 2024: Recite what has been revealed to you of the Book and establish prayer. Prayer restrains indecency and wrongdoing. Yet, the remembrance of God (during the prayer) is of higher value. God knows all that you do.

46.Safi Kaskas 2024: Do not argue with the People of the Book except in the kindest manner, except those among them who are unjust, and say, “We believe in what was revealed to us and in what was revealed to you. Our God and your God is one, and we are submissive to Him.”

47.Safi Kaskas 2024: Hence, We have sent down the Book to you [Prophet]. Those to whom We previously gave the Book believe in it, and so do some of these [other] people. No one rejects Our revelations except those who deny an undeniable truth.

48.Safi Kaskas 2024: You never recited any Book before We revealed this one to you, nor did you ever write one with your own hand. Otherwise, those who try to disprove the truth would have had cause for doubt.

49.Safi Kaskas 2024: Rather, the Qur’an is a clear message to the hearts of those who have been given knowledge. No one knowingly rejects Our verses except those who are unjust [to themselves].

50.Safi Kaskas 2024: But they say, “Why have no miracles been sent down to him from his Lord?” Say, “The miracles are only with God, and I am only sent to give you a clear warning”

51.Safi Kaskas 2024: Isn’t it enough for them that We inspired you to recite the Book to them? There is mercy in this and a reminder for believing people.

52.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, “God is sufficient witness between you and me. He knows what is in the heavens and Earth. Those who believe in falsehood and deny God will be the losers.”

53.Safi Kaskas 2024: They dare you to hasten judgment against them. They would already have received a punishment had its time not already been set [by God], but it will surely come to them suddenly when they least expect it.

54.Safi Kaskas 2024: They dare you to hasten their punishment, but Hell will surely encompass the unbelievers

55.Safi Kaskas 2024: on the Day when the punishment will overwhelm them from above them and from beneath their feet, and He will say, “Taste [the result of] what you have done.”

56.Safi Kaskas 2024: My worshipers who have believed My Earth is spacious, so worship only Me.

57.Safi Kaskas 2024: Every soul will taste death. Then you will be returned to Us.

58.Safi Kaskas 2024: To those who have believed and done righteous deeds, We will assign mansions in Paradise through which rivers flow, where they will remain forever, an excellent reward for those who do good work

59.Safi Kaskas 2024: who have been patient and who have put their trust in their Lord.

60.Safi Kaskas 2024: How many a creature gives no thought to their [own] sustenance, but God provides for them and you. He is the All-Hearing, the All-knowing.

61.Safi Kaskas 2024: If you asked them, “Who created the heavens and Earth and made the sun and the moon subservient [to his laws]?” They will say, “God.” Then why do they lie about it?

62.Safi Kaskas 2024: God gives plenty to anyone He wants and gives little to anyone He wants. God knows everything.

63.Safi Kaskas 2024: And if you asked them, “Who sends down rain from the sky to give life to the Earth after it was dead?” They would surely say, “God.” Say, “Praise be to God,” but most of them do not think.

64.Safi Kaskas 2024: The life of this world is only diversion and amusement, whereas the real life is in the Hereafter. If they only knew.

65.Safi Kaskas 2024: When they board a ship, they pray to God, dedicating their faith to him alone, but when He delivers them safely to shore, at once they associate others with Him.

66.Safi Kaskas 2024: So let them deny what We have given them, and let them enjoy themselves. They will soon know.

67.Safi Kaskas 2024: Do they not see that We have made [Mecca] a secure sanctuary while, all around them, people are being taken away? How is it possible that they still believe in falsehood and deny the blessings of God?

68.Safi Kaskas 2024: Who is more unjust than one who invents lies about God or denies the truth when it has come to him? Is there not [sufficient] room in Hell for the unbelievers?

69.Safi Kaskas 2024: But those who strive for Our cause, We will surely guide them in Our ways. Indeed, God is with those who do good.

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: Alif Lam Meem,

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: the Byzantines have been defeated

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: in a nearby land, but after their defeat, they will be victorious

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: within a few years. To God belongs the decision, from beginning to end. On that day [of victory], the Believers will rejoice

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: in God’s victory. He gives victory to whomever He wills; He is the Revered, the Mercy Giver.

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: This is God’s promise, and God never breaks His promise, but most people do not know.

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: They only know the outward aspect of this worldly life, but they are unaware of the Hereafter.

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: Have they not considered in their minds that God created the heavens and the Earth and everything between them in Truth and for an appointed time? Yet many people deny that they will meet their Lord.

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: Have they not traveled through the land and seen the final fate of those before them? They had greater strength than they have, they cultivated the land and built it up more than these have, and their messengers came to them with clear evidence. God would never have wronged them, but they did themselves wrong.

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: The final fate of those who did evil was the worst, then, because they denied and ridiculed the signs of God.

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: God brings creation into being; then, He reproduces it; then, you will be returned to Him.

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: On the day the Hour comes, those who force others to reject God’s messages will be in despair.

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: None of the partners they ascribed to God will intercede for them so that they will deny their partners

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: On the Day the Hour comes, on that Day, they will be sorted out.

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those who believed and did good deeds will be jubilant in a [lovely] meadow.

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: While those who denied the truth and denied Our signs and the meeting of the Hereafter, they will be delivered into everlasting punishment.

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: So, celebrate God’s glory in the evening and the morning

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: for to Him alone is praise due throughout the heavens and the Earth, at night and noon.

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: He brings forth the living from the dead and brings forth the dead from the living. He brings life to the Earth after it was dead. And you will be brought forth in the same way.

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: Among His signs is that He created you from dust, and you became human beings, spread far and wide.

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: And among His signs is that He created spouses for you from among yourselves, so that you may find peace with them, and He has placed affection and mercy between you. In this, there are signs for people who think.

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: And among His signs are the creation of the heavens and the Earth, and the diversity of your languages and your colors. These are signs for those who know.

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: And among His signs is your [ability to] sleep by night and day and to seek His bounties. These are signs for people who listen.

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: And among His signs is [that] He shows you the lightning, [causing] fear and hope, and He sends down rain from the sky to revive the Earth to live after it had been dead. These are signs for people who understand.

25.Safi Kaskas 2024: And among His signs is that heaven and Earth are sustained by His command. Then when He calls you forth from the Earth, you will emerge immediately.

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: To Him belongs whoever is in the heavens and Earth; all are submissive to Him.

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is He who brings forth creation, then He reproduces it, and that is easy for Him, for He is above all comparisons in the heavens and Earth. He is the Revered, The Wise.

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: God gives you an example based on your lives: Do you make those whom your right hands held in trust your full partners with the wealth We have provided you so that all of you own it equally? And do you fear [to use it without consulting] them, just as you might fear your equals? [No.] This is how We explain the verses for people who can understand

29.Safi Kaskas 2024: but those who persist in being evildoers follow their [own] whims and desires without knowledge. Who can guide those whom God allows to stray? They will have no helpers.

30.Safi Kaskas 2024: So stand firm in your devotion to the faith, inclining to truth, [according to] the innate nature God has instilled in [all] people. There is no changing God’s creation. This is the correct religion, but most people do not know it,

31.Safi Kaskas 2024: turning to Him, being ever mindful of Him, establishing prayer, and never be from those who associate others with God,

32.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Or] of those who have split up their faith and divided into sects, every faction rejoicing in what it has.

33.Safi Kaskas 2024: When harm touches people, they call on their Lord, turning to Him for help. Then right after He gives them a taste of His mercy, some of them associate others with their Lord

34.Safi Kaskas 2024: [as if] to show their ingratitude for all that We have granted them. Enjoy your [brief] life, then, for you will soon know.

35.Safi Kaskas 2024: Have We sent down to them an authority that sanctions the partners they were associating with Him?

36.Safi Kaskas 2024: When We give people a taste of mercy, they rejoice, but if something bad happens to them because of their misdeeds, they immediately lose all hope.

37.Safi Kaskas 2024: Do they not see that God gives abundantly or sparingly to whomever He pleases? In that, truly, there are signs for those who believe.

38.Safi Kaskas 2024: So give relatives their due, as well as the disabled and the traveler. That is best for those who seek the pleasure of God; It is they who will prosper.

39.Safi Kaskas 2024: And [remember]: what you lend in usury aiming to increase it from people’s wealth will not increase in God’s sight, but what you give in purifying alms, seeking God’s approval, will multiply its rewards.

40.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is God who created you, then provided for you, who will cause you to die and then will give you life again. Can any of your “partners” do any of those things? May He be exalted in His glory and high above anything they associate with Him.

41.Safi Kaskas 2024: Corruption has appeared throughout the land and sea as a result of people’s actions, so He will make them taste [the consequences of] some of their actions so that perhaps they will return [to righteousness].

42.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, “Travel through the land and observe the final fate of those who came before; most of them were idolaters.

43.Safi Kaskas 2024: So stand firm in your devotion to the upright religion before a Day comes from God that no one can stop. On that Day, they will be broken.

44.Safi Kaskas 2024: Whoever denies the truth, his denial is against him; And whoever does good deeds, they are preparing the way for themselves

45.Safi Kaskas 2024: so that He may reward, out of His bounty, those who have believed and done good deeds. He truly does not like the unbelievers.

46.Safi Kaskas 2024: And of His signs is that He sends the winds bearing good news, to give you a taste of His mercy, and set ships to sail at His command, to enable you to seek His favor and, perhaps, be thankful.

47.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have already sent messengers to the people who came before you, and they came to them with clear evidence. Then, We imposed retribution on those who severed relations with Us, for We have taken it upon Ourselves to help the believers.

48.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is God who sends the winds to raise the clouds. Then, He spreads them about the sky however He wills, and He makes them break up, so you see the rainfall through them; and when He causes rain to fall on whomever of His worshipers He wills, they rejoice

49.Safi Kaskas 2024: even though, before it was sent down upon them they were in despair.

50.Safi Kaskas 2024: So observe the effects of God’s mercy, how He gives life to the Earth after it had been dead. He is the One who brings the dead to life; He has power over all things.

51.Safi Kaskas 2024: But if We should [then] send a [bad] wind and they see [their crops turn] yellow, they would continue to deny the truth.

52.Safi Kaskas 2024: Truly, you cannot make the dead hear, nor can you make the deaf hear the call when they turn their backs and go away

53.Safi Kaskas 2024: and you cannot guide the blind [of heart] away from their misguidance. You can make none hear you except those who believe in Our messages and thus submit themselves to us.

54.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is God who creates you weak, then gives you strength, then after [a period of] strength, he ordains weakness and white hair. He creates what He wills. He is the All-knowing, the All-Powerful.

55.Safi Kaskas 2024: On the Day the Hour comes, those who forced others to reject God’s messages will swear they had idled [on Earth] for only an hour, for they had always deluded themselves.

56.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those who were given knowledge and faith will say, “You idled according to God’s decree until the Day of Resurrection, and this is the Day of Resurrection, but you were determined not to know it.”

57.Safi Kaskas 2024: On that day, the excuses of those who wronged [themselves] will not benefit them, nor will they be allowed to make amends.

58.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have certainly presented to humanity all kinds of parables in this Qur’an. Yet, if you [Prophet] should bring them a sign, the unbelievers will say, “You are all full of falsehood.”

59.Safi Kaskas 2024: This is how God seals the hearts of those who do not know.

60.Safi Kaskas 2024: Be patient. God’s promise is Truth, and do not let those who lack certainty dishearten you.

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: Alif Lam Meem,

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: these are verses of the wise Book,

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: guidance and mercy for those who do good

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: who establish prayer and give the purifying alms, and who are sure of the Hereafter.

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: They are rightly guided by their Lord, and they are successful.

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: Some people prefer idle talk [over God’s message] in order to lead those without knowledge away from God’s path and to ridicule it. They will have a humiliating punishment.

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: And when our verses are recited to him, he turns away arrogantly, as if he had not heard, as if there was deafness in his ears, so give him news of a painful punishment.

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those who believe and do good deeds will have Gardens of Delight

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: where they will remain forever. This is the true promise of God, for He is the Revered, the Wise.

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: He created the heavens without visible support and firmly set mountains on Earth, in case it should move under you, and spread every kind of creature over it. And from the sky, We sent down rain and caused every noble pair of plants to grow therein.

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: This is God’s creation. Show me, then, what your other gods have created. Indeed, the unjust are lost.

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: We gave Luqman wisdom, "Be grateful to God. Whoever is grateful does so only for his good, [whereas] whoever is ungrateful [should know that] God is rich beyond need and praiseworthy.

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: Luqman said to his son while instructing him, "O my son, do not attribute any partners to God. Associating others with him is a great transgression."

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: And We have commanded the human being to care for his parents. His mother carried him in weakness upon weakness, and his weaning is in two years. Be grateful to Me and your parents; all will return to Me

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: but if they strive to make you associate with Me something of which you have no knowledge, do not obey them. Do, however, [continue to] keep them company in [this] world according to what is right, but follow the way of those who turn towards Me. Then you will all return to me, and I will make you understand all that you have done

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: “My son, if something weighs as little as a mustard seed and should be within a rock or [anywhere] in the heavens or the Earth, God will bring it forth. God is Most-Subtle, All-Aware.

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: My son, establish prayer, order what is obviously right, forbid what is obviously wrong, and be patient [in the face of] all that happens to you. Surely, these acts require courage.

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: And do not turn your cheek [in contempt] away from people, and do not walk in arrogance, for God does not like any vain and boastful person.

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: And walk modestly, and lower your voice; the most disagreeable sound is the braying of donkeys."

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: Do you not see that God has made everything in heaven and on Earth subservient to you and has abundantly showered you with His favors, [both] seen and unseen? Yet, some people argue about God in ignorance without guidance or illuminating Scripture.

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: And when they are told, "Follow what God has revealed," they say, " We will follow what we found our fathers doing." [What?] Even if Satan was inviting them to the punishment of the Blazing Fire?

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: Whoever turns his face in submission to God while he is doing good has grasped the most trustworthy handhold. God determines the outcome of [all] matters.

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: And do not let the denial of those who continue to deny the truth grieve you, [Prophet]. They will return to Us, and We will tell them everything that they have done. God knows everything that lies within the heart.

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: We will grant them some enjoyment for a while, [but] then We will force a massive punishment on them.

25.Safi Kaskas 2024: And, if you asked them, "Who created the heavens and Earth?" They would say, "God." Say, "[All] praise is [due] to God," but most of them do not understand.

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: Whatever is in the heavens and Earth belongs to God, for God is the Rich beyond need, the Praiseworthy.

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: If all the trees on Earth were pens and the sea [were] ink with seven [more] seas to replenish it, God’s words would not be exhausted , for God is Revered, Wise.

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: Creating and resurrecting all of you is [for God] like creating and resurrecting a single soul. God is All-Hearing and All-Seeing.

29.Safi Kaskas 2024: Do you not see that God causes the night to merge into the day and causes the day to merge into the night and has made the sun and the moon subservient [to His laws], each running its course for a specified term, and that God is aware of all you do?

30.Safi Kaskas 2024: Thus, it is because God is the Truth, and whatever they invoke besides Him is falsehood, and because God is the Exalted, the Great.

31.Safi Kaskas 2024: Do you not see that ships sail through the sea by the grace of God so that He may show you some of His signs? Surely there are signs in this for everyone patient and grateful.

32.Safi Kaskas 2024: And when waves come over them like [giant] shadows, they call out to God, sincere in their devotion to Him, but when He delivers them safely to shore, some of them waver. Only a treacherous and ungrateful person refuses to acknowledge Our signs.

33.Safi Kaskas 2024: People, be conscious of your Lord and fear a Day when no father will be able to rescue his son, nor will a son be able to rescue his father at all. God’s promise [of resurrection] is the Truth, so do not let this worldly life deceive you, nor deceptive thoughts about God delude you.

34.Safi Kaskas 2024: God has knowledge of the Hour and sends down the rain and knows what is in the wombs, but no soul knows what it will reap tomorrow, and no soul knows in what land it will die. God [alone] is All-Knowing and All-Aware.

32.SurahEnglishNames: The Prostration, Worship, Adoration, The Adoration

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: Alif Lam Meem

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: there is no doubt that this book has been sent down exactly as it is from the Lord of the Worlds.
