3.Safi Kaskas 2024: Or do they say, "He invented it?” Rather, it is the Truth from your Lord, so that you will warn a people to whom no warner has come before you and that they may be guided.

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is God who created the heavens and the Earth and all that is between them in six days; then He sat down on the Throne of His majesty. Apart from Him, You have no one to protect you or to intercede for you, so will you not remember this?

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: He manages everything from heaven to Earth; then, it will all ascend to Him on a Day whose measure is a thousand years as you count them.

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: Such is He, the Knower of the unseen and the Witnessed, the Revered, the Mercy Giver.

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: He perfected everything which He created, and began the creation of the human being from clay;

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: then He made his descendants from the extract of a common fluid;

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: then He formed him and breathed into him from His Spirit, and made hearing and vision and hearts for you, yet you seldom are grateful.

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: And they ask, "When we have decayed into the Earth, will we be created anew?" They deny that they will meet their Lord.

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "The angel of death, who has been put in charge of you, will retrieve you. Then you will be brought back to your Lord

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: If you could only see those who forced others to reject Our messages, bowing their heads before their Lord, [saying], "Our Lord, We have seen and heard, so send us back, and we will do good, we are [now] certain."

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: If it had been Our Will, We could have given every soul its guidance, but My word came to be true: "I will surely fill up Hell with jinn and human beings altogether.

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: Taste [punishment]. Because you ignored the meeting of this Day of your Judgment, We will ignore you, so taste the punishment of eternity for all you have done."

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: True believers in Our signs are those who, when they are reminded of them, fall in prostration, and praise their Lord’s limitless glory, and do not think they are too arrogant to do it.

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: They forsake their beds as they call upon their Lord in fear and hope, and they share with others from what We have provided them.

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: No soul knows what is hidden for them, to delight their eyes.

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: Is a believer the same as one who was defiantly disobedient? [No], they are not equal.

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: As for those who believed and did good deeds, there will be Gardens of Refuge for them as accommodation for what they have done.

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: But as for those who defiantly disobeyed, their refuge is the Fire. Every time they want to get out of it, they will be returned to it while being told, "Taste the punishment of the Fire which you used to deny."

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: However, We will first let them taste a lesser punishment [on Earth] prior to the greater punishment so that perhaps they may return [to the right path].

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: Who is more unjust than one who is reminded of the signs of his Lord and then turns away from them? We will make those who force others to reject God’s messages pay the price.

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: We gave Moses the Book, so do not be in doubt that you are receiving the same [revelation]. And we made the Book guidance for the Children of Israel.

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: We raised leaders from among them who, as long as they were steadfast and believed firmly in Our messages, guided them according to Our command.

25.Safi Kaskas 2024: Your Lord will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection regarding their differences.

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: Hasn’t it become clear to them yet how many generations We destroyed before them, through whose ruined homes they now walk? In that are signs; don’t they listen?

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: Have they not seen that We drive rain to the barren land and bring forth vegetation from which they and their livestock eat? Do they not see?

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: They say, "When will this judgment be if you are telling the truth?"

29.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "On the Day of Judgment, it will be of no use for the unbelievers to believe, nor will they be given amnesty."

30.Safi Kaskas 2024: So turn away from them and wait. They are waiting.

33.SurahEnglishNames: The Clans, The Coalition, The Combined Forces, The Allies

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: Prophet, be mindful of God and do not obey the unbelievers and the hypocrites. God is All-Knowing and All-Wise.

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: Follow what is revealed to you from your Lord, for God is aware of all you do

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: and put your trust in God, for God is worthy of trust.

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: God did not place two hearts inside any man's body. Nor has He made your wives whom you equate with your mothers your birth mothers, nor has He made your adopted sons your actual sons. These are [merely] words coming out of your mouths. But God speaks the Truth, and He guides us to the right path.

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: Call [your adopted sons] after their fathers; this is right in the sight of God, but if you do not know their fathers, then they are your brothers in faith and entrusted to you. You will not be blamed if you make mistakes [in such matters], but [only for] what your hearts intended. God is Most Forgiving, the Mercy giver.

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: The Prophet has a higher claim on the believers than [they do on] their own selves, and his wives are their mothers. Blood relations have a higher claim on one another, according to the Book of God, than do other believers and emigrants. Nevertheless, you may act kindly toward your friends. All this is inscribed in the Book.

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: We took a pledge from the prophets: from you and from Noah, and Abraham, and Moses, and Jesus, the Son of Mary. We took a solemn pledge from them

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: so that God may question the sincere about their sincerity. And, for the unbelievers, He has prepared a painful punishment.

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: Believers, remember God’s blessings to you when armies came to [attack] you, and We sent a wind and forces that you could not see. God always sees what you do.

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: When they [the enemy] came at you from above you and from below you, when eyes rolled [in fear], and your hearts rose to your throats, and you had [ill] thoughts of God-

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: there, the believers were tested and severely shaken.

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: The hypocrites and the sick at heart said, "The promise from God and His Messenger is a fantasy"

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: and a group of them said, "People of Yathrib, there is nothing for you [here], so return [home]." Yet another group asked permission of the Prophet, saying, "Our houses are exposed," although, in fact, they were not. They intended only to flee.

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: Had their town been invaded from every side, and they had been exhorted to revert to idolatry, [the hypocrites] would have done so with very little hesitation

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: even though they had already pledged before God not to turn back and flee. One is always responsible for a promise made before God.

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "Fleeing will not benefit you. If you should flee from death or killing, you will be permitted to enjoy life for only a short while."

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "Who is it that can prevent God from harming you, if He wishes, or being merciful to you if He wishes?" They will find no protector or helper other than God.

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: God knows those among you who would hold you back, as well as those who would say to their brothers, "Come to us," and hardly go to battle.

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: They do not care about you, and when fear [of battle] comes, you see them looking at you with their eyes rolling like one overtaken by death. Yet, as soon as the danger has gone, they lash out at you with sharp tongues, resenting any good that comes to you. Such people have no faith, so God has rendered their deeds worthless, which is easy for God.

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: They think the war parties have not [yet] withdrawn, and, if the war parties came [again], they would wish they were in the desert among the Bedouins, seeking news about you [from a safe distance]. Even if they were among you, they would hardly fight at all.

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: The Messenger of God is an excellent model for anyone who puts his hope in God and the Last Day and remembers God often.

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: And when the Believers saw the war parties, they said, "This is what God and His Messenger had promised us; God and His Messenger spoke the truth." This only increased their faith and submission.

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: Among the believers are men true to what they promised God. Some died while fulfilling their pledge, and some are still waiting, having never changed in the least.

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: That God may reward the truthful for being true to their pledge and punish the hypocrites, if He wills, or accept their repentance, for God is the Most Forgiving, the Mercy Giver.

25.Safi Kaskas 2024: God drove back the unbelievers in their rage, and they gained no advantage; God spared the believers from fighting, for God is All-Strong and Revered.

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: He brought those People of the Book who supported [the unbelievers] down from their fortresses and threw terror into their hearts. Some of them you killed, and others you took captive.

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: He gave you their land, their homes, their property, and a land where you had not set foot before. God can do all things.

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: Prophet, say to your wives, "If your desire is for this worldly life and its finery, then come, I will provide for you and release you with kindness,

29.Safi Kaskas 2024: but if you desire God, His Messenger, and a home in the Hereafter, then God has prepared a great reward for those among you who do good."

30.Safi Kaskas 2024: Wives of the Prophet, whoever of you burden the Prophet with demands for material possessions , her punishment would be doubled, and this is easy for God,

31.Safi Kaskas 2024: but she among you who obeys God and His Messenger and does good deeds, We will give her a double reward. We have prepared for her a generous provision.

32.Safi Kaskas 2024: Wives of the Prophet, you are not like any of the other women, provided that you remain mindful of God. Do not, then, be soft-spoken, as you do not want the sick at heart to lust after you, but speak appropriately.

33.Safi Kaskas 2024: Stay at home , and do not display your beauty as you did before, during the time of ignorance. Establish prayer, pay alms, and obey God and His Messenger. God wishes to remove all impurity from you, members of the (Prophet’s) household, and to purify you to the utmost degree of purity.

34.Safi Kaskas 2024: And remember all God’s messages and Wisdom that are recited in your homes. God is Most-Subtle and All-Aware.

35.Safi Kaskas 2024: The men and women who have submitted to God, the believing men and women, the obedient men and women, the truthful men and women, the patient men and women, the humble men and women, the charitable men and women, the fasting men and women, the men and women who guard their chastity, and the men and women who remember God often, for them, God has prepared forgiveness and a great reward.

36.Safi Kaskas 2024: When God and His Messenger have decided a matter, it is not for a believing man or a believing woman to have a choice about it. Whoever disobeys God and His Messenger is clearly misguided.

37.Safi Kaskas 2024: When you [Muhammad] said to the one whom God has blessed, and you have favored, "Keep your wife and be mindful of God," while concealing within yourself that which God was about to disclose. [In doing so] You feared people, whereas it is God whom you should fear. So, when Zayd divorced her, We married her to you. We do not want believers to have restrictions concerning their adopted sons’ wives after they divorce them, for God’s command must be carried out.

38.Safi Kaskas 2024: The Prophet should not have any uneasiness about that which God has ordained for him since this is God’s way with those [prophets] who passed away before. God’s will is absolute destiny.

39.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Such is how it is with] those who convey the messages of God and fear only Him. God suffices as a reckoner.

40.Safi Kaskas 2024: Muhammad is not the father of [any] one of your men, but [he is] the Messenger of God and last of the prophets. God knows all things.

41.Safi Kaskas 2024: Believers, remember God often

42.Safi Kaskas 2024: and praise His limitless glory morning and evening.

43.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is He who remembers you, as do His angels, so that He may bring you out of darkness into the enlightenment. He is the Mercy giver to the believers.

44.Safi Kaskas 2024: On the day they meet Him, their greeting will be "Peace," and He has prepared a generous reward for them.

45.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is He Who [in return for your remembrance of Him] bestows His special blessings upon you, with His angels [praying and asking His forgiveness for you], that He may lead you out of darkness into the light [and keep them firm therein]. He is All-Compassionate toward the believers. Prophet, We have sent you as a witness and a bearer of good news and warning

46.Safi Kaskas 2024: and as one who calls people to God, with His permission and an illuminated beacon.

47.Safi Kaskas 2024: Give good news to the believers that they will have great favor from God.

48.Safi Kaskas 2024: Do not follow the call of the unbelievers and the hypocrites; ignore their abuse, but rely on God, for none is as trustworthy as God.

49.Safi Kaskas 2024: Believers, you have no right to expect a waiting period when you marry believing women and then divorce them before you have touched them, so provide generously for them and give them an honorable release.

50.Safi Kaskas 2024: Prophet, We have made lawful to you your wives to whom you have given their due wedding gifts, and those whom your right hand, held in trust, given to you by God, and the daughters of your paternal uncles, the daughters of your paternal aunts, the daughters of your maternal uncles and aunts who migrated with you, and any believing woman who has offered herself to the Prophet if the Prophet wishes to marry her, a privilege [exclusively] for you and not the rest of the believers. We know what We have made obligatory to them concerning their wives and those whom their right hands hold in trust, hence you will not be at fault [if you act according to your privilege], for God is the Most Forgiving, the Mercy Giver.

51.Safi Kaskas 2024: You may make any of them wait and invite any of them as you wish, but you will not be at fault if you invite one whom you had previously set aside. That is more likely, in order to keep them contented and not grieve. That they should be satisfied with what you have given them. God knows what is in your hearts, for God is All-Knowing and Forbearing.

52.Safi Kaskas 2024: Beyond that, it is not permitted to you to take any additional women, nor to exchange them for other wives, even if their beauty were to please you, except those from among your slaves. God is Watchful over all things.

53.Safi Kaskas 2024: Believers, do not enter the Prophet’s houses for a meal except when you are invited and do not linger, waiting for the food to be ready; but when you are invited, then enter, and, when you have eaten, leave, and do not stay around to chat. That [behavior] troubles the Prophet, and he may be shy about [dismissing] you, but God is not shy about [telling you] the truth. And when you ask [his wives] for something, ask them from behind a partition; that is purer for your hearts and theirs. You are not permitted to offend the Messenger of God or to marry his wives after him, ever; that would be a huge offense in God’s sight.

54.Safi Kaskas 2024: Whatever you reveal or conceal, God knows all things.

55.Safi Kaskas 2024: Women are not to blame if they are seen by their fathers or their sons, or their brothers, or their brothers’ sons, or their sisters’ sons or their women [servants], or their slaves, if they are mindful of God, for God is the Witness over all things.

56.Safi Kaskas 2024: God and His angels bless the Prophet, so, believers, bless him and give yourselves up in total submission [to his message].

57.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those who insult God and His Messenger, God rejects them in this world and the Hereafter and has prepared for them a humiliating punishment.

58.Safi Kaskas 2024: And those who unjustifiably harm believing men and women will bear the guilt of slander and clear wrongdoing.

59.Safi Kaskas 2024: Prophet, tell your wives, your daughters, and the believers’ women to bring down over themselves [part] of their outer garments. This will make it more likely that they will be recognized and not abused. God is the Most Forgiving, the Mercy-giver.

60.Safi Kaskas 2024: If the hypocrites and the sick at heart and those who spread bad rumors in Medina do not stop, We will stir you up against them; then, they will be living there with you for only a short while.

61.Safi Kaskas 2024: They are cursed, and they should be arrested and put to death wherever they are found.

62.Safi Kaskas 2024: This has been God’s way with those who went before, and you will not find any change in the way of God.

63.Safi Kaskas 2024: People ask you about the Hour [of Judgment]. Say," God alone has Knowledge of It. You never know; the Hour may be near."

64.Safi Kaskas 2024: The unbelievers have earned God’s anger, and He has prepared a Blazing Fire for them.

65.Safi Kaskas 2024: There they will stay forever, where they will find no protector or helper.

66.Safi Kaskas 2024: On the Day their faces will be turned about in the Fire, and they will say, "How we wish we had obeyed God and obeyed the Messenger."

67.Safi Kaskas 2024: And they will say, "Our Lord, we obeyed our masters and our dignitaries, and they led us down the wrong path.

68.Safi Kaskas 2024: Our Lord, give them double the punishment and banish them utterly from your grace."

69.Safi Kaskas 2024: Believers, do not be like those who slandered Moses, but God cleared him of what they said and that he was distinguished in God’s sight.

70.Safi Kaskas 2024: Believers, be mindful of God and speak straightforwardly

71.Safi Kaskas 2024: He will rectify your actions and forgive your transgressions. Whoever obeys God and His Messenger has indeed achieved great success

72.Safi Kaskas 2024: We offered the Trust to the heavens, the Earth, and the mountains, but they refused to bear it and feared it, yet the human being took it on. He has always been unjust and ignorant,

73.Safi Kaskas 2024: [This is so that] God punishes the hypocrites, men, and women, as well as the men and women who associate others with Him, and why God turns mercifully towards the believing men and women, for God is the Most Forgiving, the Mercy Giver.

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: All praise is due to God, to whom whatever is in the heavens and the Earth belongs, and to Him belong all praise in the Hereafter. He is the All-Wise, the All-Aware.

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: He knows what goes into the Earth and what comes out of it, and what comes down from heaven and what goes up into it. He is the Mercy-Giver, the Forgiving.

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: The unbelievers say, "The Hour of Judgment will never come to us." Say [Prophet], “Yes, by God, it will surely come to you. [God is] the Knower of all that is beyond our knowledge." Not even an atom's weight within the heavens or the Earth escapes His knowledge, nor anything smaller or larger than that. All is in a clear record

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: so that He may reward those who believe and do good deeds. They will have forgiveness and a generous provision

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: but for those who strive against Our message, trying to undermine it, there will be a painful punishment of unbearable pain.

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those who have been given knowledge see that what is sent down to you from your Lord is the Truth and that it guides to the path of the Revered, the Praiseworthy.

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: The unbelievers say, "Shall we show you a man who will tell you that when you are decayed, you will be raised as a new creation?

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: Has he invented a lie about God, or is he mad?" Rather, they who do not believe in the Hereafter will receive punishment and are extremely misguided.

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: Have they not looked at what is before them and what is behind them of heaven and Earth? If We wanted, We could cause the Earth to swallow them or let fragments from the sky fall on them. There is a sign in that for every worshiper who turns back to God in repentance.

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: We gave David great favors from Us: "Mountains, repeat [Our] praises with him, and the birds [as well]." And We made iron pliable for him,

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: [instructing him to], "Make full coats of mail, measuring the links carefully. Do good, all of you. I am aware of everything you do."

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: And [We subjected] the wind to Solomon; its morning course [covered] a month’s journey, and its evening course [covered] a month’s journey. And We made a fountain of molten copper flow for him. And among the jinn were those who worked for him with his Lord’s permission, and whoever among them deviated from Our command, We will make him taste of the punishment of the Blazing flame.

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: They made him whatever he wanted: high arches and statues, bowls like reservoirs, and firmly anchored kettles. [We said], "Work in gratitude, the family of David, for few of My worshipers are grateful.”

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: And when We decreed Solomon’s death, nothing indicated his death to the jinn except an Earthworm eating his staff, but, when he fell, it became clear to the jinn that, had they known the reality which was beyond their knowledge, they would not have remained in humiliating punishment.

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: There was a sign [of God’s grace] for the people of Sheba in their homeland: two gardens, one on the right and one on the left. [They were told], "Eat from the provisions of your Lord, and be grateful to Him for good land and a forgiving Lord."

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: But they turned away, so We loosed on them the flood from the dam, and We replaced their two gardens with two others of bitter fruit, tamarisk bushes, and a few thorn trees.

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: This is how We repaid them for their ingratitude. Are any but the ungrateful repaid like this?

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Before their demise] We had placed between them and the towns We had blessed other towns within sight of one another to which they could easily have traveled, "Travel safely between them by night or day."

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: But [they complained], "Our Lord has made the distance between our staging posts so long." [In so doing], they wronged themselves, so We made their fate a tale for all and scattered them in small groups throughout the land. There are certainly signs in this for everyone, patient and grateful.

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: What Iblīs thought of them was proven right since they all followed him, except for a group of believers.

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: He had no authority over them, but We wanted to know who believes in the Hereafter and who is in doubt about it. Your Lord is the Preserver over all things.

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "Call on those you claim to be gods other than God." They have no power over the smallest particle, either in the heavens or on Earth, and they do not have a partnership [with Him], nor does He need any assistant from them.

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: Intercession will be of no avail with Him except when He permits it. [But, on the day of Judgment,] when the terror is removed from their hearts, they will say [to one another], "What has your Lord said?" They will say, "The truth." And He is the Exalted, the Great.

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "Who provides for you from the heavens and the Earth? " Say, "God does. Then you or we are rightly guided or lost."

25.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "You will not be asked about what we have done, and we will not be asked about what you do."

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "Our Lord will bring us together; then He will judge between us in Truth, for He is the All-knowing, the Just Decider."

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "Show me those whom you have joined to Him as partners. No! Rather, He [alone] is God, the Revered, the Wise."

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: And We have sent you to all people as the bearer of good news and to deliver a warning, but most people do not know.

29.Safi Kaskas 2024: And they say, "When is this promise coming if you are truthful?"

30.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "You have an appointment for a Day which you cannot delay nor bring forward even by a single hour"

31.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those who deny the truth say, "We will never believe in this Qur’an or in what came before it." But if only you could see when the unjust are made to stand before their Lord, blaming each other; those who were thought weak will say to those who had been arrogant, "Had it not been for you, we would have been believers."

32.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those who had been arrogant will say to those who they deemed to be weak, "Did we prevent you from following the right guidance after it had come to you? Rather, you rejected it."

33.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those who had been thought weak will say to those who had been arrogant, "Rather, it was your scheming, night and day, ordering us to deny God and attribute equals to Him." But when they all see the punishment [that awaits them], they will be unable to express their remorse. We will put shackles around the necks of those who rejected the truth, and they will be repaid only for what they have done.

34.Safi Kaskas 2024: Never have We sent a warning into a town without those who were corrupted by wealth, saying, “We reject the message with which you have been sent.”

35.Safi Kaskas 2024: They also say, "We are wealthier and have more children [than you], and We will not be punished."

36.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, [Prophet] “My Lord gives abundant provisions to whom He wills, or [likewise] restricts [it], but most people do not know."

37.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is neither your wealth nor your children that will bring you nearer to Us, but rather [your choice] to believe and to do good deeds. For those, there will be a double reward for what they did, and they will be safe in the upper chambers [of Paradise].

38.Safi Kaskas 2024: But as for those who rejected Our messages, trying to undermine them, they will be consigned to the punishment.

39.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "My Lord gives abundantly to whomever of His worshipers He wills, or [likewise] restricts [it], but whatever you spend [in His cause], He will replace, for He is the Best of Providers."

40.Safi Kaskas 2024: And on the Day He will gather them all and say to the angels, "Was it you whom these people worshipped?"

41.Safi Kaskas 2024: They will say, "May You Be Exalted in Your glory. You are our protector, not them. Rather, they [the unbelievers] used to worship the jinn; most of them believed in them."

42.Safi Kaskas 2024: “Today, none of you hold any power to benefit or harm another,” and We will say to those who wronged themselves, "Taste the punishment of the Fire, which you used to deny."

43.Safi Kaskas 2024: When our clear verses are recited to them [your people], they say, "This is only a man who wants to turn you away from what your ancestors worshipped." They [also] say, "This is only a lie that he has invented." When the Truth comes to them, the unbelievers say, "This is nothing but sorcery."

44.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Even] though We had not given them any Books to study nor sent anyone before you, [Prophet], to warn them.

45.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those before them similarly rejected the truth when they did not receive a tenth of what We had given them [your people], yet they [the previous people] rejected My Messengers, and how [terrible] was My disapproval.

46.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "I offer you a single advice: Stand up before God, in pairs or individually, and then reflect. Your companion is not crazy. He is here only to warn you of severe impending punishment.”

47.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "The payment for which you think I ask you is yours. My payment comes only from God, and He is the Witness over all things."

48.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "My Lord hurls forth the Truth, for He has the full knowledge of all that is beyond our knowledge."

49.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "The Truth has come, and falsehood can neither originate anything nor regenerate it."

50.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "If I should be misguided, it is only to my detriment, but if I am guided, it is through what my Lord reveals to me. He is the All-Hearing, the Near."

51.Safi Kaskas 2024: If only you could see when they are terrified, but there will be no escape, and they are seized from a place nearby.

52.Safi Kaskas 2024: They will [then] say, "We do believe in it!" But how can they reach it from such a distant place?

53.Safi Kaskas 2024: They had already denied the truth and were prone to guessing from afar about things beyond their perception.

54.Safi Kaskas 2024: A barrier will be placed between them and what they desire, as was done with their kind before, for they too were in hopeless doubt.

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: [All] praise is due to God, the Creator, Separator, and Programmer of the heavens and the Earth. He made the angels messengers with wings, two, three, and four [pairs]. He adds to His creation any way He wills, for God has power over all things.

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: Whatever mercy God grants to people, no one can prevent, whatever He withholds, no one can release, for He is the Revered, the Wise.

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: People, remember the favor of God upon you. Is there any creator other than God who provides for you from heaven and Earth? There is no God except Him, so what lies are you inventing?

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: And if they deny you [Prophet], other messengers were denied before you. To God, all matters will be returned.

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: People, God’s promise is true, so do not let worldly life delude you, and don't let the deceiver deceive you about God.

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: Satan is your enemy, so treat him as an enemy. His call on his followers [will only lead them] to be among those of the Blazing Fire.

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: The unbelievers will have a severe punishment, and those who believe and do good deeds will have forgiveness and great reward.

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: What about the one whose evil deeds were made to look pleasing to him, so he regards them as worthy? God lets stray [those] who choose [to be misguided] and guides [those] who choose [guidance], so don't let your sorrow over them destroy you. God knows what they do.

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is God who sends the winds, which lift the clouds. We then drive to a dead land and thereby bring the Earth to life after its death. Such is the resurrection.

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: Whoever desires reverence, [they should know that] all reverence belongs to God. To Him, all good words ascend, and He lifts righteous deeds. But they who plot evil deeds will have a severe punishment, and their plots will perish.

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: God created you from dust, then from a fertilized ovum, and then He made you into pairs. No female conceives nor does she give birth without His knowledge, and no being grows old or has his life cut short except per a book . That is easy for God.

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: The two seas are not alike: one is fresh and sweet, suitable for drinking, and the other is salty and bitter. Yet from each, you eat fresh meat and extract ornaments to wear. You see ships making their way through [each of them] so that you might seek His bounty, and so perhaps you will be thankful.

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: He merges the night into the day and the day into the night and has made the sun and the moon subservient [to His laws], each running [its course] for an appointed time. This is God, your Lord. Sovereignty belongs to Him, while those whom you invoke besides Him do not even control [as much as] the skin of a date seed.

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: If you invoke them, they do not hear you, and even if they could hear, they would not respond to you. On the Day of Resurrection, they will reject you, having associated them with God, and no one can inform you [of the Truth] like the One who is All-Aware.

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: People, you are in need of God, while God is the Rich Beyond Need, the One the Praiseworthy.

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: If He wishes, He can do away with you and bring forth a new creation

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: [which] for God is not difficult.

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: No bearer of burdens will bear the burdens of another, and if a heavily laden soul calls [another] to [carry some of] its load, nothing of it will be carried, even if they were related. You can only warn those who stand in awe of their Lord even though He is beyond the reach of their perception, and those who establish prayer, whoever purifies himself [does so] for the good of his soul. God is the [final] destination.

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: The blind and the seeing are not equal

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: nor are ignorance and enlightenment,

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: nor shade and heat,

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: nor are the living and the dead alike. God can make anyone He will hear, but you cannot make those in the grave hear.

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: You are only a warner.

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have sent you with the Truth as a bearer of good news and a warner, for there is no community to which a warner has not come.

25.Safi Kaskas 2024: If they reject you, those before them also rejected the truth. Their messengers came to them with clear signs and Psalms and with the enlightening Book.

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then I seized the ones who denied the truth, and how [terrible] was My punishment.

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: Don't you see that God sends down rain from the sky, with which We produce fruits of varying colors, [just as] in the mountains there are layers, white and red of varying shades, and some too black?

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: And similarly, men, beasts, and cattle have various colors. Of all of his worshipers, only those with knowledge are in awe of God. God is Revered, Most Forgiving.

29.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those who recite the Book of God, establish prayer and spend out [on charity] from what We have provided them, secretly and openly, may expect a trade that will never perish,

30.Safi Kaskas 2024: for He may give them their full rewards and increase for them out of His bounty. He is ever-forgiving and ever-thankful.

31.Safi Kaskas 2024: What We revealed to you of the Book is the very Truth, confirming what is available to you of previous revelations. God is All-Aware of His worshipers and All-Seeing.

32.Safi Kaskas 2024: We then bestowed this Book as an inheritance on those of our worshipers whom We selected, and among them are some who wrong their own souls, some are moderate, and some who, by God’s grace, are foremost in good deeds. That is the greatest favor,

33.Safi Kaskas 2024: for they will enter Gardens of Eden, where they will be adorned with bracelets of gold and pearls, and where their garments will be silk.

34.Safi Kaskas 2024: They will say, "Praise be to God, who has removed all our sorrow from us, for Our Lord is truly ever-forgiving and ever-thankful.

35.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is He who has settled us in the everlasting Home out of His favor, where no weariness or fatigue will touch us."

36.Safi Kaskas 2024: But the unbelievers will be in Hell, where they will neither be finished off and die nor will they be relieved from Hell’s punishment. That is how we reward everyone who is ungrateful.

37.Safi Kaskas 2024: They will cry out loud, "Our Lord, let us out; We will do good deeds, different from what we were doing before!" “But didn't We give you sufficient time so that those who would be mindful could be mindful? And we even sent you the warner. Taste, then, [the punishment], for the unjust will have no helper.

38.Safi Kaskas 2024: God knows all the unknown of the heavens and Earth; He knows what is in the hearts.

39.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is He who has put you in charge of the Earth. Whoever denies the truth will bear the consequences. Their denial will increase their rejection in the sight of their Lord, and their denial will only increase their loss.

40.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "Have you considered your 'partners' whom you invoke besides God? Show me what part of the Earth they have created, or do they have a partnership [with Him] in the heavens? Or have We given them a Book that has clear evidence? [No indeed]; Rather, the unjust promise each other nothing but delusion."

41.Safi Kaskas 2024: God upholds the heavens and the Earth lest they fall apart, and, should they fall apart, no one other than He could hold them [in place], for He is Forbearing and Most Forgiving.

42.Safi Kaskas 2024: They swore by God their most solemn oaths that, if a warning came to them, they would be better guided than any one of the previous communities. But, when a warner did come to them, they only turned further away

43.Safi Kaskas 2024: because of their arrogance on Earth and their evil schemes. Yet evil schemes overwhelm only those who plot them. Do they expect anything different, given what happened to earlier people? You will never find any change in the way of God, and you will never find any deviation in His way.

44.Safi Kaskas 2024: Have they not traveled through the land and observed the final fate of those who preceded them, who were even greater than they in strength? Nothing in the heavens or Earth will prevent God from accomplishing His purpose, for He is All-Knowing, infinite in His power.

45.Safi Kaskas 2024: Were God to take people to task for what they have earned, He would not leave any creature on the Earth, but He defers them for a specified time. Then when their time comes, God sees all that is in [the hearts of] His worshipers.

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: Ya Seen,

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: by the wise Qur’an

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: you are one of the messengers,

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: on a straight path.

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: This revelation has been gradually sent down from the Revered, the Mercy Giver

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: to warn a people whose forefathers were not warned, so they are unaware.

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: [However], the word [of God] is bound to come true for most of them, for they will not believe.

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have put shackles around their necks, reaching to their chins, so that their heads are forced up,

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: and We have put a barrier before them and behind them and have blindfolded them so that they cannot see.

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is all the same to them; whether you warn them or do not warn them, they won’t believe.

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: You can only warn someone who follows the message and stands in awe of the Merciful-to-all even though He is beyond his perception. So give him the good news of forgiveness and a generous reward.

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is We who bring the dead to life and record what they have done and the results of their deeds. We account for everything in the Clearest Record/Al Imam Al Mubeen .

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: Give them the example of the people whose town was visited by the messengers

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: We sent two to them, but they rejected both, so We reinforced them with a third, and they declared, "We are messengers to you."

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: They replied, "You are only human beings like us, and the Merciful-to-all has not revealed a thing. You are only telling lies."

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: They said, "Our Lord knows that we are messengers to you

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: and we are responsible only for delivering [the message] clearly.”

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: They said, "We feel that you are an evil omen. If you do not stop, We will surely stone you, and cause you to suffer severely."

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: They said, "Your evil omen is upon you. How can it be evil that you were reminded [about God]? You are rather going too far."

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then a man came running from the farthest end of the city, saying, "O, my people, follow the Messengers.

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: Follow those who do not ask you for [any] payment; they are [rightly] guided.

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: Why should I not worship the One who brought me into being and gave me a purpose and to whom you will be returned?

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: Would I take any gods other than Him? if the Merciful-to-all intends me some harm, their intercession will not help me at all, nor can they save me.

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: I would then be clearly misguided.

25.Safi Kaskas 2024: I have believed in your Lord, so listen to me."

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: It was said [to him], "Enter Paradise." He said, "I wish that my people only knew

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: how my Lord has forgiven me and placed me among the highly honored."

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: After him, We did not send any host from heaven to his people, nor would We send one down.

29.Safi Kaskas 2024: It was only one shout, and immediately they were extinguished.

30.Safi Kaskas 2024: Alas for our servants. Whenever a messenger comes to them, they ridicule him.

31.Safi Kaskas 2024: Have they not considered how many generations We destroyed before them, none of whom will ever come back to them?

32.Safi Kaskas 2024: Yet each and every one of them will be brought before Us.

33.Safi Kaskas 2024: A sign for them is the dead land that We have brought to life; from it, We have brought forth grain, from which they eat.

34.Safi Kaskas 2024: And We have placed gardens of palm trees and grapevines in it and caused springs of water to burst from it,

35.Safi Kaskas 2024: so that they may eat its fruit. It was not their hands that produced it. Will they not, then, be grateful?

36.Safi Kaskas 2024: Exalted in His glory is He who created pairs out of whatever the Earth produces, as well as from themselves and from other things unknown to them.

37.Safi Kaskas 2024: The night is a sign for them. We remove the daylight from it, so they are [left] in darkness

38.Safi Kaskas 2024: and the sun runs its course toward its destined point. Such is the determination of the Revered, the All-Knowing.

39.Safi Kaskas 2024: And the moon, We have determined its phases until it finally appears like the old date-palm stalk.

40.Safi Kaskas 2024: The sun is not allowed to reach the moon, nor does the night overtake the day, but each floats in its own orbit.

41.Safi Kaskas 2024: Another sign for them is that We carried their offspring in the laden Ark.

42.Safi Kaskas 2024: And that We have created for them similar vessels in which to ride.

43.Safi Kaskas 2024: If We wish, We could drown them, with no one to respond to their cry for help, nor would they be saved,

44.Safi Kaskas 2024: except through Our mercy, that they could be given a while to enjoy life.

45.Safi Kaskas 2024: But when they are told, "Beware of what lies before you and what lies behind you; perhaps you will be shown mercy"

46.Safi Kaskas 2024: they turn away from every sign that comes to them from their Lord.

47.Safi Kaskas 2024: And when It is said to them, "Give to others from what God has provided for you," the unbelievers say to those who believe, "Should we feed one whom, if God had willed, He would have fed? You are clearly misguided."

48.Safi Kaskas 2024: They say, "When will this promise come about if you are truthful?"

49.Safi Kaskas 2024: All it takes is one blast that will seize them while they are still arguing about it.

50.Safi Kaskas 2024: They will not be able [to give] any testimony, nor will they return to their people.

51.Safi Kaskas 2024: And then the Horn will be blown, and at once, they will rush out of the graves to their Lord.

52.Safi Kaskas 2024: They will say, "How terrible for us! Who has raised us up from our resting place?" [They will be told], "This is what the Merciful-to-all had promised, and the Messengers told the Truth."

53.Safi Kaskas 2024: It will be only one blast, and at once they are all brought before Us

54.Safi Kaskas 2024: “Today, no soul will be wronged at all, and you will be repaid for what you did.”

55.Safi Kaskas 2024: The people of Paradise will on that Day be joyfully engaged;

56.Safi Kaskas 2024: they and their spouses will lie in shades, reclining on couches

57.Safi Kaskas 2024: where they will have fruit and whatever they wish,

58.Safi Kaskas 2024: and their Lord, the Mercy giver, will great them with “Peace.”

59.Safi Kaskas 2024: [But to the guilty, He will say], "Those who forced others to reject Our messages should stand apart today.”

60.Safi Kaskas 2024: Children of Adam, did I not make a covenant with you not to worship Satan, who is clearly your enemy

61.Safi Kaskas 2024: and that you worship [only] Me? This is a straight path.

62.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Satan] has already led a great many of you astray; why do you not use your reason?

63.Safi Kaskas 2024: This is the Hell that you were promised.

64.Safi Kaskas 2024: Enter it today as a result of your having denied the truth."

65.Safi Kaskas 2024: Today, We will seal over their mouths, but their hands will speak to Us, and their feet will testify about what they used to do.

66.Safi Kaskas 2024: And if We willed it, We could have taken away their sight, and they would have struggled to [find] the path, but how could they have seen it?

67.Safi Kaskas 2024: And if We had so willed, We could have crippled them where they stood, so that they could move neither forward nor backward.

68.Safi Kaskas 2024: When We grant a person a long life. We also cause him to decline in power, so will they not understand?

69.Safi Kaskas 2024: We did not teach [the Prophet] poetry, nor is it suitable for him. This is simply a reminder and a self-evident Qur’an

70.Safi Kaskas 2024: to warn those whose hearts are alive and to pass God’s verdict against the unbelievers.

71.Safi Kaskas 2024: Can they not see that, by Our own handiwork, We have created livestock for them, that they now control?

72.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have tamed [those animals] for them so that they can ride some of them, and some they can eat

73.Safi Kaskas 2024: and some have other benefits, [such as milk] to drink. Will they not, then, be grateful?

74.Safi Kaskas 2024: Yet they have taken [false] gods besides God, hoping that they will help them

75.Safi Kaskas 2024: but [their false gods] cannot help them, even if they were soldiers standing by, ready to support them.

76.Safi Kaskas 2024: So do not let what they say grieve you. We know what they conceal and what they reveal.

77.Safi Kaskas 2024: Does a human being not consider that We created him from a [mere] fertilized ovum, yet he becomes a fierce adversary?

78.Safi Kaskas 2024: Now, he argues about Us while he overlooks how he himself was created. He says, "Who will give life to bones when they are disintegrated?"

79.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "He who made them in the first instance will give them life again. He has full knowledge of all creation,

80.Safi Kaskas 2024: He, who produces fire for you from green trees so that you use them to light your fires.”

81.Safi Kaskas 2024: Is not He who created the heavens and the Earth able to create the same again? Yes, indeed, for He is the All-Knowing, the Creator.

82.Safi Kaskas 2024: When He wills something to be, He simply says, “Be”– and it is.

83.Safi Kaskas 2024: Exalted in His glory is He who has the dominion of all things in His hand, and to Him, you will return.

37.SurahEnglishNames: Those Who Set The Ranks, Drawn up in Ranks, The Rangers

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: By those lined up in ranks,

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: and those who warn, crying warnings,

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: and those who recite God’s word,

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: your God is One,

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: Lord of the heavens and the Earth and everything between them, Lord of every sunrise.

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have adorned the nearest heaven with planets

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: and protected them against every rebellious devil,

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: [so that the devils] may not listen to the highest assembly [of angels] but be repelled from every side,

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: driven away. For them, there is endless punishment

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: except for him who snatches a glimpse [of such knowledge], a piercing flame will pursue him. [37:10)

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then ask those who persist in denying the truth if they were more challenging to create than those other beings We have created, for We created them from sticky clay. [37:11)

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: No wonder you are surprised, to see them ridicule [the message], [37:12)

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: and when they are reminded [of the Truth], they don't want to remember, [37:13)

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: and when they see a sign, they ridicule it, [37:14)

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: saying, "This is mere magic. [37:15)

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: When We have died and become dust and bones, are we to be resurrected, [37:16)

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: and our forefathers too?” [37:17)

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, “Yes, and [on that Day of Judgment] you will be humiliated."

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: [On that Day,] there will be only a single shout, and at once they will begin to see.

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: They will say, "How terrible for us! This is the Day of Judgment,"

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: and [They will be told], "This is the Day of separation [between the good and the bad], which you used to deny."

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: [The angels will be ordered], "Gather those who were unjust, all those like them, and the idols they used to worship

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: instead of God, and show them to the path of Hell

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: And stop them, for they are to be questioned:

25.Safi Kaskas 2024: “Why do you not help each other now?"

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: No, today they come in absolute submission

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: and they will turn on one another, questioning each other.

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Some] will say, "You used to approach us from a position of power."

29.Safi Kaskas 2024: The others will say, "No, you [yourselves] were not believers

30.Safi Kaskas 2024: and we had no authority over you, but you were exceedingly arrogant people.

31.Safi Kaskas 2024: Our Lord’s Word has been carried out against us, and we will all taste the punishment.

32.Safi Kaskas 2024: We misled you, and we were ourselves misled."

33.Safi Kaskas 2024: On that Day, they will share in the punishment

34.Safi Kaskas 2024: for that is how We deal with those who forced others to reject Our messages.

35.Safi Kaskas 2024: Whenever they were told, "There is no god but God," they became arrogant

36.Safi Kaskas 2024: and would say, “Are we to give up our gods for a mad poet?"

37.Safi Kaskas 2024: Rather, the Prophet has come with the Truth and confirmed the [previous] messengers.

38.Safi Kaskas 2024: You [who deny the truth] will taste the painful punishment

39.Safi Kaskas 2024: and you will be repaid only for what you used to do.

40.Safi Kaskas 2024: Not so for God’s devoted worshipers

41.Safi Kaskas 2024: they will have recognizable provision,

42.Safi Kaskas 2024: of fruits, and they will be honored

43.Safi Kaskas 2024: in Gardens of delight,

44.Safi Kaskas 2024: [resting] on couches and facing one another.

45.Safi Kaskas 2024: A cup from a flowing spring will be passed among them,

46.Safi Kaskas 2024: white and delicious to the drinkers,

47.Safi Kaskas 2024: which will neither sicken nor intoxicate them.

48.Safi Kaskas 2024: With them are mates of modest gaze with beautiful eyes

49.Safi Kaskas 2024: just like closely guarded pearls.

50.Safi Kaskas 2024: They will turn to one another, inquiring

51.Safi Kaskas 2024: One of them says," I used to have a friend [on Earth]

52.Safi Kaskas 2024: who used to say to me, are you of those who believe

53.Safi Kaskas 2024: that, when we have died and become dust and bones, we will be brought for judgment?’”

54.Safi Kaskas 2024: And he will add, "Shall we look for him?"

55.Safi Kaskas 2024: and he looks and sees [his former companion] in the midst of Hell.

56.Safi Kaskas 2024: He says to him, "By God, you almost ruined me.

57.Safi Kaskas 2024: Were it not for the grace of my Lord, I would have been with those taken [to Hell].

58.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then, [he says to those in paradise], “Will we really not die

59.Safi Kaskas 2024: except for our first death, and will we really not be punished?"

60.Safi Kaskas 2024: Truly, this is the ultimate success.”

61.Safi Kaskas 2024: This is what everyone should strive to attain.

62.Safi Kaskas 2024: Is Paradise a better place to be or the tree of Bitterness?

63.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have made [this tree] punishment for the unjust.

64.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is a tree that grows in the heart of Hell

65.Safi Kaskas 2024: Its fruit like devils’ heads

66.Safi Kaskas 2024: and [the people in Hell] will eat from it and fill their bellies with it.

67.Safi Kaskas 2024: On top of that, they will have a boiling brew to drink.

68.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then they will return to Hell,

69.Safi Kaskas 2024: for they found their fathers misguided,

70.Safi Kaskas 2024: so they rushed [to follow] in their footsteps.

71.Safi Kaskas 2024: Most of the earlier peoples went astray before them

72.Safi Kaskas 2024: though We had already sent them someone to give warning.

73.Safi Kaskas 2024: Look, then, at the final fate of those who were warned

74.Safi Kaskas 2024: except for the devout worshipers of God.

75.Safi Kaskas 2024: Noah called Us and how excellent was Our response.

76.Safi Kaskas 2024: We saved him and his family from great distress.

77.Safi Kaskas 2024: We made his descendants the survivors,

78.Safi Kaskas 2024: and left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:

79.Safi Kaskas 2024: Peace upon Noah, among all people.

80.Safi Kaskas 2024: This is how we reward those who do good

81.Safi Kaskas 2024: for he was among Our believing worshipers.

82.Safi Kaskas 2024: We drowned the rest.

83.Safi Kaskas 2024: Abraham was like him.

84.Safi Kaskas 2024: He came to his Lord with a faultless heart

85.Safi Kaskas 2024: and said to his father and his people, "What are you worshiping?

86.Safi Kaskas 2024: Are you fooling yourselves by choosing false gods other than God?

87.Safi Kaskas 2024: What do you think about the Lord of the worlds?"

88.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then he took a look at the stars

89.Safi Kaskas 2024: and said, "I am sick [of you worshipping these] "

90.Safi Kaskas 2024: so they turned away from him and left.

91.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then he turned to their gods and said, "Will you not eat?

92.Safi Kaskas 2024: What is wrong with you that you do not speak?"

93.Safi Kaskas 2024: And he turned on them, striking them with his right hand.

94.Safi Kaskas 2024: His people came rushing back to him.

95.Safi Kaskas 2024: He said, "How can you worship that which you [yourselves] carve,

96.Safi Kaskas 2024: while God created you and everything you do?"

97.Safi Kaskas 2024: They said, "Construct a furnace and throw him into the burning fire."

98.Safi Kaskas 2024: They plotted against him, but We humiliated them.

99.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Abraham] said, “I will go away to my Lord. He will guide me.

100.Safi Kaskas 2024: My Lord, grant me a righteous son."

101.Safi Kaskas 2024: So We gave him the good news of a gentle boy.

102.Safi Kaskas 2024: And when [the boy] was old enough to work with him, he said, "My son, I have seen in a dream that I [must] sacrifice you, so see what you think." He said, "My father, do as you are ordered. You will find me, God willing, patient."

103.Safi Kaskas 2024: But as soon as they had both submitted to [what they thought to be] God’s will, and [Abraham] had laid [his son] down on the side of his face,

105.Safi Kaskas 2024: you have fulfilled the vision." This is how we reward those who do good.

106.Safi Kaskas 2024: This was clearly a grave trial

107.Safi Kaskas 2024: and We ransomed him with a great sacrifice

108.Safi Kaskas 2024: and We left the later generations saying of him:

110.Safi Kaskas 2024: This is how we reward those who do good

111.Safi Kaskas 2024: for [Abraham] was among Our believing worshipers.

112.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then We gave him the good news of Isaac, a prophet from among the righteous

113.Safi Kaskas 2024: and We blessed him and Isaac. Among their descendants are doers of good and those who clearly wrong themselves.

114.Safi Kaskas 2024: We indeed showed great kindness to Moses and Aaron.

115.Safi Kaskas 2024: We saved them and their people from a terrible predicament

116.Safi Kaskas 2024: and We supported them so that they prevailed

117.Safi Kaskas 2024: We gave them the clarifying Book

118.Safi Kaskas 2024: and We guided them on the straight path

119.Safi Kaskas 2024: and We left the later generations saying of them:

120.Safi Kaskas 2024: Peace be upon Moses and Aaron.

121.Safi Kaskas 2024: This is how We reward those who do good

122.Safi Kaskas 2024: for they were among Our believing worshipers.

123.Safi Kaskas 2024: Elijah was indeed one of the messengers.

124.Safi Kaskas 2024: When he said to his people, "Won't you be mindful of God?

125.Safi Kaskas 2024: Do you call upon Baal and leave the best of creators,

126.Safi Kaskas 2024: God, your Lord and the Lord of your forefathers?"

127.Safi Kaskas 2024: But they denied him, so they will be brought [for punishment],

129.Safi Kaskas 2024: We left the later generations saying of him:

130.Safi Kaskas 2024: Peace be upon the House of Elijah.

131.Safi Kaskas 2024: This how We reward those who do good

132.Safi Kaskas 2024: for he was among Our believing worshipers.

133.Safi Kaskas 2024: Lot was indeed one of the messengers.

134.Safi Kaskas 2024: We saved him and all of his family

135.Safi Kaskas 2024: except an old woman who stayed behind.

138.Safi Kaskas 2024: and night, so will you not use your reason?

139.Safi Kaskas 2024: Jonah was one of the messengers.

140.Safi Kaskas 2024: He ran away to a loaded ship,

141.Safi Kaskas 2024: but they cast lots, and he lost,

142.Safi Kaskas 2024: [so they threw him into the sea], and a wale gulped him, for He was blameworthy.

143.Safi Kaskas 2024: And had he not been one of those who glorify God’s limitless glory

144.Safi Kaskas 2024: he would have remained inside its belly until the Day they are resurrected.

145.Safi Kaskas 2024: But We cast him, ill, on an open shore,

146.Safi Kaskas 2024: and We made a gourd vine to grow over him

147.Safi Kaskas 2024: and We sent him to a hundred thousand people or more.

148.Safi Kaskas 2024: They believed, so We let them enjoy their life.

149.Safi Kaskas 2024: So [Prophet] inquire [of the idolaters], "Why do they think their Lord has daughters while they have sons”?

150.Safi Kaskas 2024: Or, maybe they witnessed the creation of the angels as females?"

151.Safi Kaskas 2024: No indeed, It is out of their [invented] falsehood that they say

152.Safi Kaskas 2024: "God has begotten," and they are liars.

153.Safi Kaskas 2024: Has He chosen daughters over sons?

154.Safi Kaskas 2024: What is [wrong] with you? How do you reach your judgments?

155.Safi Kaskas 2024: Will you not be reminded [of the warning against such thinking]?

156.Safi Kaskas 2024: Or do you have a clear authority [for what you allege]?

157.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then, produce your Book if you are truthful.

158.Safi Kaskas 2024: They also claimed a lineage between Him and the jinns, but the jinns know that they will be brought before Him for [judgment].

159.Safi Kaskas 2024: May God be exalted in His glory above all they describe

160.Safi Kaskas 2024: except for God’s devout worshipers [who don't make such claims].

161.Safi Kaskas 2024: So you [who deny the truth] and whatever you worship,

163.Safi Kaskas 2024: except for him who will burn in Hell.

164.Safi Kaskas 2024: [All of God’s creations will say], "Among us, too, there is none but has a known place.

166.Safi Kaskas 2024: and we are those who glorify God."

168.Safi Kaskas 2024: "If only we had a message from those who lived before us,

169.Safi Kaskas 2024: we would have been faithful worshipers of God."

170.Safi Kaskas 2024: But they rejected the message, so they will soon realize [the consequences].

171.Safi Kaskas 2024: Our word has already been given to Our worshiping Messengers

173.Safi Kaskas 2024: and [that] Our soldiers will be those who overcome.

174.Safi Kaskas 2024: So [Prophet], leave them for a time.

175.Safi Kaskas 2024: And watch them, for they will soon see.

176.Safi Kaskas 2024: Do they really want to hasten Our punishment?

177.Safi Kaskas 2024: When it descends on them, how terrible will that morning be for those who were warned?

179.Safi Kaskas 2024: and watch them, for they will soon see.

180.Safi Kaskas 2024: May your Lord, the Lord of Reverance, be exalted in His glory above all they describe.

181.Safi Kaskas 2024: And Peace be on the Messengers,

182.Safi Kaskas 2024: and praise be to God, Lord of the worlds.

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: Saad, by the Qur’an, full of all we ought to remember.

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: The unbelievers are full of arrogance and dissent.

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: How many generations have We destroyed before them (for the same sins)? They called out (to Us), but it was too late to escape.

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: They are surprised that one of their own has come out to warn them, so those who want to deny the truth are saying, "This is a magician and a liar.”

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: How can he claim that the gods are [only] one God? This is a strange thing."

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: Their leaders went off, saying, "Walk away and be faithful to your gods. This is what you must do.

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have not heard of this in the latest religion. This must be an invention.

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: How can the message be revealed to him alone out of all of us?” In fact, they are in doubt about My message. In fact, they have not yet tasted My punishment.

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: Or do They have the stores of your Lord’s mercy, the Revered, the Ever-Giving?

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: Or is theirs the dominion of the heavens and the Earth, and what is between them? Then let them ascend through any means of access.

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: [They are only] soldiers [who will be] defeated regardless of what alliance they have.

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: The people of Noah denied [My messages] before them, as did [the tribe of] Aad, Pharaoh-the owner of [many] tent-poles-

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: [the tribe of] Thamud, the people of Lot, the woods-dwellers: those were the parties,

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: each of whom rejected the messengers, so My punishment was justified.

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: And these, too, [who now deny the truth] are only awaiting a single blast, which will not be stopped.

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: And they say, "Our Lord, hasten for us our share [of the punishment] before the Day of Account"

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: Be patient over what they say, and remember Our servant, David, the possessor of strength; he was one who repeatedly turned back [to Us].

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: We subjected the mountains to join him in praising Our limitless glory in the evening and daybreak,

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: and the birds to assemble, all repeating [praises] with him.

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: And We strengthened his kingdom and gave him wisdom and keen judgment.

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: And has the story come to you of the disputants who climbed over the wall of [his] prayer chamber?

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: When they entered upon David, he was alarmed, [but] they said, "Do not be afraid. [We are] two disputants. One of us has wronged the other, so judge between us with truth, and do not be unjust, and guide us to the right way.

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: This is my brother. He has ninety-nine ewes, and I have one ewe, so he said, 'Entrust it to me,' and got the better of me with his words."

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: [David] said, "He has certainly wronged you in demanding that your ewe be added to his ewes. And many business associates oppress one another, except for those who believe and do righteous deeds, and they are few.” David then realized that We had been testing him, and he asked forgiveness of his Lord, and fell down bowing [in prostration], and turned [to God] in repentance,

25.Safi Kaskas 2024: so We forgave him, and, he has nearness to Us, and a good place in the Hereafter.

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: [We said], "David, We have made you a steward over this land, so judge between the people in truth and do not follow [your own] whim, as it will lead you away from the way of God.” Those who wander away from His path will have a severe punishment for having forgotten the Day of Account.

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have not created heaven and Earth and all that lies between them without meaning and purpose. That is the assumption of the unbelievers. How terrible the fire will be for the unbelievers.

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: Would we treat those who believe and do righteous deeds like those who spread corruption on Earth? Or would We treat those who are mindful of God like the wicked?

29.Safi Kaskas 2024: This is a blessed Book, which We have revealed to you so that they may reflect upon its verses and that those of understanding would be reminded.

30.Safi Kaskas 2024: And to David, We gave Solomon, an excellent servant. He repeatedly turned back [to Us].

31.Safi Kaskas 2024: When well-bred, swift horses were paraded before him at dusk,

32.Safi Kaskas 2024: he said, "I love to love good things out of remembrance of my Lord,” [and when] the horses disappeared into the distance,

33.Safi Kaskas 2024: he would say, "Bring them back to me," and stroke their legs and necks.

34.Safi Kaskas 2024: But [previously], We had indeed tested Solomon [by] placing a lifeless body on his throne, he then turned toward us

35.Safi Kaskas 2024: and prayed, "My Lord, forgive me, and grant me a kingdom the like of which will not belong to anyone after me. You are the Ever Giving."

36.Safi Kaskas 2024: So We gave him power over the wind, to direct it to softly blow wherever he wished,

37.Safi Kaskas 2024: and over the devils, every kind of builder and diver

38.Safi Kaskas 2024: and over others bound in shackles.

39.Safi Kaskas 2024: [We said], "This is Our gift, [for you to] give or withhold without [rendering any] account."

40.Safi Kaskas 2024: He is closed to Us and [has] a good place in the Hereafter.

41.Safi Kaskas 2024: And remember Our servant Job, when he called to his Lord, "Satan has afflicted me with hardship and suffering."

42.Safi Kaskas 2024: [So he was told], "Strike [the ground] with your foot; here is a [spring for] a cool bath and a drink.”

43.Safi Kaskas 2024: And We restored his family, and their like with them; as a mercy from Us and a reminder for those of understanding.

44.Safi Kaskas 2024: [We said], "And take in your hand a bunch of grass and strike with it, and do not break your oath." We found him patient, an excellent servant, one who repeatedly turned back [to Us].

45.Safi Kaskas 2024: And remember Our servants Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob, men of true strength and vision,

46.Safi Kaskas 2024: for We purified them with the purest quality-remembrance of the [Hereafter],

47.Safi Kaskas 2024: and [in our sight] they are among the chosen and the virtuous.

48.Safi Kaskas 2024: And remember Ishmael, Elisha, and Dhul-Kifl, for they are all among the truly exceptional.

49.Safi Kaskas 2024: This is a reminder, for, verily those who are mindful of God will have the most rewarding place of return,

50.Safi Kaskas 2024: Gardens of Eden, whose gates will open to them,

51.Safi Kaskas 2024: where they will recline, calling for abundant fruit and drink,

52.Safi Kaskas 2024: having beside them well-matched mates of modest gaze.

53.Safi Kaskas 2024: This is what you are promised for the Day of Account.

54.Safi Kaskas 2024: This is Our provision, which will never run out.

55.Safi Kaskas 2024: But, truly, for the transgressors is an evil place of return-

56.Safi Kaskas 2024: Hell, where they will burn. What an evil resting place!

57.Safi Kaskas 2024: This! So let them taste boiling water and [foul] pus-

58.Safi Kaskas 2024: and other such punishments.

59.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Its inhabitants will say], "This is a crowd [of people] rushing into where you are. No welcome for them. They will burn in the Fire."

60.Safi Kaskas 2024: They will say, "Nor you! No welcome for you. You, [our leaders], brought this upon us; what an evil place to settle!

61.Safi Kaskas 2024: They will say, Our Lord, whoever brought this upon us, double his punishment in the Fire,"

62.Safi Kaskas 2024: and they will wonder, "Why we do not see men whom we used to count among the worst,

63.Safi Kaskas 2024: whom we used to mock? Did our eyes miss them?"

64.Safi Kaskas 2024: This is how it will really be, the bickering of the people of the Fire.

65.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say [Prophet], "I am only here to give a warning, and there is no god but God, the One, the All- Conquering,

66.Safi Kaskas 2024: Lord of the heavens and the Earth and whatever is between them, the Revered, the Ever-Forgiving."

67.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "It is tremendous news,

68.Safi Kaskas 2024: yet you ignore it.

69.Safi Kaskas 2024: I had no knowledge of what those on high bicker about,

70.Safi Kaskas 2024: had it not been revealed to me. However, I am but a clear warner."

71.Safi Kaskas 2024: [So mention] when your Lord said to the angels, " I am going to create a human being from clay,

72.Safi Kaskas 2024: and when I have proportioned him and breathed of My Spirit into him, then prostrate yourselves to him."

73.Safi Kaskas 2024: The angels prostrated, all of them together

74.Safi Kaskas 2024: except Iblīs; he was arrogant and became a [rebel] who denied the truth.

75.Safi Kaskas 2024: [God] said, "Iblīs, what prevented you from prostrating yourself to whom I created with My hands? Is it your arrogance, or do you think that you are so high above all others?"

76.Safi Kaskas 2024: He said, “I am better than him. You created me from fire and created him from clay.”

77.Safi Kaskas 2024: [God] said, "Then be gone, you are expelled,

78.Safi Kaskas 2024: and My curse will follow you until the Day of Judgment."

79.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Iblīs ] said, "My Lord, reprieve me until the Day they are resurrected."

80.Safi Kaskas 2024: [God] said, "You are reprieved

81.Safi Kaskas 2024: until the Day of the time well-known."

82.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Iblīs] said, "By your reverence, I will mislead them all,

83.Safi Kaskas 2024: except for Your devoted worshipers among them."

84.Safi Kaskas 2024: [God] said, "This is the Truth, and the Truth do I speak:

85.Safi Kaskas 2024: I will fill Hell with you and those of them that follow you, all of you together."

86.Safi Kaskas 2024: SAY: " I ask from you no reward for this [message], and I am not one of those who claim to be what they are not.

87.Safi Kaskas 2024: This is no less than a reminder to all the worlds,

88.Safi Kaskas 2024: and you will come to grasp its significance in the fullness of time!"

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: This Book is sent down to you from God, the Revered, the Wise.

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have sent down the Book to you in truth, so worship God, sincere in your faith in Him alone.

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: Pure faith is owed to God alone. Those who take protectors besides Him [say], "We worship them only so that they may bring us nearer to God." God will judge them concerning their differences. God does not guide any liar and denier of the truth.

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: If God had intended to take a son, He could have chosen anyone He willed from whatever He created; may He be exalted in His glory! He is God, the One God, the One who holds absolute sway over all that exists.

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: He created the heavens and Earth in Truth. He wraps the night over the day and wraps the day over the night, and has made the sun and the moon subservient [to His laws], each running [its course] for an appointed time. He is the Revered, the Ever-Forgiving.

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: He created you from a single soul, from which He made its mate, and He gave you eight kinds of grazing livestock in pairs [male and female]. He creates you in your mothers’ wombs, one creation after another, within threefold of darkness. That is God, your Lord; to Him belongs all Sovereignty. There is no deity except Him, so how can you lose sight of the truth?

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: If you deny the truth, God has no need for you. Yet He does not approve of ingratitude in His servants, but if you do show gratitude, He welcomes it in you. No bearer of burdens will bear the burdens of another. Then you will return to your Lord, and He will inform you of what you have done. He knows what is within your hearts.

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: When a human being encounters some hard times, he calls upon his Lord, turning to Him [in repentance], but when He blesses him with His favors, he forgets his Lord whom he called before, and he sets up equals to God in order to mislead others from His way. Say, "Enjoy your unbelief for a little, for you are included among the inhabitants of the Fire."

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: Is one who worships devoutly during periods of the night-bowing down and standing [in prayer], being mindful of the Hereafter, and hoping for his Lord’s mercy-[like one who does not]? Say, "Are those who know equal to those who do not know?" Only those who have understanding will keep this in mind.

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "O My worshipers who have believed, be ever mindful of your Lord. Good [reward] awaits those who persevere in doing good in this world. [Remember that] God’s Earth is spacious. They who are patient will be given their reward beyond all account."

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "I have been commanded to worship God, dedicating my faith to Him.

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: And I have been commanded to be the first [among you] to submit."

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say," I fear the punishment of a terrible Day should I disobey my Lord."

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "God [alone] do I worship, sincere to Him in my faith,

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: so worship what you will besides Him." Say, "Truly doomed are the ones who will lose themselves and their families on the Day of Resurrection. Truly, that is a self-evident loss."

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: They will have curtains of fire above them and below them. With this, God puts fear into His worshipers. So be ever mindful of Me, My worshipers.

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those who have avoided the worship of false deities and turned toward God will have good news, so give good news to My worshipers

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: who listen to what is said and follow what is best. Those are the ones God has guided, and those are the people endowed with insight.

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: As for one who deserved the decree of punishment, can you [Prophet] save one who is already in the Fire?

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: But those who are mindful of their Lord, for them are dwellings built one above the other, beneath which rivers flow. [This is] God’s promise and God does not fail to deliver [His] promise.

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: Do you not see that God sends down rain from the sky and guides it through the Earth to flow as springs? Then with it, He produces vegetation of varying colors, which later withers, and you see it turning yellow, then He turns it into waste. That is a reminder for those endowed with insight.

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: Is one whose heart God has opened to submit to Him and who has received enlightenment from his Lord [like one whose heart rejects God]? Misery, then, to those whose hearts are hardened even more by the mention of God. They are clearly lost.

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: God has sent down the best of narrations: a Book that is perfectly consistent within itself, repeating various statements [of the Truth] in ways that cause the skin of those who revere their Lord to shiver [in awe], after which their skin and their hearts soften at the mention of God. Such is God’s guidance; He guides with it [the Qur’an] whoever is willing to be guided, but no one can guide those God leaves to stray.

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: What about someone who shields his face against the worst of punishment on the Day of Resurrection [is he like one secure from it]? [On that day] it will be said to the unjust, "Taste what you have earned."

25.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those before them also denied the truth, and punishment came upon them before they realize what is happening.

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: God made them taste disgrace in this worldly life, but the punishment of the Hereafter is greater if they only knew.

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have cited in this Qur’an every [kind of] example for people so that they might remember.

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: [It is] an Arabic Qur’an, without any distortion, so that they might become mindful.

29.Safi Kaskas 2024: [To this end], God presents an example: [consider] a man owned by quarreling partners, and another [who is] devoted exclusively to one master, are they considered equal in status? All praise be to God! But most of them do not know.

30.Safi Kaskas 2024: You will die, and they will die.

31.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then, on the Day of Resurrection, you will dispute with each other before your Lord.

32.Safi Kaskas 2024: So who is more unjust than one who invents lies about God and denies the truth when it has come to him? Is there not [enough] room in Hell for the unbelievers?

33.Safi Kaskas 2024: He who promotes the truth and he who testifies to it, it is they who are mindful of God.

34.Safi Kaskas 2024: They will have with their Lord whatever they desire. This is the reward for those who do good;

35.Safi Kaskas 2024: that God may remove from them the worst of their deeds and reward them according to the best of what they have done.

36.Safi Kaskas 2024: Is not God adequately sufficient for His worshiper? [Yet], they threaten you with others beside Him. If God allows someone to be lost, for him, there is no guide

37.Safi Kaskas 2024: and whomever God guides, no one can mislead him. Is not God revered and capable of retribution?

38.Safi Kaskas 2024: If you asked them, "Who created the heavens and the Earth?" They would say, "God." So say, "Then do you see those you pray to besides God? If God wishes to harm me, can they remove His harm, or if He wants to show me a blessing, can they withhold His blessing?" Say, "God suffices for me; all those who truly trust put their trust in Him."

39.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "My people, do all you can, and so will I. Eventually, you will know

40.Safi Kaskas 2024: who will receive a shameful punishment, and on whom will fall a lasting punishment."

41.Safi Kaskas 2024: We sent down to you the Book offering the Truth to humankind. So whoever is guided, it is for his own good; and he who strays only does so to his own detriment. You are not their guardian.

42.Safi Kaskas 2024: God retrieves people’s souls at the time of their death and the souls of the living during their sleep. He then keeps those for which He has decreed death and releases the others until an appointed term. There are signs in this for people who reflect.

43.Safi Kaskas 2024: Or have they taken intercessors besides God? Say, "Even though they do not have any power, nor do they reason?"
