44.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "To God belongs all intercession. To Him belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the Earth. Then to Him you will all return."

45.Safi Kaskas 2024: The hearts of those who do not believe in the Hereafter shrink with disgust when God alone is mentioned, but when those other than Him are mentioned, they suddenly rejoice.

46.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "Our God, the Programmer of the heavens and the Earth, Knower of all that is beyond our ability to witness and all that we can witness, You will judge between your worshipers concerning their differences."

47.Safi Kaskas 2024: If the unjust owned everything on Earth twice over, they would gladly offer it to ransom themselves from the terrible suffering on the Day of Resurrection, but there will appear to them from God what they never expected.

48.Safi Kaskas 2024: The evils of their deeds will become clear to them, and they will be surrounded by what they used to ridicule.

49.Safi Kaskas 2024: If hard times touch man, he calls on Us. Then, when We favor him with Our blessing, he says, "I have been given this only because of my knowledge." In fact, it is only a test, though most of them do not know.

50.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those [who lived] before them said [the same thing], but what they had earned did not do them any good

51.Safi Kaskas 2024: for the evil of their deeds caught up with them. [Similarly,] the evil deeds of those who have wronged themselves among these people will also catch up with them, and they will not be able to evade God.

52.Safi Kaskas 2024: Do they not know that God expands and restricts His provision for whomever He wills? In this are signs for a People who believe.

53.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "My worshipers who have transgressed against themselves do not despair of God’s mercy, for God forgives all transgressions. He is the Ever-Forgiving, the Mercy-Giver."

54.Safi Kaskas 2024: Turn in repentance to your Lord and submit to Him before the punishment comes upon you and you cannot be helped.

55.Safi Kaskas 2024: Follow the best teaching sent down to you from your Lord before the punishment comes upon you suddenly, when you are not expecting it,

56.Safi Kaskas 2024: so that a soul may not say, " How sorry I am for having neglected my duty to God and having been among the mockers;"

57.Safi Kaskas 2024: or say, "Had God guided me, I would have been among those who are mindful of God;"

58.Safi Kaskas 2024: or say, when it sees the punishment, "If only I had another chance to be among those who do good.”

59.Safi Kaskas 2024: [But God will reply] “No! My verses did come to you, but you denied them, turned arrogant, and denied the truth.

60.Safi Kaskas 2024: On the Day of Resurrection, you will see those who lied about God with their faces gloomy [by grief and sorrow]. Is not Hell the proper place for the arrogant?

61.Safi Kaskas 2024: God will save those who were mindful of Him by virtue of their successful choices; no harm will touch them, nor will they grieve.

62.Safi Kaskas 2024: God is the Creator of all things, and He is the Guardian over all things.

63.Safi Kaskas 2024: The keys of the heavens and the Earth are His. Those who reject the verses of God, it is they who are doomed.

64.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "Do you order me to worship something other than God, you ignorant people?"

65.Safi Kaskas 2024: Yet, It has already been revealed to you, and to those before you, that “If you should associate [anything] with God, your work will be in vain, and you will surely be among the doomed.

66.Safi Kaskas 2024: Rather, Worship God, and be among the grateful.”

67.Safi Kaskas 2024: [The unbelievers] have not valued God the way He ought to be valued. The whole Earth will lie within His grasp on the Day of Resurrection, while heaven will be folded up in His right hand. May He be exalted in His glory, high above anything they associate with Him.

68.Safi Kaskas 2024: The Horn will be blown, and whoever is in the heavens and the Earth will be stunned, except whom God wills. Then it will be blown again, and they will stand, looking on.

69.Safi Kaskas 2024: And the Earth will shine with the light of its Lord. The Book will be set in place, and the prophets and the witnesses will be brought in. Judgment will be passed among them equitably, and they will not be wronged.

70.Safi Kaskas 2024: Every soul will be fully compensated [for] what it has done, for He knows best what they do.

71.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those who denied the truth will be driven to Hell in crowds. When they reach it, its gates will open, and its custodians will say, “Did messengers not come to you from among yourselves, reciting to you the verses of your Lord, and warning you of the meeting of this Day of yours?" They will say, "Yes, but the decree of punishment is justified against the unbelievers.

72.Safi Kaskas 2024: They will be told, "Enter the gates of Hell and stay there eternally. How evil is the residence of the arrogant."

73.Safi Kaskas 2024: But those who were mindful of their Lord will be driven to Paradise in crowds. When they reach it, its gates will open, and custodians will say, "Peace be upon you; you have done well, so enter it to reside there eternally."

74.Safi Kaskas 2024: And they will say, "Praise be to God, who has fulfilled His promise to us and made us inherit the land, letting us settle in Paradise wherever we will. How excellent is the reward for those who act on their faith."

75.Safi Kaskas 2024: You will see the angels hovering around the Throne of His majesty, glorifying their Lord with praise. It will be judged between them equitably, and it will be said, "All praise be to God, Lord of the worlds ."

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: In the Name of God, the Merciful-to-all, the Mercy Giver: Ha Meem,

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: the revelation of the Book is from God, the Revered, the All-knowing.

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: Forgiver of transgression, Acceptor of repentance, Severe in punishment and Infinite in favor, there is no god except Him, and to Him is the ultimate return.

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: No one argues about God’s signs except the unbelievers, so do not be deceived by their freedom to move around in the land.

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: Before them, the people of Noah rejected the truth, as did the parties after them. Every nation plotted to destroy their messenger and argued to defeat truth with falsehood. So, I seized them. What a punishment it was.

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: In this way, your Lord’s sentence was passed against those who denied the truth, that they would be the inhabitants of the Fire.

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those who carry the Throne of His majesty, and those around it, praise their Lord’s limitless glory, and believe in Him, and ask forgiveness for the believers, [saying], "Our Lord, Your mercy and knowledge have encompassed all things, so forgive those who repent and follow Your path, and spare them from the punishment of Hell.

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: Our Lord, admit them to Gardens of Eden, which You have promised them, together with the righteous among their fathers, their spouses, and their offspring. You are the Revered, the Wise.

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: And guide them away [from committing] evil deeds. You would be Merciful that Day to anyone you have guided away [from committing] evil deeds, and that is the supreme triumph."

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: The unbelievers will be told [on that same day], “When you were called to believe and rejected it, God’s disgust with you was even greater than the self-disgust you now feel.”

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: They will say, "Our Lord, twice You caused us to die, and twice You gave us life. We now admit our transgressions. Is there possibly a way out?"

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: [They will be told] "That is because, when God alone was called upon, you denied Him, but when others were associated with Him, you believed. Judgment belongs to God, the Exalted, the Great."

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is He who shows you His signs and sends down provisions from the sky to sustain you, but only the one who turns to God will take heed

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: so call upon God and dedicate your faith sincerely to Him, even though it is resented by unbelievers.

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: He is high above [all] ranks, the Lord of the Throne. He confers the Spirit by His command on whomever He wills of His worshipers to warn of the Day when they will meet Him.

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: The Day they will emerge when nothing about them is concealed from God. “To whom belongs [all] sovereignty this Day?” “To God, the One, the All-Conquering.”

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: This Day every soul will be rewarded for what it earned. There will be no injustice today, for God is swift to settle accounts.

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: And warn them of the Imminent Day, when the hearts are at the throats, choking them. The unjust will have no dependable friend and no intercessor [who is] obeyed.

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: God knows the eyes’ deceptive glances and what the hearts conceal.

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: God judges with Truth, while those besides Him whom they invoke will not judge with anything at all. It is God who is the All-Hearing, the All-Seeing.

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: Have they not traveled through the land and seen the fate of those [who lived] before them? They were mightier than they are, and they left more impact on the land, but God seized them for their transgressions, and they had no protector from God.

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: This is because they repeatedly rejected the self-evident signs their messengers brought them, so God seized them. He is All-Strong and severe in punishment.

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: We sent Moses with Our signs and a clear authority

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: to Pharaoh, Haman, and Korah, but they said, "[He is] a lying magician."

25.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then, when he brought them the Truth from Us, they said, "Kill the sons of those who have believed with him and spare the women." But the schemes of the unbelievers can only fail.

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: Pharaoh said, "Let me kill Moses and let him appeal to his Lord. I fear that he may change your religion or spread disorder in the land."

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: But Moses said, "I have sought refuge in my Lord and yours from every arrogant tyrant who does not believe in the Day of Reckoning."

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: A believing man from Pharaoh’s family, who concealed his faith, said, "Are you going to kill a man [merely] because he says, 'My Lord is God, 'when he has brought you clear signs from your Lord? If he is lying, then the consequence of his lie will be on him, but if he is truthful, then some of what he promises you will happen to you. God does not guide the blatant liars.

29.Safi Kaskas 2024: My people, you reign today, masters in the land, but who will protect us from God’s mighty punishment if it should come to us?" Pharaoh said, "I show you only what I see, and I am guiding you along the right path."

30.Safi Kaskas 2024: But the believer said, "My people, I fear for you a day as befell the parties [who opposed their messengers],

31.Safi Kaskas 2024: Like what happened to Noah’s people, Aad and Thamud and those after them. God does not want any injustice for His worshipers.

32.Safi Kaskas 2024: My people, I fear for you the Day of Calling

33.Safi Kaskas 2024: the Day when you will turn away, hoping to flee, with no one to protect you from God. Whomever God allows to stray has no guide.

34.Safi Kaskas 2024: Joseph had already come to you with clear evidence, but you never stopped doubting what he brought to you until, when he perished, you said, ‘God will never send a messenger after him.' This is how God lets those who never cease doubting stray."

35.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those who argue about God’s revelations without having been given authority are doing something despised by God and by those who believe. This is how God seals up the heart of every arrogant tyrant.

36.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Then] Pharaoh said, "Haman, build me a tower that I may gain means of access,

37.Safi Kaskas 2024: access to the heavens, so that I may have a look at this god of Moses, though I think he is a liar." This is how Pharaoh’s evil deeds were made to appear good to him, and he was diverted from the [right] way. Pharaoh’s scheming led to nothing but ruin.

38.Safi Kaskas 2024: But he who believed said, "My people, follow me, I will guide you through the correct path.

39.Safi Kaskas 2024: My people, this worldly life is only temporary enjoyment, but the Hereafter is the lasting home.

40.Safi Kaskas 2024: Whoever does a bad deed will be repaid with its like, but whoever does good and is a believer, whether male or female, will enter Paradise, where they will be provided for without measure.

41.Safi Kaskas 2024: My people, how is it that I call you to salvation while you call me to the Fire?

42.Safi Kaskas 2024: You call me to deny God and to associate with Him something of which I have no knowledge, whereas I call you to the Revered, the Ever-Forgiving.

43.Safi Kaskas 2024: Without a doubt, that to which you call me has no foundation either in this world or in the Hereafter, [nor is there doubt] that our return is to God, whereas those who overstate disbelieve shall inhabit the Fire.

44.Safi Kaskas 2024: You will remember what I say to you, so I entrust myself to God, for God is well aware of [His] worshipers."

45.Safi Kaskas 2024: So God protected him from the evils they plotted, while a terrible punishment encompassed Pharaoh’s clan,

46.Safi Kaskas 2024: the Fire, to which they will be exposed morning and evening. On the Day the Hour comes [it will be said], "Admit Pharaoh’s clan to the most intense punishment."

47.Safi Kaskas 2024: In the Fire, they will bicker, and the meek will say to those who were arrogant, "We were your followers, so can you provide us some relief from the Fire?"

48.Safi Kaskas 2024: But those who were arrogant will say, "We are all in it together. God has judged between the worshipers."

49.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those in the Fire will say to the keepers of Hell, "Pray to your Lord to lighten our punishment for a day."

50.Safi Kaskas 2024: [The keepers] will say, "Did not your messengers come to you with clear evidence?" They will say, "Yes." [The keepers] will reply, "Then pray [yourselves], but the prayers of the unbelievers will always be in vain."

51.Safi Kaskas 2024: We will surely support Our Messengers and those who believe during this life; and, on the Day when the witnesses arise-

52.Safi Kaskas 2024: The Day when excuses will not benefit the unjust- they will be rejected, and they will have the worst of homes.

53.Safi Kaskas 2024: We gave Moses the guidance, and We made the Children of Israel heirs to the Book

54.Safi Kaskas 2024: as guidance and a reminder for those with understanding.

55.Safi Kaskas 2024: Be patient, for God’s promise is true. And ask forgiveness for your transgression, and glorify your Lord with praise evening and morning.

56.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those who dispute God’s revelations without any authority to do so have nothing within their hearts except arrogance, which they will never be able to satisfy, so seek refuge in God, for He is the All-Hearing, the All-Seeing.

57.Safi Kaskas 2024: The creation of the heavens and Earth is far greater than the creation of human beings, but most people do not know.

58.Safi Kaskas 2024: The blind and the seeing are not the same, nor are those who believe and do good deeds equal to the evildoers. How seldom you reflect.

59.Safi Kaskas 2024: The Hour is sure to come, there is no doubt about it, but most people do not believe.

60.Safi Kaskas 2024: Your Lord says, "Call upon Me, I will answer you, but those who are too proud to worship Me will enter Hell, humiliated.”

61.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is God who made the night for you so that you may rest, and the day [so that you may] see. God is truly gracious to people, but most people are not thankful.

62.Safi Kaskas 2024: Such is God, your Lord, Creator of all things. There is no God but Him, so how can you be so misled?

63.Safi Kaskas 2024: Thus it is those who reject God’s signs that are misled.

64.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is God who made the Earth for you to settle and heaven as a canopy. He designed you, and perfected your design, and provided you with wholesome things. Such is God, your Lord, so blessed be God, Lord of the worlds.

65.Safi Kaskas 2024: He is the Ever-Living. There is no God except Him, so call on Him, making your faith sincerely His. Praise be to God, Lord of the worlds.

66.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "Now that clear evidence has come to me from my Lord, I have been prohibited from worshiping those you call upon besides God, and I am commanded to submit to the Lord of the worlds.”

67.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is He who created you from dust, then from a fertilized ovum, then from a clinging leech-like; then He brings you out as infants; then He allows you to reach maturity; and then you become elderly, although some of you die sooner-so that you may reach a predetermined age, and perhaps you may understand.

68.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is He who gives life and death; when He decides on a thing, He simply says, "Be," and It is.

69.Safi Kaskas 2024: Do you not see how misled are those who dispute God’s signs,

70.Safi Kaskas 2024: those who deny the Book and the messages We sent with Our Messengers? They will surely come to know,

71.Safi Kaskas 2024: when they have shackles and chains around their necks, and are dragged

72.Safi Kaskas 2024: in boiling water, and are then thrown into the fire, where they will be consumed.

73.Safi Kaskas 2024: It will then be said to them, "Where are those [associates] whom you used to consider divine

74.Safi Kaskas 2024: other than God?" They will say, "They have departed from us; or, rather, those we used to call upon proved to be nothing. [They will be told,] "This is how God let those who deny the truth stray,

75.Safi Kaskas 2024: all because you used to rejoice on Earth in things other than the truth, and you were full of vanity.

76.Safi Kaskas 2024: Enter the gates of Hell, to remain there eternally, a terrible home for the arrogant."

77.Safi Kaskas 2024: So be patient, [Prophet,] for God’s promise is true. Whether We show you some of what We have promised them or We cause you to die, It is to Us that they will be returned.

78.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have sent messengers before you. Some We have told you about, and others We did not. No messenger can produce a miracle except with God’s permission. Then, when God’s command comes, just judgment will be passed, and those who followed falsehood will be lost then and there.

79.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is God who made the domestic animals, some for you to ride and some to eat.

80.Safi Kaskas 2024: You have other benefits from them as well. You can reach any destination you wish on them, and on them and on ships, you are transported.

81.Safi Kaskas 2024: And [thus] He shows you His signs. So, which of God’s signs do you deny?

82.Safi Kaskas 2024: Have they not traveled through the land and seen the fate of those who lived before them? They were more numerous than they are, and had greater power, and left more impressive marks on the land. Yet what they achieved was of no use to them.

83.Safi Kaskas 2024: When their messengers came to them with self-evident signs, they showed satisfaction with the knowledge they had, and so they were engulfed by the very punishment they had mocked.

84.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then, when they saw Our might, they said," We believe in God alone, and we reject what we used to associate with Him."

85.Safi Kaskas 2024: But believing after seeing Our might did not help them at all. This has been God’s way of dealing with His worshipers, and those who denied the truth were lost, then and there.

41.SurahEnglishNames: Explained in Detail, Revelations Well Expounded

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: Ha Meem,

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: revelations have come down to you from the Merciful-to-All, the Mercy Giver,

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: a Book whose verses have been made clear, an Arabic Qur’an for people who know,

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: giving good news and warning. Yet, most of them turn away, so they do not hear

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: and they say, "There is a barrier between our hearts and what you call us to, and there is heaviness in our ears. There is a curtain between you and us. So do whatever you want, and so shall we."

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "I am only a human like you. It has been revealed to me that your god is but One God. So be upright towards Him, and seek His forgiveness." How terrible it is for the idolaters,

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: those who do not give the purifying alms and refuse to believe in the Hereafter.

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those who believe and do good deeds will have an endless reward.

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "Do you deny the One who created the Earth in two days, and attribute equals to Him? That is the Lord of the worlds."

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: He placed firm mountains over it, and He blessed it and apportioned its provisions to all who would seek them, [all] in four days.

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: turned to the Heaven while it was smoke and said to it and to the Earth, "Come willingly or unwillingly." They said, "We come willingly."

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: He decreed that they are seven heavens in two days, and He revealed to each its mandate. And We decorated the lower heaven with lanterns and protection. Such is the design of the Revered, the All-Knowing.

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: If they turn away, say, "I had warned you of a thunderbolt like the one which struck Aad and Thamud

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: when their messengers came to them from all around them, saying, "Do not worship anyone but God.” They said, “Had our Lord willed, He would have sent down angels; therefore, we reject the message with which you were sent.”

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: As for Aad, they were arrogant in the land, opposed justice, and said, "Who could have a power greater than ours?" Did they not see that God who created them is more powerful than they? But they continued to reject Our signs,

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: so We sent a screaming wind upon them for a few miserable days to make them taste the punishment of disgrace in this worldly life; but the punishment of the Hereafter will be more humiliating, and they will not be helped.

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: As for Thamud, We guided them, but they preferred blindness over guidance, so the thunderbolt of humiliating punishment seized them, just as they deserved.

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: And We saved those who believed and were mindful of God.

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: On the Day when God’s enemies will be herded to the Fire, driven in rows,

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: until, when they have reached it, their hearing, their sight, and their skins will testify against them concerning what they were doing.

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: They will ask their skins, "Why did you testify against us?" They will say, "God, who gave a speech to everything, has given us speech; it is He Who created you the first time, and to Him, you will return.

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: You did not even try to conceal yourselves from your hearing or your sights or your skins to prevent them from testifying against you, but you assumed that God did not know much of what you were doing.

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is this thought which you assumed about your Lord that led you to ruin so that you became doomed.

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: So [even] if they are patient, the Fire will be their home, and if they plead for a favor, none will be given them,

25.Safi Kaskas 2024: [for] We had assigned them companions, who made what is before them and what was behind them seem alluring. But the sentence has already been passed against them, together with generations of jinn and men before them: they were doomed.

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: The unbelievers say, "Do not listen to this Qur’an but talk over it, so that you may prevail."

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: But We will surely cause the unbelievers to taste a severe punishment, and We will reward them according to the worst of their deeds.

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: Such is the repayment of God’s enemies, the Fire, where they will have their permanent home as payment for having disregarded Our revelations.

29.Safi Kaskas 2024: The unbelievers will say, "Our Lord, show us those jinns and men who misled us; we will trample them under our feet so that they become the lowest of the low."

30.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those who say, "Our Lord is God," and then stay consistently on the right path, the angels will descend on them and say, "Do not fear or grieve, but [rather] rejoice in the news of Paradise, which you have been promised

31.Safi Kaskas 2024: we are your allies in this life and in the Hereafter, where you will have whatever your souls desire, and you will have whatever you wish

32.Safi Kaskas 2024: as a welcoming gift from the Most Forgiving, the Mercy Giver."

33.Safi Kaskas 2024: Who speaks better than someone who calls people to God, does good deeds, and says, "I am among those who submit to God."

34.Safi Kaskas 2024: Good and evil are never equal. Repel evil with goodness, and your enemy will become like an intimate friend.

35.Safi Kaskas 2024: But, none will attain it except those who are steadfast in patience, and none will attain it except the very fortunate.

36.Safi Kaskas 2024: And when a temptation from Satan provokes you, seek refuge in God; He is the All-Hearing and the All-knowing.

37.Safi Kaskas 2024: Among His signs are the night, the day, the sun, and the moon. Do not bow down in worship to the sun, nor to the moon, but prostrate yourselves to God, Who created them, if it is Him that you worship.

38.Safi Kaskas 2024: But if they respond arrogantly, [it matters not] for those who are near your Lord praise His limitless glory by night and by day, and never grow tired.

39.Safi Kaskas 2024: Another of His signs is that you see the Earth humbly desolate, but when We send down rain on it, it quivers and swells. He who revived it will revive the dead. He has power over all things.

40.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those who distort Our verses are not hidden from Us. Does he who is thrown into the Fire fare better than he who will arrive securely on the Day of Resurrection? Do what you want; He Sees everything you do.

41.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those who reject this Reminder after it has come to them [are losers], as it is a revered Book

42.Safi Kaskas 2024: that falsehood cannot approach either openly or secretly, [one] sent down from the All-Wise and Praiseworthy.

43.Safi Kaskas 2024: Nothing has been said to you [Prophet] that was not said to the messengers before you. Your Lord is a Lord of Forgiveness, but also of a painful punishment.

44.Safi Kaskas 2024: Had We made it a Qur’an in a foreign language, they would have said, “If only its verses were made clear.” What? A [book in a] foreign language to an Arab?” Say, “It is guidance and healing for those who believe, but for those who do not believe, it is heaviness in their ears, and it is blindness for them as if they were being called from a distant place.”

45.Safi Kaskas 2024: We gave Moses the Book, but there was disagreement about it, and had it not for a prior decree from your Lord, their differences would already have been settled. But they are still suspicious and in doubt about it.

46.Safi Kaskas 2024: Whoever does good works does so for his own soul, and whoever does evil does so to its detriment. Your Lord is never unjust to His servants.

47.Safi Kaskas 2024: Knowledge of the Hour belongs solely to him; no fruit emerges from its husk, nor does a female conceive or give birth without His knowledge. On the Day when He calls out to them, "Where are My associates?" They will then say, "We admit to You, none of us witnessed any."

48.Safi Kaskas 2024: What they used to pray to before will forsake them, and they will realize that they have no escape.

49.Safi Kaskas 2024: A human being never tires of praying for good things, but when hard times afflict him, he despairs and loses hope.

50.Safi Kaskas 2024: And if We let him taste mercy from Us, after hard times have afflicted him, he will say, "This is my due, and I do not think the Hour [of Judgment] is going to come; but even if I were to be returned to my Lord, I will [surely] have the very best reward from Him." But We will inform the unbelievers of what they did, and We will make them taste an awful punishment.

51.Safi Kaskas 2024: And whenever We’re gracious to a human being, he turns away and distances himself, but when hard times touch him, he starts endless prayers.

52.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, “What if this revelation is truly from God, and you are rejecting it? Who is more misguided than he who is cut off and alienated [from God]?”

53.Safi Kaskas 2024: We will show them Our signs on the horizons and in themselves until it is clear to them that this is the Truth. Is it not sufficient that your Lord is a Witness over all things?

54.Safi Kaskas 2024: Surely, they are in doubt about meeting their Lord. Surely, He encompasses everything.

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: Ha Meem.

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: Ayn Seen Qaf,

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: thus God, the Revered, the Wise reveals to you, as He did to those before you.

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: To Him belongs everything in the heavens and everything on Earth. He is the Exalted, the Tremendous.

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: The heavens above them almost burst apart [from the awe of Him], while the angels praise their Lord’s limitless glory and ask forgiveness for those on Earth. God is indeed the Ever-Forgiving, the Mercy giver.

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: As for those who take others than Him as protectors, God is in charge of them, and you are not their keeper.

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: Thus We have revealed to you an Arabic Qur’an that you may warn this main city and all others around it and to give warning of the Day of Gathering, about which there is no doubt when some will be in the Garden and some in the Blazing Fire.

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: Had God willed, He could have made them one community. But He admits into His mercy him/her who wills (to enter). As for the unjust, they will have no protector and no helper.

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: Or do they think that they have protectors other than Him? God is the Protector, for He gives life to the dead, and He is able to do all things.

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: Whatever matters you differ about is for God to judge. Such is God, my Lord, in whom I trust, and to Him, I turn for help,

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: the Creator of the heavens and Earth who separated them and gave each a purpose. He has made mates for you from among yourselves and gave mates to the animals so that you may multiply. There is nothing like Him. He is the All-Hearing, the All-Seeing.

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: To Him belongs control of the heavens and the Earth. He provides abundantly or scarcely to whoever He wills. He is the All-knowing.

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: He has ordained for you the same faith He commanded Noah, and what We have revealed to you, and what We commanded Abraham and Moses and Jesus: “You shall uphold the faith and do not break up into factions.” Although what you are calling the idolaters to do is too hard for them. [However] God draws to Himself everyone who is willing and guides unto Himself everyone who turns to Him.

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: Yet they [the followers] split into factions, out of rivalry between them only after they came to know the truth. Judgment between them would have been pronounced were it not for a decision from your Lord to postpone it until a set time. Yet those who have inherited the Book after them are in grave doubt about it.

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: Therefore, go on inviting them and stay firm on the right path, as you have been commanded. Do not follow their whims and desires but say, "I have believed in what God has sent down of the Book, and I have been commanded to judge equitably between you. God is our Lord and your Lord. We have our deeds, and you have your deeds. Let there be no quarrel between you and us. God will bring us all together, and to Him is the ultimate return.”

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: And those who argue about God after having answered His call, their argument has no basis whatsoever with their Lord. Anger enfolds them, and a severe punishment awaits them.

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is God who has sent down the Book with the Truth and the Balance. For all you know, the Hour might be near.

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those who do not believe in it seek to hasten it, but those who believe are concerned about it, as they know it is the Truth. Unquestionably, those who question the Hour are in extreme error.

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: God is very gentle with His worshipers; He provides for whomever He wills. He is the All-Powerful, the Revered.

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: If anyone desires the harvest of the Hereafter, We will increase for him his harvest. And if he desires the harvest of this world, We will give him a share of it, but He will have no share of the Hereafter.

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: Or do they have partners who have ordained for them some faith that is not authorized by God? Were it not for [God’s] decisive word; Judgment would have been made between them. The unjust will have a painful punishment.

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: You will see the unjust worried about what they have committed, as they will have to answer for it. While those who have believed and done good deeds are in flowering meadows of the Gardens, having whatever they wish from their Lord: that is the supreme blessing.

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: This is the good news God gives to His worshipers who believe and do good deeds. Say, "I do not ask you any wage for it, except affection due to kin." Whoever does a good deed, We will increase it for him. God is Ever-Forgiving and Most Appreciative.

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: Or do they say, "He falsely claimed lies about God?" If God so willed, He could have sealed your heart, exterminated falsehood, and confirmed the Truth with His Words. He has full knowledge of what is in the hearts.

25.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is He who accepts repentance from his worshipers and forgives bad deeds; He knows what you do.

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: He answers those who have believed and done good deeds and increases for them out of His grace. But the unbelievers will have a severe punishment.

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: Were God to expand provision to His worshipers, they would have committed tyranny on Earth. But He sends down whatever He wills in due measures. He is well Acquainted and Fully Aware of His worshipers.

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is He who sends down the rain after they have lost hope and unfolds His mercy. He is the Protector, the Praiseworthy.

29.Safi Kaskas 2024: Among His signs is the creation of the heavens and Earth and the creatures He has spread throughout them: He is Able to gather them together if He so wishes.

30.Safi Kaskas 2024: Whatever disaster strikes you, It is for what your hands have done; Yet He forgives much.

31.Safi Kaskas 2024: On Earth, you will not be beyond God’s reach. You do not have any protector or helper besides God.

32.Safi Kaskas 2024: Among His Signs are ships floating like mountains through the sea.

33.Safi Kaskas 2024: If He wills, He could have settled down the winds, leaving them motionless on its surface. Surely in that are signs for every patient and grateful person.

34.Safi Kaskas 2024: Or He could destroy them for what they have earned, yet He pardons much.

35.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those who argue about Our signs know that there is no escape for them.

36.Safi Kaskas 2024: Whatever you have been given is only the provision of this life. But that which is with God is better and more enduring for those who believe and trust in their Lord;

37.Safi Kaskas 2024: those who avoid major sins and immoral acts, and even if they become angry, they will forgive;

38.Safi Kaskas 2024: and those who respond to their Lord, establish prayer, conduct their affairs by mutual consultation, and give of what We have provided for them;

39.Safi Kaskas 2024: and those who, when tyranny strikes them, they defend themselves.

40.Safi Kaskas 2024: The retribution for a bad deed is one like it, but whoever forgives and seeks reconciliation will have his reward with God. He certainly does not like those who do wrong.

41.Safi Kaskas 2024: Yet whoever defends himself after having been wronged, there is no blame on him.

42.Safi Kaskas 2024: The blame lies on those who wrong others and transgress in the land without any justification. Those will have a painful punishment.

43.Safi Kaskas 2024: As for him, who endures patiently and forgives, that is a sign of real resolve.

44.Safi Kaskas 2024: Whoever God lets go astray will have no protector apart from Him. And you will see the transgressors, when they see the punishment, saying, "Is there a way of going back?"

45.Safi Kaskas 2024: As they are exposed to the Fire, you will see them humbled from humiliation, glancing around covertly. While those who believed will say, "The losers are those who lost themselves and their kin on the Day of Resurrection.” Verily, the unjust are in an enduring punishment

46.Safi Kaskas 2024: they have no allies to support them apart from God. Anyone God lets go astray will find no way out.

47.Safi Kaskas 2024: Respond to your Lord before a Day comes from God’s judgment that cannot be turned back. You will have no refuge on that Day and no means of denial.

48.Safi Kaskas 2024: But if they turn away, We did not send you as their guardian. Your only duty is to deliver the message. When We let man taste Our mercy, he rejoices in it; but if harm afflicts him for what his hands have done, then man turns to denial.

49.Safi Kaskas 2024: The kingdom of the heavens and the Earth belongs to God. He creates what he wills. He gives daughters to whomever He wills, and He gives sons to whom He wills.

50.Safi Kaskas 2024: Or, He combines them; (giving some people) males and females, and He makes whom He wills sterile. He is All-knowing and Able to do all things.

51.Safi Kaskas 2024: God will not speak to any human being except by revelation or from behind a veil, or by sending a messenger who then reveals, by His permission, whatever He wills. He is Most High and All Wise.

52.Safi Kaskas 2024: Accordingly, We have revealed to you a Spirit of Our command. You did not know what is the Book or what faith is, but We have made it enlightenment, guiding with it whom We wish of Our worshipers. You indeed guide to a straight path

53.Safi Kaskas 2024: the path of God, to whom belongs everything that is in the heavens and Earth. Truly, all will eventually return to God.

43.SurahEnglishNames: Ornaments of Gold, Luxury, The Embellishment

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: Ha Meem,

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: by the Book that make things clear,

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have caused it to be an Arabic Qur’an that you may understand.

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is in the Source of the Book with Us, exalted and full of Wisdom.

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: Should we then withdraw the Reminder from you, because you are excessive in your rejection?

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: How many prophets We sent among the earlier people

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: and they used to ridicule every one of them.

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: We destroyed people mightier than these, and their example has gone down in history.

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: And if you ask them, "Who created the heavens and the Earth?" they would say, "They were created by the Revered, the All-knowing."

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is He who made the Earth a cradle for you and made pathways in it for you, that you might be guided.

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is He who sends down rain from the sky in measured portions; We resurrect with it a dead town back to life. Similarly, you will be brought forth.

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is He who created the pairs, all of them, and has made it possible for you to ride ships and animals

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: That you may settle on their backs and remember your Lord’s blessings when you have settled and say. "Exalted in His glory is He who subjected this to us. We on our own would not have been able to have it.

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: We will surely return to our Lord."

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: Yet they attribute to Him only some of what He has created. Man is clearly ungrateful.

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: Or has He taken daughters for himself and favored you with sons?

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: Yet when any of them is given the good news of what he attributes to the Merciful-to-all, his face darkens, and he suppresses grief;

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: what [am I to have a daughter], someone to be brought up in ornaments but cannot help in a fight?

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: Yet, they designated the angels, who are created to worship the Merciful-to-all, as females. Have they witnessed their create on? Their claim will be recorded, and they will be questioned about it.

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: They say, "If the Merciful-to-all willed it, we would not have worshipped them." But they do not know that. They are merely guessing.

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: Or have We given them a Book prior to this one, to which they are adhering?

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: No they say, but “We found our fathers following this path, and we are guided by their footsteps."

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: Similarly, every time We sent someone before you to a town to warn them, those corrupted by abundance would say, "We found our fathers following this path, and we are following in their footsteps."

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, even if I bring you better guidance than what you found your fathers following?" They reply, "We reject, what You have been sent with."

25.Safi Kaskas 2024: So we punish them; reflect then on the end of those who rejected the truth.

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: And when Abraham said to his father and his people, "I have nothing to do with what you worship

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: I worship only the One who created me and gave me purpose, He will guide me."

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: He made this as an enduring word remaining among Abraham’s descendants that they might return [to it).

29.Safi Kaskas 2024: Now, I let these people of yours [Prophet] and their forefathers have some enjoyment until the Truth and a messenger who made things clear came to them.

30.Safi Kaskas 2024: But when the Truth came to them, they said, "This is magic, and we refuse to believe it."

31.Safi Kaskas 2024: They also said, "If only this Qur’an was sent down to a great man from the two cities."

32.Safi Kaskas 2024: Is it they who distribute your Lord’s blessing? It is We who have allocated their livelihood among them in this life. We have raised some of them in rank so that some would hire others for service. But your Lord’s mercy is better than whatever they accumulate.

33.Safi Kaskas 2024: Were it not that people might become a single community, We would have provided those who deny the Merciful-to-all, silver roofs for their houses and silver stairways to ascend

34.Safi Kaskas 2024: and silver doors to their houses and furnishings on which to recline,

35.Safi Kaskas 2024: and gold ornaments. But all that is merely the possessions of this life, while the Hereafter with your Lord is for those who are mindful of Him.

36.Safi Kaskas 2024: Whoever overlooks the remembrance of the Merciful-to-all, We assign him a devil for a companion.

37.Safi Kaskas 2024: They hinder them from the path, though they think they are guided.

38.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then, when such a person comes to Us, he says [to his companion] “I wish you had been as far away from me as the east is from the west. What an evil companion."

39.Safi Kaskas 2024: Since you were both unjust, It will not benefit you today to know that you are partners in the punishment.

40.Safi Kaskas 2024: Can you make the deaf hear or guide the blind and whoever is clearly misguided?

41.Safi Kaskas 2024: Whether We take you away, We will afflict retribution on them.

42.Safi Kaskas 2024: Or, We show you what We have promised them; for We have perfect ability to control them.

43.Safi Kaskas 2024: So adhere to what is revealed to you. You are on a straight path.

44.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is a remembrance for you and your people, and you are all going to be questioned.

45.Safi Kaskas 2024: Ask those of Our messengers We sent before you; did We ever appoint any deities besides the Merciful-to-all to be worshiped?

46.Safi Kaskas 2024: We sent Moses with Our signs to Pharaoh and his inner circle. He said, "I am the Messenger of the Lord of the worlds."

47.Safi Kaskas 2024: But when he came to them with Our signs, they laughed at them.

48.Safi Kaskas 2024: Each sign We showed them was more marvelous than the previous one. So We afflicted them with punishment so that they might return.

49.Safi Kaskas 2024: They said, "Magician, pray to your Lord for us, as He has a covenant with you, and We will be guided."

50.Safi Kaskas 2024: But when We lifted the punishment from them, they broke their word.

51.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then Pharaoh called out among his people; he said, "My people, does not the kingdom of Egypt belong to me, and these rivers that flow under my feet? Do not you see?

52.Safi Kaskas 2024: Am I not better than this insignificant person who can barely make himself understood?

53.Safi Kaskas 2024: Why then are not golden bracelets placed on him, or the angels are accompanying him?"

54.Safi Kaskas 2024: He [Pharaoh] easily swayed his people, and they obeyed him. [To Us] they were disobedient people

55.Safi Kaskas 2024: but when they continued to challenge Us, We inflicted Our punishment on them and drowned them all:

56.Safi Kaskas 2024: We made them a precedent and an example for the others.

57.Safi Kaskas 2024: And when the son of Mary was given as an example, immediately your people [Prophet] loudly objected

58.Safi Kaskas 2024: and they said, "who is better our gods or him?" They cite him only for argument's sake. In fact, they are confrontational people.

59.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Jesus] was a servant whom We blessed, and We made him an example for the Children of Israel.

60.Safi Kaskas 2024: Had We so willed, We could have made you into angels succeeding one another on Earth.

61.Safi Kaskas 2024: He [Jesus] is a [sign for] knowledge of the Hour, so have no doubt about it, and follow Me. This is a straight path.

62.Safi Kaskas 2024: Never let Satan divert you. He is a clear enemy to you all.

63.Safi Kaskas 2024: When Jesus came with clear evidence, he said, "I have brought you Wisdom and to clarify for you some of what you differ about. Be always mindful of God and obey me.

64.Safi Kaskas 2024: God is my Lord and your Lord, so worship Him. This is a straight path."

65.Safi Kaskas 2024: But the factions differed among themselves. How terrible is the punishment of a painful Day to the unjust.

66.Safi Kaskas 2024: What are they waiting for except for the Hour to come suddenly upon them when they are not expecting it?

67.Safi Kaskas 2024: On that Day, close friends will be enemies to each other, except for those who are mindful of God

68.Safi Kaskas 2024: My worshipers, you have nothing to fear on that Day, nor will you grieve,

69.Safi Kaskas 2024: those who believed in Our revelations and were submissive.

70.Safi Kaskas 2024: Enter the Garden, you and your spouses, filled with Joy.

71.Safi Kaskas 2024: Passed among them will be plates and cups of gold. They will have whatever their soul desire and whatever delights their eyes. There you will remain forever.

72.Safi Kaskas 2024: That is the Garden which you are made to inherit because of what you have done.

73.Safi Kaskas 2024: There will be a lot of fruit for you to eat.

74.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those who force others to reject Our messages will be in the punishment of Hell forever.

75.Safi Kaskas 2024: It will not be allowed to be eased for them. In it, they will be crushed by despair.

76.Safi Kaskas 2024: We did not wrong them, but it was they who were unjust.

77.Safi Kaskas 2024: They will call, "Malik , let your Lord finish us off!" He will say, "You are staying."

78.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have given you the Truth, but most of you, hate the Truth.

79.Safi Kaskas 2024: Or have they thought up some scheme? We too have been scheming

80.Safi Kaskas 2024: Or do they think that We cannot hear their secrets and their private talk? Yes, We can, and Our messengers are with them writing it down.

81.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "If the Merciful-to-all had a son, then I would be the first to worship him."

82.Safi Kaskas 2024: Exalted is the Lord of the heavens and the Earth in His glory, Lord of the Throne, totally above what they ascribe to Him.

83.Safi Kaskas 2024: So, let them indulge in idle talk and play until they face that Day of theirs which they have been promised:

84.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is He who is God in heaven and God on Earth. He is the All-Wise, the All-Knowing.

85.Safi Kaskas 2024: And blessed is He Who has sovereignty over the heavens and the Earth and everything between them. He alone has knowledge of the Hour. You will all be returned to Him.

86.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those deities they invoke besides Him have no power of intercession; only those who testify to the Truth and have full knowledge.

87.Safi Kaskas 2024: And if you asked them who created them, they would say, "God." Why do they mislead?

88.Safi Kaskas 2024: As for his saying, "My Lord, these are people who do not believe."

89.Safi Kaskas 2024: So forgive them and talk peace. Eventually they will come to know.

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: Ha Meem,

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: by the Book that makes things clear,

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have revealed it on a Blessed Night; We have been warning.

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: On that night every matter of wisdom is made distinct.

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: A decree from Us. We have been sending messages

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: as mercy from your Lord. He is the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing.

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: The Sustainer of the heavens and the Earth and everything between them, if you only can grasp this with certainty.

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: There is no god but Him; He gives life and causes death. [He is] your Sustainer and the Sustainer of your forefathers from the beginning.

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: Yet they who lack certainty toy with their doubts.

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: So watch out for the Day when the sky will bring visible smoke

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: enveloping all people; “This is a painful punishment.”

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Then they will say], "Our Lord, lift the punishment from us, we now believe."

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: But how can this sudden remembrance benefit them? When a messenger explaining things clearly has already come to them,

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: and they turned away from him saying, "He is tutored but possessed.”

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: We will postpone the punishment for a while. But you will eventually return to us.

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: The Day when We will strike with the greatest assault, We will take retribution.

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: We had already tested Pharaoh’s people before them, when a noble messenger came to them,

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: [saying], "Hand over to me the servants of God. I am a trustworthy Messenger to you,

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: Never be arrogant with God. I come to you with clear authority.

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: I have sought refuge with my Lord and your Lord, against your condemnation.

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: If you don’t believe me, then [at least] leave me alone."

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: He then called out to his Lord that these were evil people.

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: [God said], "Then set out with My servants by night. You will be pursued.

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: Cross the sea quickly and leave it as is. They are an army to be drowned."

25.Safi Kaskas 2024: How many gardens and fountains did they leave behind?

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: And crops and noble residences

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: and that life of ease that they used to enjoy?

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: So it was; Yet We passed it on to other people to inherit.

29.Safi Kaskas 2024: Neither heaven nor Earth wept for them , nor were they given a reprieve.

30.Safi Kaskas 2024: And We saved the Children of Israel from the humiliating persecution

31.Safi Kaskas 2024: from Pharaoh. He was an arrogant transgressor.

32.Safi Kaskas 2024: And We chose them knowingly over all people

33.Safi Kaskas 2024: and We gave them many revelations, that were an obvious trial.

34.Safi Kaskas 2024: Yet these people say,

35.Safi Kaskas 2024: There is nothing but our one death, and we will not be resurrected.

36.Safi Kaskas 2024: Bring back our forefathers, if you are telling the truth."

37.Safi Kaskas 2024: Are they better than the people of Tubba‘ and those before them? We destroyed them, [for] they were among those who rejected our messages and have severed all relations to God,

38.Safi Kaskas 2024: And We did not create the heavens and Earth and everything between them to play a game.

39.Safi Kaskas 2024: We created them with the Truth [for a meaningful purpose], but most of them do not know.

40.Safi Kaskas 2024: The Day of Distinction is the appointed time for all of them.

41.Safi Kaskas 2024: The Day when a friend will not be of any use to his friend, nor will they be helped

42.Safi Kaskas 2024: except those on whom God has mercy. He is the Revered, the Mercy Giver.

43.Safi Kaskas 2024: The tree of Zaqqum

44.Safi Kaskas 2024: is food for the sinner.

45.Safi Kaskas 2024: It boils inside bellies like boiling oil,

46.Safi Kaskas 2024: like the boiling of seething water.

47.Safi Kaskas 2024: Seize him and drag him into the midst of Hell,

48.Safi Kaskas 2024: then pour scalding water over his head as punishment!’

49.Safi Kaskas 2024: Taste it, you are the revered, the noble,

50.Safi Kaskas 2024: this is what you used to dispute.

51.Safi Kaskas 2024: But those who were mindful of God will be in a safe place;

52.Safi Kaskas 2024: in the midst of Gardens and springs,

53.Safi Kaskas 2024: wearing fine silk and brocade, facing each other.

54.Safi Kaskas 2024: So it will be. And We shall pair them with Hoor Ein.

55.Safi Kaskas 2024: Safe and secure, they will call there for every kind of fruit.

56.Safi Kaskas 2024: Except for the first death, they will not taste death there. He will protect them from the punishment of Hell,

57.Safi Kaskas 2024: a grace from your Lord. That is the supreme triumph.

58.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have made this Qur’an easy to understand in your own language that they might remember.

59.Safi Kaskas 2024: So wait and watch; they are also on their watch.

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: Ha Meem, [45:01)

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: the gradual revelations of the Book are from God, the Revered, the Wise. [45:02)

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: In the heavens and Earth are Signs for the believers. [45:03)

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: And in your creation and in the creatures He scattered are Signs for people gifted with inner certainty. [45:04)

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: The alternation of night and day, the sustenance God sends down from the sky, using it to revive the Earth after its death, and the circulation of the winds are all Signs for people who use their reason. [45:05)

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: These are God’s verses, We convey them to you, setting forth the Truth. If they deny God and His verses, what message will they then believe? [45:06)

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: How terrible it is to every sinful liar [45:07)

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: who hears God’s revelations being recited to him, yet he persists with arrogance [to deny them] as if he did not hear them. So give him the news of a painful punishment awaiting him. [45:08)

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: And when he does learn some of Our verses, he ridicules them. Such people will have a humiliating punishment. [45:09)

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: Hell awaits them. Nothing they have earned will be of any use to them, nor will those they have adopted as protectors instead of God. They will have a great punishment. [45:10)

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: This is true guidance. Those who have rejected the truth of their Lord’s revelations will have a punishment of grievous pain. [45:11)

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is God who subjected the sea for you so that ships may sail with His approval and that you may seek His favor, and that you may give Him thanks. [45:12)

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: And He has subjected to you all that is in the heavens and on the Earth; a blessing from Him. There are signs in this for people who reflect.

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: Tell the believers that they should forgive those who do not anticipate the Days of God as it is He alone who will hold people accountable for what they have earned.

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: Whoever does good benefits his own soul, and whoever does evil harms his soul. Then you will all be returned to your Lord.

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: We gave the Children of Israel the Book, Wisdom and prophecy. We provided them with good things and preferred them over all people.

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: We gave them clear details of the matter [faith]. Yet, they differed out of rivalry between them, only after knowledge came to them. Your Lord will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection regarding their differences.

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then We put you on a pathway of the matter, so follow it, and do not follow the whims and desires of those who do not know.

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: They will not help you in any way if you decide to defy God. The unjust protect each other, while God is the Protector of those who are mindful of Him.

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: This is clear insight for mankind and guidance and mercy for people gifted with inner certainty.

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: Or do those who indulge in evil deeds assume that We will regard them the same as those who believe and do good deeds, that they will be alike whether in life or in death? How bad is their judgment?

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: God created the heavens and Earth in Truth, so that every soul may be rewarded according to its deeds. They will not be wronged.

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: Have you considered him who has taken his whims and desires for his god? Then God knowingly allows him to stray, sealing his hearing and his heart, and has placed a veil over his vision. So who can guide him after God? Will you not reflect?

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: They say, "There is nothing but our life in this world; we die, we live, and nothing but time destroys us." But they have no knowledge of this; they are only guessing.

25.Safi Kaskas 2024: And when Our clear verses are recited to them, their only argument is to say, "Bring back our forefathers, if you are telling the truth."

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "It is God who gives you life , then causes you to die, and then He gathers you for the Day of Resurrection, about which there is no doubt. But most people do not know."

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: To God belongs the Kingdom of the heavens and the Earth. On the Day when the Hour takes place, on that Day those who dealt in falsehood will lose.

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: You will see every nation on its knees; every nation summoned to its Book, "Today you are being repaid for what you did.

29.Safi Kaskas 2024: This is Our record, it speaks about you in Truth. We were recording what you have been doing."

30.Safi Kaskas 2024: As for those who believed and did good deeds, their Lord will admit them into His mercy. That is the clear triumph.

31.Safi Kaskas 2024: But for the unbelievers, "Were My verses not recited to you? But you were an arrogant and dissenting people.

32.Safi Kaskas 2024: And when you were told, 'God’s promise is true and there is no doubt about the Hour,' you said, 'We do not know what is the Hour. We’re assuming that these are only speculations, and we’re by no means certain.' "

33.Safi Kaskas 2024: The evil consequences of what they did will become evident to them, and the very thing they used to ridicule will haunt them.

34.Safi Kaskas 2024: They were told, "Today We will ignore you as you ignored the encounter of this Day. The Fire will be your refuge, and you will have no helpers.

35.Safi Kaskas 2024: That is because you took the verses of God in ridicule, and the worldly life enticed you." Therefore, today they will not get out of it and they will no longer have the opportunity to repent.

36.Safi Kaskas 2024: All praise be to God, Lord of the heavens and Lord of the Earth, Lord of the worlds.

37.Safi Kaskas 2024: His alone is all majestic greatness within the heavens and the Earth. He is the Revered, the Wise.

46.SurahEnglishNames: The Wind-curved Sandhills, The Dunes, The Sandhills

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: Ha Meem,

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: the gradual revelations of the Book are from God, the Revered, the Wise.

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: We did not create the heavens and Earth and everything in between them except in truth and for a specified term. Yet the unbelievers continue to ignore what they have been warned about.

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "Do you see those you pray to other than God? Show me what part of the Earth they have; or do they own a share in the heavens? Bring me a Book preceding this one, or a shred of knowledge, if you are truthful."

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: Who can be more misguided than he who calls on others besides God that do not respond to him even till the Day of Resurrection? and are not even aware that callers are calling on them.

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: And when people are gathered [that Day], they will be enemies to those who worshiped them, and they will renounce their worship.

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: But when our clear verses are recited to them, the unbelievers say to the Truth when it comes to them: "This is obvious magic."

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: Or do they say, "He has invented it?" Say, "If I have invented it, there is nothing at all you can do to protect me from God. He knows well what you are engaged in. He is sufficient Witness between me and you. He is the Most-Forgiving the Mercy Giver."

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "I am not different from the other messengers, and I do not know what will be done with me, or with you. I only follow what has been revealed to me. I only warn plainly."

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "Have you considered: what if the Qur’an is really from God, and you are rejecting it? When a witness from the Children of Israel has already testified to its similarity [to earlier scripture] and believed in it, and yet you are too proud to do the same? God does not guide the unjust people.”

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: The unbelievers say about the believers, "If it were anything good, they would not have preceded us to it." And since they were not guided by it, they will say, "This is an ancient lie."

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: Yet before it, was the Book revealed to Moses, a guide and as a mercy. And this a Book confirming it in Arabic tongue to warn those who are unjust and to bring good news to those who do good.

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those who say, "Our Lord is God," and then remained on a straight path, they will have nothing to fear, nor shall they grieve.

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those are destined for Paradise, where they will dwell forever, a reward for what they used to do.

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have instructed the human being to have excellent affection towards his parents. His mother carried him with difficulty and gave birth to him with difficulty. His bearing and weaning period is thirty months. Until, when he reaches his full strength and is forty years of age, he says, "My Lord, help me to be grateful for the blessings You have bestowed on me and my parents; help me to do the right deeds that are pleasing to you. Make my children good. I have sincerely repented, and I am of those who submit to You."

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those are the ones whose best deeds will be accepted and whose bad deeds will be overlooked. They will be among the dwellers of Paradise. This is the promise of truth which they had been promised.

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: As for him who says to his parents, "Enough of you; Are you warning me that I will be resurrected when generations have passed and gone before me?" While they both cry for God’s help, "Please believe! The promise of God is true." But he says, "These are only ancient tales"

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those are the ones upon whom the verdict is justified, among nations that went before them of jinn and humans. They are truly doomed.

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: Everyone will be ranked according to what they have done. He will pay them in full for their deeds, and they will not be wronged.

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: On the Day when the unbelievers are exposed to the Fire: “You have squandered the good things you had in your worldly life, and you took your portion of pleasure there. So today you are being repaid with a punishment of humiliation, because of your unjustifiable arrogance on Earth, and for defiantly disobeying.”

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: And mention, the brother of Aad, as he warned his people at the dunes. Others, delivering warnings, have come and gone before him and after him: "Worship only God, he said. I fear for you the punishment of a terrible Day."

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: They replied, "Did you come to turn us away from our gods? Then bring us the punishment you promise us if you are telling the truth."

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: He said, "Its knowledge is only with God, I only convey to you the message that I was sent with. But I see you are insolent people."

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: When they saw a cloud approaching their valleys they said, "This is a cloud that will bring us rain." No, it is rather what you wanted to speed up: a wind, in which there is a painful punishment,

25.Safi Kaskas 2024: it will destroy everything by the command of its Lord. That morning, there was nothing to be seen except their ruined dwellings. This is how We repay those who force others to reject Our messages.

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: We had empowered them far better than We empowered you, and We gave them a hearing, vision, and hearts. But their hearing, vision, and hearts were of no use to them as they were rejecting the signs of God; and so they became surrounded by the very punishment they used to ridicule.

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have destroyed other towns around you, after We have diversified Our signs to them that perhaps they will return to the right path.

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: Why then did those idols, whom they worshiped to bring them nearer to God, not help them? In fact, they abandoned them. It was all falsehood of their own making.

29.Safi Kaskas 2024: We sent a group of jinn to you [Prophet) to listen to the Qur’an. When they heard it, they said: "Listen quietly." Then when it was concluded, they went back to their people to warn them.

30.Safi Kaskas 2024: They said, "Our people, We have heard a Book revealed after Moses confirming what is available of it, guiding to the Truth and to a straight path.

31.Safi Kaskas 2024: Our people, respond to the Caller to God. Believe in Him; He will forgive you your transgressions and will protect you from a painful punishment.

32.Safi Kaskas 2024: But he who does not respond to God’s call can never escape God’s reach on Earth and have no protectors besides Him. Those are misguided."

33.Safi Kaskas 2024: Do they not see that God, who created the heavens and Earth and was never tired in doing so. Is He Able to bring the dead back to life? Yes indeed. He can do all things.

34.Safi Kaskas 2024: On the Day when the unbelievers are exposed to the Fire "Is this not the truth?" They will say, "Yes, by our Lord." He will say, "Then taste the punishment for having rejected the Truth."

35.Safi Kaskas 2024: Be patient, as were those messengers of firm resolve. And do not seek to hasten punishment for them. On the Day when they see what they are promised, it will seem as they had only stayed for an hour of a single day [on Earth]. An announcement: will any be destroyed except the defiantly disobedient people?

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those who reject the truth and turn others away from the path of God, He will let their deeds go to waste. [47:01)

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: While those who believe, and do good deeds and believe in what has been sent down to Muhammad as the Truth from their Lord, He will remove their bad deeds and relieve their concerns. [47:02)

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: That is because those who deny the truth follow falsehood, while those who believe follow the Truth from their Lord. In this way God shows to mankind their examples. [47:03)

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: So, when you encounter the unbelievers [in battle], strike at their necks. Then, once they are defeated, bind them firmly. Then either release them by grace, or by ransom, until the war is over. God could have defeated them Himself if He had willed, but He wants to test some of you by means of others. As for those who are killed in the cause of God, He will not let their deeds go to waste. [47:04)

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: He will guide them and will put their mind at ease [47:05)

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: And He will admit them to Paradise, which He has already made known to them. [47:06)

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: Believers, if you help God, He will help you and make you stand firm. [47:07)

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: As for the unbelievers, how miserable will they be? God brought their deeds to nothing. [47:08)

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: They hated what God revealed, so He rendered their deeds worthless. [47:09)

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: Have they not journeyed through the land and seen the fate of those before them? God destroyed them, and a similar fate awaits all those who persist on denying the truth. [47:10)

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: That is because God is the protector of those who believe while those who deny the truth have no protector. [47:11)

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: God will admit those who have believed and done good deeds to Gardens with rivers flowing through them. While those who disbelieved, who enjoyed themselves, and eat like cattle eat, the Fire will be their final dwelling. [47:12)

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: And how many towns We have destroyed who were greater in power than your town which drove you out? There was no helper for them. [47:13)

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: Is the one who has clear evidence from his Lord like someone whose evil deeds have been made to look attractive to him? So they follow their [own] whims and desires.

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: The example of the Paradise promised to those who are mindful of God is that of a place that has rivers of pure water, and rivers of milk forever fresh, and rivers of wine delightful to all who drink it, and rivers of strained honey. They will have in it all kinds of fruits and forgiveness from their Lord. Is this like those who will abide eternally in the Fire and are given to drink boiling water that will cut through their bowels?

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: Among them are those who listen to you, but when they leave you, they say to those given knowledge, "What was that he just said?" Those are the ones whose hearts God has sealed. They follow their own whims and desires.

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: While those who were [willing to be] guided, God increases them in guidance and causes them to grow in God-consciousness.

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: What are the unbelievers waiting for, other than the Hour to come upon them suddenly? Its Signs have already come. But what good will it be to remind them once the Hour has actually arrived?

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: Know then that there is no god but God and ask forgiveness for your transgressions and for the believing men and women. God knows when you get up and when you lie down.

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those who believe ask “why no chapter has been sent down [about fighting].” Yet when a decisive chapter is sent down, and fighting is mentioned in it, you see those with sickness in their hearts looking at you like someone about to faint from fear of death. It is more appropriate

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: To show Obedience and good words. Then, when the decision to fight has been made, being true to God would have been better for them.

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: Would you prefer to turn away and go spreading corruption on Earth and sever your ties of kinship?

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those are the ones that God has rejected, so He deafened them and blinded their vision.

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: Will they not ponder the Qur’an? Or are there locks upon their hearts?

25.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those who turned back in their tracks after guidance became clear to them, Satan enticed them and has given them false hope.

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: That is because they said to those who hate what God has sent down, "We will obey you in certain matters." But God knows their secrets.

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: How will it be when the angels gather them in death, beating their faces and their backs?

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: That is because they pursued what displeases God and hated what pleases Him. So He rendered their deeds worthless.

29.Safi Kaskas 2024: Or do those with sickness in their hearts think that God will not expose their malice?

30.Safi Kaskas 2024: Had We willed, We could have show them to you, and you would have recognized them by their features; Yet you will surely know them by the tone of their speech. God knows all you do.

31.Safi Kaskas 2024: We will test you, until We know those who strive among you, and those who are patient, and We will test the sincerity of your assertions.

32.Safi Kaskas 2024: The unbelievers who turn others away from the path of God and oppose the Messenger after guidance has become clear to them, will not hurt God in the least, but He will render their deeds worthless.

33.Safi Kaskas 2024: Believers, obey God and obey the Messenger and do not let your deeds go to waste.

34.Safi Kaskas 2024: The unbelievers who turn others away from the path of God and then die while they are unbelievers, God will not forgive them.

35.Safi Kaskas 2024: So do not waiver and call for peace while you have the upper hand. God is with you. He will not waste your deeds.

36.Safi Kaskas 2024: This worldly life is only amusement and pastime. But if you believe and become mindful of God, He will give you your rewards and not ask you for your properties.

37.Safi Kaskas 2024: Were He to ask you for them and put you under pressure, you would become tightfisted, and He would expose your unwillingness.

38.Safi Kaskas 2024: Here you are, called upon to spend in the cause of God. Among you are those who are tightfisted; but whoever withholds only withholds from his soul. God is the Rich Beyond Need, while you are the needy. And if you turn away, He will replace you with another people, and they will not be the likes of you.

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have opened the way for you to a clear victory

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: That God may forgive you your previous and later transgressions, complete His grace upon you and guide you on a straight path

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: That God may help you to a mighty victory.

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is He who sent down tranquility into the hearts of the believers that they would add faith to their faith. To God belong the forces of the heavens and Earth. God is All-Knowing and All-Wise.

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: He will admit the believing men and the believing women to Gardens with rivers flowing through them to remain there eternally and to remove their offenses. That, with God, is a great triumph

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: And He will punish the hypocrite men and hypocrite women, and the idolater men and idolater women, those who harbor evil thoughts about God. They will suffer an evil turn of fate; God is angry with them, has rejected them, and has prepared Hell for them. What a miserable destination.

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: And to God belongs the forces of heavens and Earth. God is Revered and All-Wise.

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have sent you as a witness, a bearer of good news and a giver of warning.

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: That you may believe in God and His Messenger, and honor Him, revere Him and to praise His limitless glory morning and evening.

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those who pledge allegiance to you [Prophet], are actually pledging allegiance to God. God’s hand is placed over theirs. Whoever breaks his pledge breaks it to his own detriment. And whoever fulfills his pledge with God, He will give him a great reward.

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: The Dessert-Arabs who stayed behind [when you went to battle] will say to you, "We were preoccupied with our properties and our families, so ask forgiveness for us." They say with their tongues what is not in their hearts. Say, "If God intended harm for you or intended benefit, who can intervene for you? God is fully aware of what you do.

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: But you thought that the Messenger and the believers will never return to their families, ever, and this seemed fine to your hearts. You harbored evil thoughts, and were corrupt people."

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: For those who do not believe in God and His Messenger, We have prepared a blazing Fire

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: To God belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the Earth. He forgives whom He wills and punishes whom He wills. And ever is God is the Most Forgiving, the Mercy Giver.

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: As soon as you are about to depart on a war that promises gains, those who [previously] stayed behind will say, "Allow us to go with you". They wish to alter the Words of God. Say: "You may not go with us: God has said so before." They will say, "You envy us". How little they understand.

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say to those Dessert-Arabs who stayed behind, "Eventually, you will be called to face people of great military might; you will either have to fight them, or they will submit to God’s will. If you obey, God will give you a good reward; but if you turn away as you turned away before, He will punish you with a painful punishment."

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: There is no blame on the blind, the lame or the ill. God will admit anyone who obeys Him and His Messenger to Gardens with rivers flowing through them; But He will painfully punish anyone who turns away.

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: God was pleased with the believers when they pledged allegiance to you under the tree. He knew what was in their hearts, so He sent down tranquility to them, and rewarded them with an imminent victory

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: and abundant gains to capture. God is the Revered and All-Wise.

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: God has promised you abundant future gains. He has expedited this for you [victory], and has held hostile people‘s hands back from you; that it may be a sign for the believers, and that He may guide you to a straight path.

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: And there are yet other gains to come. God has already covered for you. God is Able to do all things.

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: If the unbelievers had fought you, they would have turned back and fled. Then they will find neither a protector nor a helper.

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: Such is God’s way which is ongoing. You will never find any change in God’s way.

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is He who held their hands from you and your hands from them, in the Makah valley, after He gave you the upper hand over them. God is ever seeing of what you do.

25.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is they who denied the truth, and barred you from the Sacred House, and prevented the offering from reaching its destination. Were it not for some believing men and believing women, whom you did not know, you were about to hurt them, and become unknowingly guilty. Thus God admits into His mercy whomever He wills. Had the unbelievers been clearly distinguishable, We would have inflicted on them a painful punishment.

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: The unbelievers had filled their hearts with fury, the fury of ignorance.
