But God sent down His tranquility on His Messenger and the believers, and made binding on them the word of God consciousness, to which they were most entitled and most deserving. God is Knowing of all things.

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: God has fulfilled His Messenger’s vision in Truth: “You will enter the Sacred House, God willing, in safety, with your heads shaved or hair shortened, with no fear. He knew what you did not know, and has granted you besides this, a victory soon to come.

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is He who sent His Messenger with guidance and the religion of Truth, to prevail over all religions. God suffices as a Witness.

29.Safi Kaskas 2024: Muhammad the Messenger of God and those with him are tough on the unbelievers, yet compassionate to one another. You see them kneeling and bowing down, seeking God’s blessings and His approval. Their faces bear the mark of their prostrations. Such is their example in the Torah. And their description in the Gospel is like a plant that sprouts, becoming strong, grows thick, and rises on its stem to the delight of the farmer. Through them God infuriates the unbelievers. God has promised forgiveness and a great reward to those among them, who believe and do good deeds.

49.SurahEnglishNames: The Private Apartments, The Inner Apartments, The Chambers

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: Believers, do not put your opinions ahead of that of God and His Messenger but remain mindful of God. God is All-Hearing and All-knowing.

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: Believers, do not raise your voices above the voice of the Prophet or be as loud when you are speaking to him as you do to one another unless you want your deeds to become worthless without you realizing.

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those who lower their voices before the Messenger of God, they are the ones whose hearts God has tested for being fully aware of Him. For them, there is forgiveness and a great reward.

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: But those who call you from outside your private chambers, most of them do not understand.

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: Had they been patient until you came out to them, it would have been better for them. But God is the Most Forgiving, the Mercy Giver.

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: Believers, if a known disobedient iniquitous brings you news, investigate, to avoid harming people out of ignorance and later regret what you have done.

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: Be aware that God’s Messenger is among you. Had he obeyed you in many things, you would suffer hardship. But God has endeared your faith to you and made it pleasing to your hearts and made denial of truth, inequity, and disobedience hateful to you. These are the rightly guided

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: a favor and a blessing from God. God is All-knowing and All-Wise.

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: If two groups of believers should fight each other, then try to reconcile them. But if one of them oppresses the other, then fight the oppressing group until it complies with God’s command. Once it has complied, make peace between them with justice and be equitable. God loves those who are equitable.

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: The believers are brothers so make peace between your brothers and remain mindful of God that you may receive mercy.

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: Believers, no men shall ridicule others, for they may be better than them. Nor shall any women ridicule other women, for they may be better than them. Nor shall you slander one another, nor shall you call each other names. How bad it is to be called disobedient after accepting faith! Those who do not repent of this behavior are unjust.

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: Believers, avoid being suspicious. Some suspicions are sinful. And don’t spy or backbite one another. Would any of you like to eat the flesh of his dead brother? No, you would hate it. So remain mindful of God. God is the Acceptor of repentance, the Mercy giver.

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: People, We created you from a male and a female and made you nations and tribes so that you may know (engage) one another. The best among you in the sight of God is the one who is most mindful of God. God is All-knowing and All-Aware.

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: The Desert-Arabs say, "We have believed." Say, “You have not believed yet; but say [instead], 'We have submitted,' for faith has not yet entered your hearts. But if you obey God and His Messenger, He will not diminish any of your deeds. God is the Most Forgiving, the Mercy Giver."

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: The believers are those who believe in God and His Messenger, leave all doubt behind and strive with their wealth and their persons for God‘s cause. Those are the ones who are true to their word.

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "Do you presume to inform God about your religion, when God knows everything in the heavens and Earth, and God has full knowledge of all things?"

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: They consider it a favor to you that they have submitted. Say, "Do not consider your submission a favor to me; it is God who has done you a favor, by guiding you to faith, if you are truly sincere."

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: God knows all that is beyond our senses of the heavens and the Earth. God sees everything you do.

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: Qaf and the Glorious Qur’an.

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: They marveled that someone from among their midst has come to them with a warning. The unbelievers say, “This is an amazing thing.

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: Once We have died and become dust? That is a most unlikely return."

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: We know how many of them the Earth consumes, and We keep a comprehensive record [about each one of them].

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: But when the Truth came to them, they denied it; they are in a state of confusion.

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: Have they not looked at the sky above them, how We structured it and beautified it with all its gateways?

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: And the Earth, how We spread it out and placed on it firm mountains, and made every beautiful pair of plants grow in it

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: This is an insight and a reminder to every worshiper who willingly turns to God.

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: And We sent down blessed rain from the sky and grew gardens and grain to harvest.

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: And soaring palm trees, with clustered dates

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: as provision for the worshipers. By it [the rain] We gave life to a dead town. This is how the emergence [from the graves] will take place.

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: Before them the people of Noah denied the truth, and so did the dwellers of Rass, Thamud

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: Aad, Pharaoh and the brothers of Lot,

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: the woods-dwellers and the people of Tubba‘. All of these people rejected their messengers, so My threat was justly fulfilled.

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: Were We exhausted by the first creation? But they are dubious of a new creation.

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have created man and We know what his inner soul is whispering. We are closer to him than his jugular vein

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: as he receives the two recording agents, seated one on the right and one on the left.

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: He does not utter any word, without a vigilant observer present with him.

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: Eventually, the trance of death will come with the Truth. This is what you were trying to evade.

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: The Horn will be blown. This is the Promised Day.

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: Every soul will come, with it a driver and a witness.

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: “You did not pay much attention to this day, but as We lifted your veil from you, your vision today is keen.”

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: His inseparable companion will say, "This is what I have recorded."

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: [God will say], "Cast into Hell everyone who stubbornly denied the truth,

25.Safi Kaskas 2024: everyone who prevented good from reaching others, aggressor, who caused others to doubt,

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: who made other gods as equal with God; then cast him into severe punishment."

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: His [evil] companion will say, "Our Lord, I did not make him transgress, but he [himself], was extremely lost."

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: [God] will say, "Do not feud in My presence, when I had warned you in advance.

29.Safi Kaskas 2024: My judgment, once given, is not subject to change and I do not wrong My servants."

30.Safi Kaskas 2024: On the Day We will say to Hell, "Are you full?" And it will say, "Are there some more?"

31.Safi Kaskas 2024: And Paradise will be brought near to those who were ever mindful of God, it will not be far

32.Safi Kaskas 2024: [It will be said], "This is what you were promised. for every repentant, keeper of his covenant with God

33.Safi Kaskas 2024: who feared the Merciful although He was beyond his perception and came with a repenting heart.

34.Safi Kaskas 2024: Enter it in peace. This is the Day of Eternity."

35.Safi Kaskas 2024: Whatever they want there, they will have and with Us is still more.

36.Safi Kaskas 2024: How many a generation We destroyed before them, who were more powerful and had searched every land. Was there any escape?

37.Safi Kaskas 2024: There is a reminder in this for whoever has a heart or cared to listen and witness.

38.Safi Kaskas 2024: And We did create the heavens and Earth and everything between them in six days, and We were not the least weary.

39.Safi Kaskas 2024: So [Prophet] endure what they say and praise your Lord’s limitless glory before the rising of the sun and before its setting,

40.Safi Kaskas 2024: and glorify Him part of the night and after prostration.

41.Safi Kaskas 2024: Listen for the Day when the Caller will call out from a place that is near.

42.Safi Kaskas 2024: The Day they will hear the blast in all Truth, that is the Day of Emergence [from the graves].

43.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is We who give life and cause death, and to Us is their final destination

44.Safi Kaskas 2024: The Day when the Earth cracks as they emerge rapidly; That is an easy gathering for Us.

45.Safi Kaskas 2024: We know best what they say, and you are not there to force them. So remind with the Quran those who fear My warning.

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: By those [winds] scattering dust,

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: and those (clouds) heavily laden [with water]

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: and those sailing with ease

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: and those distributing [rain] as ordained,

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: what you are promised is true.

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: The judgment will come.

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: By the sky that is woven,

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: you differ in what you say [about this message].

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: He who deceives himself is misled away from it.

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: The speculators destroy themselves

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: they are unaware that they are lost in ignorance.

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: They ask, "When is the Day of Judgment?"

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: The Day they will be tested when they see the Fire

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: [And will be told], "Taste your scheme. This is what you were rushing toward."

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: While those who were mindful of God will be among Gardens and springs,

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: accepting what their Lord has given them. Verily, they were those who do good.

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: They used to sleep a little at night,

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: and at dawn they would pray for forgiveness,

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: and assign a share of their wealth to the needy and the deprived.

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: For the certain [in faith], they are signs on Earth

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: and in yourselves, will you not see?

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: And in the heaven is your provision and whatever you are promised.

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: By the Lord of the heaven and Earth, it is as true as the fact that you speak.

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: Has the story of Abraham’s honored guests reached you?

25.Safi Kaskas 2024: When they entered to see him, they said, "Peace." He answered, "Peace to you strangers.”

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then he went off to his family and came with a fat [roasted] calf

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: and placed it near them; he said, "Will you not eat?"

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: He then began to feel apprehensive. They said, "Do not fear," and gave him good news of a boy who would be gifted with knowledge.

29.Safi Kaskas 2024: His wife approached with a scream, struck her face and protested, "A barren old woman [like me]!"

30.Safi Kaskas 2024: They said, "Thus said your Lord; He is the All-Wise, the All-knowing."

31.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Abraham] then enquired, "What is your business, messengers?"

32.Safi Kaskas 2024: They said, " We have been sent to a dissenting people

33.Safi Kaskas 2024: to send down on them rocks of clay,

34.Safi Kaskas 2024: marked by your Lord for those who rejected His messages and have severed all relations with God

35.Safi Kaskas 2024: So We brought out the believers that were in town.

36.Safi Kaskas 2024: But found only one household of people who submitted to God.

37.Safi Kaskas 2024: And We left in town a sign for those who fear the painful punishment.

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: [They will be] among thorns free lotus trees

29.Safi Kaskas 2024: and fruit-laden acacias

30.Safi Kaskas 2024: and extended shade,

31.Safi Kaskas 2024: outpouring water

32.Safi Kaskas 2024: abundant fruits

33.Safi Kaskas 2024: neither withheld nor forbidden,

34.Safi Kaskas 2024: on elevated daybeds

35.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have specially created them

36.Safi Kaskas 2024: originals,

37.Safi Kaskas 2024: very loving and of equal age to their husbands.

38.Safi Kaskas 2024: For those of the right

39.Safi Kaskas 2024: a group of the earlier generation

40.Safi Kaskas 2024: and a group of the later generation.

41.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those of the left, what of those on the left?

42.Safi Kaskas 2024: [They will be] amidst scorching fire and scalding water

43.Safi Kaskas 2024: and a shade of black smoke,

44.Safi Kaskas 2024: neither cool nor refreshing.

45.Safi Kaskas 2024: They used to live luxuriously

46.Safi Kaskas 2024: but they persisted in the greatest offenses against God

47.Safi Kaskas 2024: and they used to say, "When we’re dead and turned to dust and bones, shall we then be resurrected,

48.Safi Kaskas 2024: and our forefathers too?”

49.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "The former and the later people

50.Safi Kaskas 2024: will all be gathered on a predetermined Day."

51.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then you, you who are misguided and reject the truth,

52.Safi Kaskas 2024: will be eating from trees of Zaqqum.

53.Safi Kaskas 2024: You will be filling your bellies with it,

54.Safi Kaskas 2024: drinking boiling water on top of it,

55.Safi Kaskas 2024: drinking it like thirsty camels.

56.Safi Kaskas 2024: That will be their welcome on Judgment Day.

57.Safi Kaskas 2024: We created you, so why do you not believe?

58.Safi Kaskas 2024: Have you seen the semen which you ejaculate?

59.Safi Kaskas 2024: Is it you who creates it, or are We the Creator?

60.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have decreed death among you, and no one will surpass Us.

61.Safi Kaskas 2024: if We want to replace you and to recreate you in a way unknown to you.

62.Safi Kaskas 2024: You have already known the first creation, so will you not remember?

63.Safi Kaskas 2024: Have you seen what you cultivate?

64.Safi Kaskas 2024: Is it you who makes it grow, or are We the grower?

65.Safi Kaskas 2024: If We wish, We can turn it into ruins, and you would be left to wonder,

66.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Saying], "we are now in debt;

67.Safi Kaskas 2024: Rather, We have been deprived."

68.Safi Kaskas 2024: And have you seen the water that you drink?

69.Safi Kaskas 2024: Is it you who sent it down from the clouds, or are We the Sender?

70.Safi Kaskas 2024: If We wish, We can make it salty, why then you are not grateful?

71.Safi Kaskas 2024: And have you seen the fire that you kindle?

72.Safi Kaskas 2024: Is it you who produced its tree, or are We the Producer?

73.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have made it a reminder and provision for all who kindle it,

74.Safi Kaskas 2024: exalt, then, the glory of your Lord’s name the Magnificent.

75.Safi Kaskas 2024: I swear by the positioning of the stars,

76.Safi Kaskas 2024: a tremendous oath, if you only knew,

77.Safi Kaskas 2024: it is a noble Qur’an

78.Safi Kaskas 2024: kept in a well-protected record;

79.Safi Kaskas 2024: where none will be allowed to touch it except the purified,

80.Safi Kaskas 2024: revealed gradually by the Lord of the worlds.

81.Safi Kaskas 2024: Is it then this statement that you are ridiculing

82.Safi Kaskas 2024: and you deny it as if your livelihood depends on it?

83.Safi Kaskas 2024: Why then, when the soul at death reaches the throat,

84.Safi Kaskas 2024: and you are at that time looking on,

85.Safi Kaskas 2024: when we’re closer to him than you are, but you do not see.

86.Safi Kaskas 2024: Why then, if you are not dependent on Us,

87.Safi Kaskas 2024: don’t you restore his soul to him, if your claim is valid?

88.Safi Kaskas 2024: If the deceased were of those brought near to God

89.Safi Kaskas 2024: he would then have eternal harmony, eternal delight, and a Garden of Bliss.

90.Safi Kaskas 2024: And if he was from those on the right

91.Safi Kaskas 2024: then "Peace be to you, from your companions on the right."

92.Safi Kaskas 2024: But if he was from those who called the truth a lie and were misguided

93.Safi Kaskas 2024: he will be welcomed with boiling water

94.Safi Kaskas 2024: and will burn in Hell.

95.Safi Kaskas 2024: This is the absolute Truth,

96.Safi Kaskas 2024: exalt, then, the glory of your Lord’s name the Magnificent.

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: Everything in the heavens and Earth exalts God’s limitless glory. He is the Revered, the Wise.

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: The Kingdom of the heavens and Earth belongs to Him. He gives life and causes death, and He is able to do all things.

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: He is the First and the Last, the Outer and the Inner, and He has knowledge of all things.

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is He who created the heavens and the Earth in six days , then established Himself above the Throne. He knows what penetrates into the Earth and what comes out of it, and what descends from the heaven and what ascends to it. He is with you wherever you may be. God sees everything you do.

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: The Kingdom of the heavens and the Earth belongs to Him. All matters are referred back to God.

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: He merges the night into the day and merges the day into the night. He knows what is in your hearts.

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: Believe in God and His Messenger and give out from that with which He has entrusted you. Those among the believers who give will have a great reward.

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: Why would you not believe in God, when the Messenger is inviting you to believe in your Lord and He has received a pledge from you if you are believers?

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is He who sends down clear revelations to His servant, that He may bring you out from the darkness of ignorance into enlightenment. God is the Companionate, the Mercy Giver.

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: And why shouldn’t you spend in the cause of God, when the inheritance of the heavens and the Earth belongs to God? Those of you who contributed before the conquest, and fought, are not equal to those who contributed and fought afterward. They are higher in rank. But God promises both a good reward. God is All-Aware of what you do.

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: Who will make a loan of goodness to God, so that He may multiply it for him and reward him generously?

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: On the Day when you see the believing men and believing women, their light proceeding ahead of them and to their right, "Good news for you today: Gardens with rivers flowing through them, where you will remain eternally. That is a great victory”.

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: On the Day, the hypocritical men and hypocritical women will say to the believers, "Wait for us. Let us have some of your light." They will be told, "Go back and look for the light." And a wall will be raised between them with a gate in it; inside it, there is mercy, but outside lies punishment.

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: The hypocrites will call to the believers, “Were we not with you?” They will say, “Yes, but you allowed yourselves to be tempted, and waited and doubted, deceived by wishful thinking until God’s command came and the Deceiver deceived you about God.”

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: Today no ransom will be accepted from you, nor from those who rejected the truth. Your home is the Fire. It is most worthy of you. What a miserable destination.

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: Is it not time for those believers' hearts to become humbly submissive to the remembrance of God and to the Truth He has sent down? So they are not like those who were given the Book before them, whose time was extended but whose hearts hardened, and many of them are disobedient

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: Know that God revives the Earth after it dies. We made clear to you the signs; that you may comprehend.

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: For charitable men and women who have loaned God a loan of goodness, it will be multiplied for them, and they will have a generous reward.

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those who believed in God and His Messengers are the truthful ones who will bear witness before their Lord. They will have their reward and their light. But the unbelievers and those who reject Our revelations will be the inhabitants of Hell.

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: Know that the life of this world is just a game; recreation, glitter, boasting to one another and rivalry in wealth and children. It is like a rain that helps plants grow, pleasing the growers, but then it dries up and you see it turn yellow, then it becomes stubble. There is severe punishment in the Hereafter, as well as forgiveness from God and [His] approval. The life of this world is only an illusion.

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: So pursue forgiveness from your Lord and a Garden as vast as the heavens and the Earth is prepared for [or ‘awaits’] those who believed in God and His Messengers. That is the blessing of God which He gives to whom He wills. God is limitless in His blessings.

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: No misfortune occurs, either on Earth or in your souls but it is detailed in a Book before We created it. That is easy for God

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: So you will not grieve for what you missed or rejoice over what He has given you. For God does not like the vain and the arrogant,

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: those who are stingy and direct others to be stingy. Whoever turns away, [remember] God is rich beyond need, worthy of all praise.

25.Safi Kaskas 2024: We sent Our Messengers with clear evidence and We sent down with them the Book and the Balance, that people may establish justice. And We sent down iron, which can be used for military might and to benefit people in many different ways. So that God may know those who uplifted Him and His Messengers though He is beyond their senses. God is Strong, Revered.

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: We sent Noah and Abraham and placed prophethood and the Book among some of their descendants. Some of them were guided, but many were disobedient

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then We sent Our Messengers to follow in their footsteps and followed up with Jesus, the son of Mary, and gave him the Gospel. We placed compassion and mercy in the hearts of those who followed him. As for monasticism, which they invented to seek God’s pleasure, We did not ordain for them, and they did not observe properly. So We gave those who believed among them their reward, but many of them are disobedient.

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: Believers, be ever mindful of God and believe in His Messenger; He will give you a double share of His mercy, provide you a light to guide you and forgive you; God is the Most Forgiving, the Mercy Giver.

29.Safi Kaskas 2024: That the people of the Book may know that they have no power whatsoever over God’s blessings and that all blessings are in God’s Hand; He gives it to whomever He wills. God is limitless with His blessings.

58.SurahEnglishNames: She That Disputeth, The Pleading Woman, She Who Pleaded

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: God has heard the words of the woman who argued with you concerning her husband while complaining to God. God heard your conversation. God is All-Hearing, All-Seeing.

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: There are those of you who divorce their wives by equating them with their mothers, they are not their mothers. Their mothers are those who gave birth to them. What they said is wrong and a blatant lie. But God is All-Pardoning and All-Forgiving.

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those of you who renounce their wives by equating them with their mothers, then wish to go back on what they said, must free a slave before they touch one another. This is what you are instructed to do, and God is well aware of what you do.

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: But he who does not find the means must fast for two months consecutively before touching one another. And if he is unable, then he should feed sixty disable people. This is to affirm your faith in God and His Messenger. These are the limits set by God. And the unbelievers will have a painful punishment.

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those who oppose God and His Messenger will be restrained, like those before them. We have sent down self-evident messages. The unbelievers will have a painful punishment

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: on the Day when God will resurrect them all and tell them what they did. God has kept accounts of it all, while they have forgotten it; God is Witness over all things.

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: Do not you realize that God knows everything in the heavens and on Earth? There is no secret conversation between three people, but He is their fourth; nor between five, but He is their sixth; nor between less than that, nor more, but He is with them wherever they are. Then, on the Day of Resurrection, He will inform them of what they did. God is All-knowing of everything.

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: Have you not noticed that those who were prohibited from conspiring secretly, have returned to what they were prohibited from doing? They conspire to commit wrongdoing, aggression, and defiance of the Messenger. And when they come to you, they greet you with a greeting that God never greeted you with. And they say to themselves, “Why does not God punish us for what we say?” Hell will be enough for them. They will burn there. What a miserable destiny.

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: Believers, when you converse privately, do not converse about committing wrongdoing, aggression and defiance of the Messenger, but converse about righteousness and being mindful of God. Be ever mindful of God, to whom you will be gathered.

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: Conversing in secret to conspire is from Satan, to dishearten the believers, though it will not harm them at all, unless God permits it. So let the believers put their trust in God.

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: Believers, when you are told to make room in your gathering, then do so; God will make room for you. And when you are told, "Get up," then get up; God will elevate in rank those who believed among you and those who were given knowledge. God is well aware of what you do.

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: Believers, when you privately converse with the Messenger, proceed by offering something in charity. That is better for you and purer. But if you do not find the means to do so, then God is the Most Forgiving, the Mercy Giver.

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: Do you regret not offering charity before your conversation with the Prophet? If you did not give, and God pardoned you, then establish prayers, and give charitable gifts, and obey God and His Messenger. God is well Aware of what you do.

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: Don’t you see those who befriend a people with whom God is angry? They are neither with you nor with them, and knowingly swear to lies.

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: God has prepared a severe punishment for them. What they were doing is evil.

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: They took their oaths as a cover-up, and turned others away from the way of God. They will have a humiliating punishment.

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: Neither their wealth nor their children will be of any use to them against God. They will be the inhabitants of the Fire, where they will remain

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: On the Day when God will resurrect them altogether, they will swear to Him as they swear to you, thinking that this will help them. What liars they are.

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: Satan has overcome them and made them forget the remembrance of God. Those are the party of Satan. Unquestionably, the party of Satan will be the doomed.

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those who oppose God and His Messenger are among the most humiliated.

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: God has written, "I will surely prevail, I and My Messengers." God is Strong, Revered.

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: You will not find a people who believe in God and the Last Day, showing affection to those who oppose God and His Messenger, even if they were their parents or their children, or their brothers or their close relatives. God has written faith into the hearts of these people, and has strengthened them with His spirit. He will admit them to Gardens graced with flowing streams, where they will dwell forever. God is pleased with them, and they are pleased with Him. These are of the party of God. Unquestionably, the party of God will be the successful.

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: All that exists in the heavens and the Earth is praising God’s limitless glory. He is the Revered, the Wise.

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is He who evicted those who broke faith among the people of the Book from their homes at the first mobilization. You did not think they would leave, and they thought their fortresses would protect them from God. But God came at them from where they least expected it, and He put panic into their hearts. They wrecked their homes with their own hands, and by the hands of the believers. Therefore, take a lesson, all of you with insight.

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: Had God not decreed evacuation for them, He would have punished them in this world, and in the Hereafter, they will have the punishment of the Fire.

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: That is because they opposed God and His Messenger. God is severe in punishment toward anyone opposing God.

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: Whatever you have cut down of their palm trees or left standing on its roots, it is by permission of God. So that He might disgrace the defiantly disobedient.

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: Whatever God has given to His Messenger from them; you did not have to spur your horses or camels for them, but God gives authority to His Messengers over whomever He will. God is able to do all things.

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: Whatever gains God has restored to His Messenger from the villages’ inhabitants belongs to God, the Messenger, the relatives, the orphans, the disabled, and to the wayfarer; so that wealth may not circulate solely between the wealthy among you. So accept whatever the Messenger gives you, and abstain from whatever he didn’t allow you to have. And be mindful of God. God is severe in punishment.

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is also for the poor emigrants who were driven out of their homes and their possessions, who seek God’s blessings and His approval and support God and His Messenger. Those are truly sincere.

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: And (also for] those who before them, were already established in their homes [in Medina], and have accepted faith. They love those who migrated to them and find no hesitation in their hearts in helping them. They give them preference over themselves, even if they themselves are needy. Whoever is spared from his own soul’s greed is truly successful.

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those who came after them, say, "Our Lord, forgive us and our brothers who preceded us in faith and leave no malice in our hearts toward those who believe. Our Lord, You are the Most Compassionate, the Mercy Giver."

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: Have you noticed those who act hypocritically? They say to their brothers, the faithless among the people of the Book, "If you are driven out, we will surely leave with you, and we will not obey anyone who wants to harm you; and should anyone fight you, we will certainly support you." But God bears witness that they are truly liars.

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: If they are driven out, they will not leave with them, and if they are fought, they will not support them. Even if they should support them, they will surely turn their backs and flee; then they will not be helped.

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: Indeed, you [believers] strike more terror in their hearts than their fear of God. That is because they are a people who do not understand.

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: Even united they will not fight you except within fortified strongholds, or from behind walls. There is much hostility between them. You think they are united, but their hearts are diverse. That is because they are a people without reason.

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: Like those who went shortly before them. They experience the evil consequences of their decisions. A painful punishment awaits them.

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: They are like Satan who says to a human being, "Do not believe." But when he denies the truth, he says, "I disown you; I fear God, the Lord of the worlds."

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: The ultimate end of both is the Fire, where they will dwell forever. That is the reward of the unjust.

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: Believers, be mindful of God. And let every soul consider what it has put forth for tomorrow, and be mindful of God, for God is well aware of what you do.

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: And do not be like those who forgot God, so He made them forget themselves. These are defiantly disobedient.

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: The inhabitants of the Fire and the inhabitants of Paradise are not equal. It is the inhabitants of Paradise who are the winners.

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: Had We sent down this Qur’an on a mountain, you would have seen it humbling itself and crumbling in awe of God. These examples We mention for the people, that they may reflect.

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: He is God, there is no god but Him, the Knower of all that is beyond our senses and all that we can witness. He is the Merciful-to-all, the Mercy giver.

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: He is God, there is no god but Him, The Sovereign, The Most Holy, The Peace Giver, The Faith Giver, The Dominant, the Revered, The Powerful, The Proud. May God be exalted in His glory, above all they associate with Him.

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: He is God, the Creator, the Maker, the Fashioner; to Him belongs the Most Beautiful Names. Whatever is in the heavens and Earth glorifies Him. He is the Revered, the Wise.

60.SurahEnglishNames: She That is to be Examined, Examining her, She Who is Tested

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: Believers do not take My enemies and yours as protectors, offering them affection, when they have rejected the Truth that has come to you. They have driven you and the Messenger out because you believe in God, your Lord. If you have decided to struggle in My Way, seeking My approval, how can you secretly love them? I know what you conceal and what you reveal. Whoever among you does that is straying from the right path.

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: If they ever gain dominance over you, they will treat you as enemies, and they will stretch out their hands and tongues to hurt you. They would dearly wish that you renounce your faith.

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: Never will your bloodlines or your children be of any use to you. God will separate you on the Day of Resurrection. God is All-Seeing of what you do.

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: There has already been a good example for you in Abraham and those with him, when they said to their people, "we disown you and what you worship besides God. We reject you, and there will be animosity and hatred forever between us and you until you believe in God alone." Except for Abraham’s words to his father, "I will ask forgiveness for you, though I cannot protect you from God”. “Our Lord, in You we trust, and to You, we repent. To You is the ultimate destination.

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: Our Lord, do not make us a target for the unbelievers, and forgive us. Our Lord, You are the Revered, the Wise."

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: There is a good example in them for you, for anyone who seeks God and the Last Day. But if anyone turns away, God is the Rich Beyond Need, the Praiseworthy.

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: Perhaps God will restore affection between you and your present enemies . God is able to do all things. God is the Most Forgiving, the Mercy Giver.

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: God does not forbid you from dealing kindly and equitably with those who did not fight you because of your faith and did not drive you out of your homes. God loves those who are equitable.

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: But God forbids you from befriending those who fought against you over your faith and drove you from your homes and helped others to drive you out. Any who takes them for friends are the wrongdoers.

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: Believers, when believing women come to you as emigrants, test them. God knows best about their faith. And if you find them to be faithful, then do not return them to the unbelievers. They are not lawful wives for them, nor are they their lawful husbands. But give the unbelievers what they have spent. You are not to blame if you marry them later provided you give them their dues. And do not hold to marriage bonds with unbelieving women, but ask for what you have spent and let them ask for what they have spent. This is God’s judgment; He judges between you. God is All-knowing and All-Wise.

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: If any of your wives rejoin the unbelievers, and you decide to penalize them, then give those whose wives have gone the equivalent of what they had spent [out of what you owe the unbelievers]. And be mindful of God, in whom you are believers.

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: Prophet, when believing women come to you, pledging that they will not associate anything with God, nor steal, nor commit adultery, nor will they kill their children, nor lie about who has fathered their children, nor disobey you in what is right, then accept their pledge of allegiance and ask God’s forgiveness for them. God is the Most Forgiving, the Mercy Giver.

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: Believers do not take as protectors those with whom God is angry. They have despaired of the Hereafter, as the unbelievers have despaired of those buried in their graves.

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: Everything in the heavens and the Earth declares the praises of God’s limitless glory. He is the Revered, the Wise.

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: Believers, why do you say what you do not do?

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: it is most despicable in God’s sight that you say what you do not do.

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: God loves those who fight in solid lines for His cause, as though they were a well-built structure.

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: And mention when Moses said to his people, "My people, why do you hurt me when you know that I am God’s Messenger to you?" And when they turned away, God caused their hearts to turn away. God does not guide the defiantly disobedient people.

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: And when Jesus son of Mary said, "O children of Israel, I am God’s Messenger to you, confirming what is available of the Torah, and bringing the good news of a messenger who will come after me, whose name is Ahmad.” But when he came to them with clear evidence, they said, "This is obvious magic."

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: And who is more unjust than one who invents lies and attributes them to God when invited to submit? God does not guide unjust people.

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: They wish to extinguish God’s enlightenment with their mouths, but God will perfect His light, even though the unbelievers dislike it.

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is He who sent His Messenger with guidance and the religion of Truth, that he may proclaim it over all religions, even though those who associate others with God will dislike it.

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: Believers, will I guide you to a transaction that will save you from a painful punishment?

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: That you believe in God and His Messenger, and strive in the cause of God with your wealth and yourselves. That is best for you, if you only knew.

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: He will forgive you your transgressions; and will admit you to Gardens with rivers flowing through them and pleasant dwellings in the Gardens of Eden. That is the great success.

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: And another thing you love: support from God and imminent victory; Give good news to the believers.

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: Believers, be supporters of God, as Jesus, the son of Mary, said to the disciples, "Who are my supporters to God?" The disciples said, "We are God’s supporters." A faction of the Children of Israel believed, and another faction disbelieved. So We supported those who believed against their enemy, and they became dominant.

62.SurahEnglishNames: The Congregation, Friday, The Day of Congregation

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: Everything in the heavens and the Earth declares the praises of God’s limitless glory, the Sovereign, the Holy, the Revered, the Wise.

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is He who raised a messenger from among the Gentiles; reciting His revelations to them, purifying them, and teaching them the Book and Wisdom; although before that they were clearly misguided

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: and [he is sent] to others of them who have not yet joined them. God is the Revered, the Wise.

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: Such is God’s favor, which He gives to whom He wills; God is the possessor of great favors.

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: The example of those who were entrusted to uphold the Torah, but then failed to uphold it, is that of a donkey carrying volumes of knowledge. Terrible is the example of the people who reject the signs of God. God does not guide the unjust People.

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, " you who follow Judaism, if you claim that out of all people you alone are friends of God, then wish for death if you are truthful."

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: But they will not wish for it, ever, because of what their hands have done. God knows the unjust well.

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "The death from which you are fleeing will catch up with you. Then you will be returned to the Knower of the unknown and the known, and He will inform you about what you used to do."

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: Believers, when the call is made for prayer on Friday, drop all business and rush to the remembrance of God. That is better for you, if you only knew.

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then when the prayer is concluded, disperse through the land, and seek God’s favor, and remember to call on God without ceasing, so that you may prosper.

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: Yet whenever they come across some business, or some entertainment, they scramble towards it, and leave you standing there. Say, “That which is with God is better than entertainment and business; God is the Best of providers.”

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: When the hypocrites come to you, they say, "We bear witness that you are indeed God’s Messenger." God knows that you are indeed His Messenger and God bears witness that the hypocrites are indeed liars.

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: They have taken their oaths as a cover, to divert people from the way of God. Evil is what they do.

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: That is because they believed, and then rejected the truth; so their hearts have been sealed, and they cannot understand.

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: When you see them, their appearance appeals to you. And when they speak, you listen to what they say. They are like propped up timber. They think every shout is aimed at them. They are the enemy, so beware of them. May God destroy them; how devious they are?

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: And when It is said to them, "Come, the Messenger of God will ask forgiveness for you," they turn their heads aside in contempt and you see them turning away arrogantly.

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is all the same for them whether you ask forgiveness for them or does not ask forgiveness for them; God will not forgive them. God does not guide such disobedient people.

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is they who say, "Give nothing to those who follow God’s Messenger, until they dispersed from around him." To God belongs the treasuries of the heavens and the Earth, but the hypocrites do not understand.

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: They say, "If we return to Medina, the revered will drive out the disgraced." But all reverence belongs to God, His Messenger, and the believers; though the hypocrites do not know it.

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: Believers, let neither your wealth nor your children distract you from remembering to call upon God. Whoever those doing that are doomed.

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: Give from what We have provided for you before death comes to one of you, and he says, "My Lord if You would only delay me for a little while, so that I may be charitable, and be among the righteous."

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: But God will never delay a soul when its time has come. God is well aware of what you do.

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: Everything in the heavens and the Earth declare the praises of God’s limitless glory. To Him belongs the Kingdom, and to Him all praise is due. He is able to do all things.

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is He who created you. Yet some of you deny the truth, and some believe it. God sees everything you do.

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: He created the heavens and Earth in Truth, and shaped you and perfected your shapes; and to Him is the ultimate destination.

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: He knows everything in the heavens and the Earth, and He knows what you conceal and what you reveal. God knows very well the secrets of every heart.

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: Has the news not reached you, of those who rejected the truth before you? They tasted the ill consequences of their conduct, and they will have a painful punishment.

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: That is because their messengers came to them with clear evidence, but they said, "Are human beings going to guide us?" So they denied their messengers and turned away. God had no need for them; God is reach beyond need and praiseworthy.

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: The unbelievers claim that they will never be resurrected. Say, "Yes indeed, by my Lord, you will be resurrected; then you will be informed of everything you did; that is easy for God."

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: So believe in God and His Messenger and the enlightenment We have sent down. God is well aware of what you do.

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: When He gathers you for the Day of Gathering, the Day of mutual neglect, whoever believes in God and does good deeds, He will forgive him his misdeeds and admit him to Gardens with rivers flowing through them, where they will remain forever. That is the great success.

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: But for those who disbelieve and deny Our revelations, these are the companions of the Fire, remaining there forever; and what a miserable destination.

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: No disaster occurs except by permission of God. Whoever believes in God, He will guide his heart. God has full knowledge of everything.

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: Obey God and obey the Messenger. But if you turn away, it is only incumbent on Our messenger to deliver the clear message.

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: God, there is no god but Him. So let the believers put their trust in Him.

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: Believers, there are enemies to you among your wives and your children, so beware of them. But if you pardon, overlook, and forgive, God is the Most Forgiving, the Mercy Giver.

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: Your possessions and your children are a test for you, but with God there is a great reward.

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: So be mindful of God as much as you can; hear and obey and be charitable, it is for your own good. He who is safe-guarded from his own greed, those are the successful ones.

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: If you loan God a loan of goodness, He will multiply it for you, and forgive you. God is Appreciative and Forbearing.

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: He’s the Knower of all that is beyond our senses and all that we can witness, the Revered, the Wise.

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: Prophet, when any of you intend to divorce women, do so at the beginning of their prescribed waiting period. Calculate the period’s term carefully and be mindful of God, your Lord. Do not drive them out of their homes , nor should they leave during that period, unless they have committed a proven immoral act. These are the limits of God and whoever oversteps God’s limits wrongs his own soul. You never know what new situation God may bring about.

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: When they have fulfilled their term, either retain them honorably, or part with them honorably. And call from among your just witnesses, to give testimony for God’s sake. Anyone who believes in God and the Last Day should heed this. God will find a way out for whoever is mindful of Him

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: and will provide for him from an unexpected source. God will suffice for those who put their trust in Him. God will achieve His purpose. God has set a due measure for everything.

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: If you have any doubts, regarding a wife who has ceased menstruating and for one who have not yet menstruated, the period of waiting shall be three months. And for those who are pregnant, their term shall be until they have delivered. God makes things easy for those who are mindful of Him.

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: This is God’s command which He sent down to you. God will forgive the misdeeds and increase the rewards of anyone who is mindful of Him.

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: Allow the wives you are divorcing to reside where you reside, according to your means. Do not harass them in order to make things difficult for them. If they are pregnant, maintain them until they give birth. And if they nurse your infant, compensate them fairly. Maintain your relationship in a friendly and honorable way. But if you disagree, then let another woman nurse him.

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: Let the wealthy spend according to his wealth, and he whose resources are restricted shall spend according to what God has given him. God does not burden a soul beyond what He has given it. After hardship, God will bring ease.

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: Many a town defied the command of its Lord and His Messengers, so We held them strictly accountable, and We punished them with a horrifying punishment

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: to experience the consequences of its decisions, and the outcome of its decisions was total loss.

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: God has prepared a severe punishment for them. So you who are endowed with insight and have faith, be conscious of God. He has sent down a Reminder to you,

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: a Messenger who recites God’s verses that make things clear to you, that he may bring those who believe and do good deeds from the darkness of ignorance into enlightenment. God will admit those who believe in Him and do good deeds into Gardens with rivers flowing through them, to dwell there forever and ever. God has provided excellently for them.

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is God who created seven heavens, and a similar number of Earths. His command descends through them, so that you may know that God is able to do all things, and that God’s knowledge has encompassed all things.

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: Prophet, why do you prohibit what God has made lawful to you, seeking to please your wives? God is the Most Forgiving, the Mercy Giver.

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: God has already ordained for you [believers) to release you from such oaths. God is your protector and He is the All-knowing, the All-Wise.

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: The Prophet told something in confidence to one of his wives. But when she disclosed it [to another wife], God made it known to him; he confirmed part of it, and ignored another part. Then when he confronted her with it, she asked, "Who told you this?" He said, "I was informed by the All-knowing, the All-Aware."

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: You two [wives] need to repent to God, for your hearts have clearly deviated. But if you band together against him, then God is his protector, as is Gabriel and the righteous believers. In addition, the angels will come to his support.

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: Perhaps if he divorced you, his Lord will give him wives better than you: submissive to God, believing, obedient, repentant, worshipping, who fast much; previously married as well as virgins.

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: Believers, safeguard yourselves and your families from a Fire fueled by people and stones. fierce and powerful angels stand over it. They never disobey God’s commands to them, but do as they are commanded.

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: Unbelievers make no excuses today. You are only being repaid for what you used to do.

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: Believers, turn to God in sincere repentance. Your Lord may remove your sins, and admit you into Gardens with rivers flowing through them, on the Day when God will not disgrace the Prophet and those who believed with him. Their light will proceed before them, and to their right, they will say, "Our Lord, perfect our light for us and forgive us. You are able to do all things."

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: Prophet, strive against the unbelievers and the hypocrites and be harsh with them. Hell will be their dwelling. What a miserable destination.

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: God has given an example to those who reject the truth: the wife of Noah and the wife of Lot. They were married to two of Our righteous worshipers but they betrayed them. They were not able to help them at all with God, and it was said, "Enter the Fire with those who are entering."

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: And God has given an example to those who believed: Pharaoh’s wife, when she said, "My Lord, build for me near You, a house in Paradise, and rescue me from Pharaoh and his works and save me from the unjust people."

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: And the example of Mary, Imran’s daughter, who guarded her chastity. So We breathed into her from Our Spirit; and she believed in her Lord’s Words and His Books, and was one of the devoutly obedient.

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: Exalted is He who has all Sovereignty in His Hand, who has power over all things

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: He who created death and life to test you as to which of you is best in deed. He is the Revered, the Forgiver,

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: it is He who created seven heavens in total harmony with one another. You will not see any discrepancy in the creation of the Merciful-to-all. Look again, do you see any gaps?

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then look again, and again, and your sight will return to you dazzled and exhausted.

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have beautified the lowest heaven with lit objects and use them as tools to stone devils and have prepared for them the punishment of the Blazing fire.

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: For those who reject their Lord, there is the punishment of Hell, a miserable destination.

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: When they are thrown into it, they will hear it roaring, as it seethes.

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: It almost bursts with rage. Every time a group is thrown into it, its keepers ask them, "Did no one come to warn you?"

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: They will say, "Yes, someone came to warn us, but we did not believe in him and said, 'God has not sent down anything. You are in greatly misguided.' "

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: They will say, "Had we listened or reasoned, we would not have been included among the inhabitants of the Blazing fire."

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: So they will come to realize and admit their transgression. Away with the inhabitants of the Blazing fire.

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: Forgiveness and great reward await those who stand in awe of their Lord although He is beyond the reach of their perception.

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: Whether you keep your thoughts to yourself, or state them openly, He knows what is within the heart.

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: Would He who created not know, when He is the Most Subtle, the Totally Aware?

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is He who tamed the Earth for you, so travel its regions, and eat of His provision. To Him you will be resurrected.

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: Do you feel confident that He who is in the heaven would not cause the Earth to swallow you as it spins?

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: Or are you confident that He who is in heaven would not unleash a violent storm of stones against you? Then you will know how true My warning was.

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those before them had already denied my warnings, and how terrible was My condemnation.

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: Have they not seen the birds above them, with wings outspread or folded in? None holds them except the Merciful-to-all. He is, The Ever Insightful.

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: Or who can be a force to protect you other than the Merciful-to-all? The unbelievers are really living in delusion.

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: Or who can provide for you if He withholds His provision? Yet they persist in their disrespect and evasion.

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: Is he who walks, stumbles and falls on his face better guided or he who walks upright on a straight path?

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "It is He who brought you into being; and gave you hearing and vision and understanding. But you are rarely grateful."

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "It is He who scattered you on Earth, and to Him you will be gathered."

25.Safi Kaskas 2024: And they say, "When will this promise be fulfilled, if what you say is true?"

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "God alone has knowledge of this, and I am only delivering a clear warning."

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: But when they see it approaching, the unbelievers’ faces will turn gloomy, and it will be said, "This is what you were calling for."

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "Just think: Should God destroy me and those with me, or if He decides to have mercy on us, who will protect the unbelievers from a painful punishment?"

29.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "He is the Merciful-to-all; We have believed in Him, and in Him We trust. You will come to know who is in evident error."

30.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "Just think: if your water drains away, who will bring you pure flowing water?"

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: Nun. By the pen and all they write,

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: you are not, by the grace of your Lord, a madman.

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: And you will have a never-ending reward.

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: And you are a man of great moral character.

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: You will see and they will see

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: which of you is afflicted by madness.

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: Your Lord knows best who has strayed from His path, and He knows best who is guided.

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then do not obey the unbelievers.

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: They wish that you compromise, so they too can compromise.

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: And do not obey any worthless contemptible swearer

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: or any backbiter and slander-monger,

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: preventer of good, aggressor and one who is sinner,

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: cruel, moreover, and furthermore one who is despicable.

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: Just because he has money and children,

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: when Our verses are recited to him, he says, "Myth of former people."

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: We will brand him on the snout.

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have tested them, as We tested the owners of a certain garden, when they vowed to harvest it in the morning

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: and made no allowance [for the Will of God].

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: But a disaster from your Lord came upon it while they slept.

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: By morning it became barren and bleak.

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: At day break they called to one another,

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: saying, "Go early to your crop if you want to harvest the fruit."

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: So they set out, whispering,

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: “Make sure no disabled, needy person enters the garden today (to ask for help).”

25.Safi Kaskas 2024: And early they went bent on their purpose.

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: But when they saw it, they said, " We are lost;

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: Rather, we have been ruined.

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: The most moderate of them said, "Did I not say to you, that you should praise your Lord’s glory?

29.Safi Kaskas 2024: They said, "May our Lord be exalted in His glory, we were unjust."

30.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then they turned to one another, each blaming the other.

31.Safi Kaskas 2024: They said, "How terrible for us; we were aggressors.

32.Safi Kaskas 2024: Perhaps our Lord will give us a better substitute for it. We are turning to our Lord in hope."

33.Safi Kaskas 2024: Such is the punishment. And the punishment of the Hereafter is greater, if they only knew.

34.Safi Kaskas 2024: There will be Gardens of delight for those who are mindful of God.

35.Safi Kaskas 2024: Would We treat those who submit to us like those who forced others to reject Our messages.

36.Safi Kaskas 2024: What is the matter with you? How do you judge?

37.Safi Kaskas 2024: Or do you have a Book which you study?

38.Safi Kaskas 2024: And in it do you find all that you wish for?

39.Safi Kaskas 2024: Or do you have oaths from Us, that are binding until the Day of Resurrection, allowing you to have whatever you want?

40.Safi Kaskas 2024: Ask them which of them, will be responsible for that claim.

41.Safi Kaskas 2024: Or do they have partners? Then let them bring their partners, if they are telling the truth.

42.Safi Kaskas 2024: On the Day when legs are bared, they will be called to bow down, but will not be able.

43.Safi Kaskas 2024: Their eyes humbled, humiliation will cover them. They were invited to bow down while they were healthy.

44.Safi Kaskas 2024: So leave those who deny this revelation to Me. We will proceed against them gradually, from whence they do not know.

45.Safi Kaskas 2024: And I will give them time. My plan is firm.

46.Safi Kaskas 2024: Or do you ask them for a wage, so they are burdened with debt?

47.Safi Kaskas 2024: Or do they know the future, and they write what is going to happen?

48.Safi Kaskas 2024: So be patient for your Lord’s judgment, and do not be like the fellow of the whale who called out in despair.

49.Safi Kaskas 2024: Had a blessing from his Lord not reached him, he would have been abandoned and disgraced on a naked shore.

50.Safi Kaskas 2024: But his Lord chose him and made him among the righteous.

51.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those unbelievers all but kill you with their evil looks when they hear the message, and they say, "He must be mad."

52.Safi Kaskas 2024: But it is only a reminder to all people.

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: The Hour of Truth!

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: What is the Hour of Truth?

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: And how would you know what is the Hour of Truth?

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: The people of Thamud and ‘Aad denied [that there would be a] sudden calamity.

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: So as for Thamud, they were destroyed by the overpowering blast.

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: And as for Aad, they were destroyed by a furious, roaring wind

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: which He unleashed against them for seven nights and eight days, nonstop. You could have seen its people lying dead as if they were hollow palm tree trunks.

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: Do you see anything left of them?

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then came Pharaoh and those before him, and the destroyed towns that indulged in sin.

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: They disobeyed their Lord’s Messenger, so He seized them with an overpowering grip.

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: When the water overflowed, We carried your ancestors in the sailing ship

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: To make it a lesson for you to remember, so listening ears may recall it.

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then when the Horn is blown with a single blast,

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: and the Earth and the mountains are lifted up and crushed with one blow,

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: on that Day, the Hour of Truth will occur.

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: The heaven will split open on that Day, since it will be so frail.

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: And the angels will be round its edges. On that Day, eight of them will bear your Lord’s Throne of His majesty above them.

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: On that Day you will be exposed, and no secret of yours will remain hidden.

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: As for him who is given his record in his right hand, he will say, "Here, take my record and read it,

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: I expected that I would be held accountable."

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: So, he will have a pleasant life

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: in an elevated Garden,

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: its pickings are within easy reach.

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: Eat and drink merrily for what you have done in days gone by.

25.Safi Kaskas 2024: As for him who is given his record in his left hand, he will say, "I wish I was never given my record

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: and never knew what my account was.

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: If only death had really been the end.

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: My wealth has been of no use to me

29.Safi Kaskas 2024: and my power has vanished."

30.Safi Kaskas 2024: [God will say], "Seize him and shackle him.

31.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then drive him into Hell.

32.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then tie him with a chain whose length is seventy cubits."

33.Safi Kaskas 2024: For he would not believe in God, the Magnificent,

34.Safi Kaskas 2024: nor would he encourage feeding the disabled.

35.Safi Kaskas 2024: So he has no friend here this Day,

36.Safi Kaskas 2024: nor any food except scum,

37.Safi Kaskas 2024: that only sinners eat.

38.Safi Kaskas 2024: So I swear by what you see

39.Safi Kaskas 2024: and what you do not see

40.Safi Kaskas 2024: that this is the word of a noble Messenger.

41.Safi Kaskas 2024: And It is not the word of a poet; how little you believe,

42.Safi Kaskas 2024: nor the word of a soothsayer; how little you remember,

43.Safi Kaskas 2024: The gradual revelations of the Book, is from the Lord of the worlds.

44.Safi Kaskas 2024: Had he [the Messenger] falsely attributed some statements to Us,

45.Safi Kaskas 2024: We would have seized him by the right arm.

46.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then We would have slashed his lifeline,

47.Safi Kaskas 2024: and none of you could have protected him.

48.Safi Kaskas 2024: It [The Qur’an] is a reminder for the those who are mindful of God.

49.Safi Kaskas 2024: And We know that some of you will deny it.

50.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is a cause of great distress to the unbelievers.

51.Safi Kaskas 2024: And it is the Truth of certainty.

52.Safi Kaskas 2024: Exalt, then, the limitless glory of your Lord’s magnificent name.

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: An inquirer asked about an impending punishment

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: to the unbelievers that cannot be prevented

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: from God, the Lord of the Gates of Ascent.

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: Unto Him the angels and the Spirit will ascend in a Day whose length is fifty thousand years.

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: So be patient with gracious patience.

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: They [the unbelievers] see it as something distant,

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: but We see it near.

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: On the Day the sky will be like molten brass,

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: and the mountains will be like tufted wool.

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: No good friend will ask about his friend,

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: even though they can see each other. The one who forced others to reject Our messages will wish he could ransom himself from the punishment of that Day, by sacrificing his children

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: and his wife and his brother

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: and his family who shelter him

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: and everyone on Earth, if that could save him.

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: Not today! But a raging blaze

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: that strips away the skin

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: and claims everyone who turned his back to the truth and went away

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: and accumulated and hoarded [wealth).

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: The Human being was created full of anxiety:

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: desperate when bad things happen,

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: but tight-fisted when good fortune comes his way,

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: The exception are those who pray,

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: those who are steady in their prayer

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: and those who have set aside a known rightful share of their wealth

25.Safi Kaskas 2024: for the poor and the deprived

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: and those who believe in the Day of Judgment,

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: and those who dread their Lord’s punishment.

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: They know not to take their Lord’s punishment for granted.

29.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those who guard their chastity,

30.Safi Kaskas 2024: except from their spouses and from those whom their right hands hold in trust, are free of blame.

31.Safi Kaskas 2024: But whoever seeks beyond that, they are transgressors.

32.Safi Kaskas 2024: Those who honor their trusts and covenant

33.Safi Kaskas 2024: and those who stand by their testimonies

34.Safi Kaskas 2024: and those who maintain their prayer with dedication:

35.Safi Kaskas 2024: those will be honored in Gardens.

36.Safi Kaskas 2024: So, what is [the matter] with the unbelievers? They run about in front of you in groups, with outstretched necks and staring eyes,

37.Safi Kaskas 2024: from the right, and from the left.

38.Safi Kaskas 2024: Does each one of them aspire to enter the Garden of Delight?

39.Safi Kaskas 2024: Never! We have created them from that which they well know.

40.Safi Kaskas 2024: So I swear by the Lord of all risings and settings that We are able

41.Safi Kaskas 2024: to replace them with better than they; and nothing can prevent Us from doing this.

42.Safi Kaskas 2024: So leave them to blunder and play around, until they meet their Day which they are promised,

43.Safi Kaskas 2024: The Day when they will emerge from the graves rushing as if rallying to a flag,

44.Safi Kaskas 2024: their eyes humbled, overwhelmed by humiliation. This is the Day which they were promised.

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: We sent Noah to his people, [saying], "Warn your people before a painful punishment comes to them."

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: He said, "My people, I am coming to you with clear warnings,

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: 'Worship God, be mindful of Him and obey me.

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: God will forgive you of your transgressions, and reprieve you until an appointed time. When God’s appointed time arrives it cannot be postponed, if you only knew.’ ”

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: He said, “My Lord, I invited my people night and day.

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: but the more I called them, the further they ran away:

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: Every time I called them to Your forgiveness, they put their fingers into their ears, wrapped themselves in their garments, and insisted, and became increasingly more arrogant.

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: I invited them openly.

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then I appealed to them publicly, and I spoke to them privately,

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: and said, ‘Ask forgiveness of your Lord. He is ever forgiving.

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: He will send down abundant rain from the sky for you

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: and will provide you with wealth and children and He will give you gardens and rivers.

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: What is the matter with you? Why can’t you appreciate God’s majesty

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: when He has created you stage by stage?

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: Do you not see how God created seven superimposed heavens

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: and placed the moon in them as a enlightenment and He made the sun a source of light?

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: God germinated you from the Earth like plants.

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then He will return you into it, and will bring you out again.

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: And God has spread the Earth out for you

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: that you may travel its valleys as roadways.' "

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: Noah said, "My Lord, they have defied me, and followed those whose wealth and children lead them increasingly into loss.

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: And they schemed outrageously.

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: And said, 'Do not abandon your gods. Never leave Wadd or Suwa‘ or Yaghuth and Ya‘uq and Nasr.

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: They have already misled many. My Lord, increase these transgressors only in misguidance."

25.Safi Kaskas 2024: Because of their sins they were drowned and sent to Hell. They could not find any one to help them against God.

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: And Noah said, "My Lord, do not leave a single unbeliever on the face of the Earth.

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: If You leave them, they will mislead Your worshipers and breed only wicked unbelievers.

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: My Lord, forgive me and my parents and whoever enters my house as a believer. Forgive all the believing men and women, but bring nothing but ruin down on the transgressors."

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "It has been revealed to me that a group of jinn listened in and said, 'We have heard an amazing Recitation.

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: It guides to righteousness, and we have believed it: We will never assign divinity to anyone except our Lord.

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: And exalted be the glory of our Lord! He never had a spouse nor a child.

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: But the fools among us had been saying outrageous things about God

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: although we had thought that no human or jinn would dare tell a lie about God.

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: Some individual humans used to seek power through some individual jinn, but they [the jinn] only increased their confusion.

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: And they thought, as you thought, that God would not send anyone [as a messenger].

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: We as usual probed heaven [in search of news], and found it filled with fierce guards and projectiles.

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: We used to take up certain positions to listen in; but anyone trying to listen now finds a projectile in wait for him.

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: We do not know therefore whether ill is intended for those on Earth, or whether their Lord intends to guide them.

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: Some of us are righteous, but others are less so; we follow different paths.

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: And we have come to realize that we can never evade God living on Earth, nor can we evade Him by escaping [from life].

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: So when we heard this call to guidance, we believed in it. Whoever believes in his Lord will no longer fear the burden of life or injustice.

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: Some of us submitted to God, while others are transgressors. Those who submitted have sought out right guidance.

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: As for the transgressors, they will be firewood for Hell.'

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: Had [your people] kept true to the path, We would have given them abundant drinking water supply,

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: a test for them. Whoever turns away from remembering to call on his Lord will be put into an arduous punishment.

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: Places of worship are for God. So do not call on anyone else besides God.

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: Yet when God’s servant stood up calling on Him, they [the unbelievers] overwhelmed him with their crowds."

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "I only call on my Lord and I never associate anyone with Him."

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "It is not in my power to harm you, nor to guide you rightly."

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, “No one can protect me from God, and I will never find any refuge except in Him”.

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: I only deliver what I receive from God and His messages. He who disobeys God and His Messenger, will have the fire of Hell where they will be forever,

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: until they see that which they were promised and they will know who has less support and are fewer in number.

25.Safi Kaskas 2024: Say, "I do not know whether what you are promised will happen soon or whether it will be delayed by my Lord for a period."

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: He alone knows what is beyond our perception, and He doesn’t disclose His knowledge of the unseen to anyone,

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: except to a Messenger of His choosing. He then dispatches guards before him and behind him.

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: That he may know that they have conveyed the messages of their Lord. He encompasses what they have, and has counted everything by number.

73.SurahEnglishNames: The Enshrouded One, Bundled Up, The Mantled One

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: You who wraps himself [in his clothing],

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: stay up during the night, except for a little,

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: for half of it, or a little less,

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: or a little more, and recite the Qur’an slowly and distinctly.

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: We will send a weighty message to you.

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: Rising at night has a stronger effect and is more conducive to concentration.

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: In the daytime, you are kept busy for long periods.

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: So remember to call upon the name of your Lord and devote yourself to Him wholeheartedly.

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: The Lord of the East and the West; there is no god but Him. So, assign to Him alone the power to determine your fate.

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: And patiently endure what they say, and withdraw from them politely

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: and leave those who deny the truth and live in luxury to Me. Just bear with them a little longer;

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have shackles and Hell

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: And food that chokes and a painful punishment reserved for them

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: on the Day when the Earth and the mountains tremble, and the mountains become heaps of sand.

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have sent to you a messenger, a witness over you just as We sent to Pharaoh a messenger.

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: But Pharaoh disobeyed the messenger, so We seized him with a crushing grip.

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: How, then, if you refuse to acknowledge the truth, will you protect yourself from a Day which will turn the children gray-haired?

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: A Day when the heavens will shatter. God’s promise is always fulfilled.

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: This is a reminder, so let anyone who wills set a path towards his Lord.

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: Your Lord knows that you stay up praying nearly two-thirds of the night, or half of it, or one-third of it, along with a group of those with you. God justly evaluates the night and the day. He knows that you will not be able to sustain it, so He will not require it of you. Read from the Qur’an what you can. He knows that some of you may be ill; and others travelling through the land, seeking God’s bounty; yet others will be fighting in God’s cause. So read from it what is easy for you, and establish prayers, and pay The purifying alms, and lend God a loan of goodness. Whatever good you advance for yourselves, you will find it with God, improved and increased for you. Ask God’s forgiveness, for God is the Most Forgiving, the Mercy Giver.

74.SurahEnglishNames: The Cloaked One, The Man Wearing a Cloak, The Clothed One

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: You, wrapped in your shroud,

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: arise and give warning,

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: glorify your Lord’ greatness,

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: purify your clothing and

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: avoid all filth.

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: Do not give out of a desire for gain.

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: But be steadfast for your Lord’s cause.

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: When the Trumpet is blown,

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: that Day will be a difficult day,

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: not easy for the unbelievers.

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: Leave Me alone with the one I created

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: to whom I gave great wealth,

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: sons around him,

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: and for whom I smoothed all things.

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then he desires that I should add more.

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: No! He was stubbornly hostile to Our revelation.

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: I will increasingly exhaust him.

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: He reflected and plotted.

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: So, may he perish how he plotted.

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then may he perish how he plotted.

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then he looked,

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: then he frowned and glared;

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then he turned back to his old arrogance

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: and said, "This is nothing but magic handed down from the past.
