25.Safi Kaskas 2024: This is not but the word of a human being."

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: I will roast him into Saqar.

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: And how would you know what is Saqar?

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: It neither leaves, nor spares,

29.Safi Kaskas 2024: scorching the flesh.

30.Safi Kaskas 2024: There are nineteen in charge of it.

31.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have appointed only angels to be wardens of the Fire, and caused their number to be a stumbling block for those who disbelieve; so that those given the Book may attain certainty; and those who believe may increase in faith; and those given the Book and the believers may not doubt; and those in whose hearts is sickness and the unbelievers may say, “What did God ever mean by this example?” In this way God lets go astray the one who wishes to go astray, and guides him who wishes to be guided. None knows your Lord’s forces but Him. This is nothing but a reminder to all human beings.

32.Safi Kaskas 2024: No! By the moon

33.Safi Kaskas 2024: and the night when it departs

34.Safi Kaskas 2024: and the morning as it brightens,

35.Safi Kaskas 2024: it is one of those great things

36.Safi Kaskas 2024: as a warning to human beings,

37.Safi Kaskas 2024: to whomever among you wishes to advance or regress.

38.Safi Kaskas 2024: Every soul, is held in pledge for its own deeds

39.Safi Kaskas 2024: Except for those on the right,

40.Safi Kaskas 2024: in Gardens, inquiring

41.Safi Kaskas 2024: about those who forced others to reject Our messages,

42.Safi Kaskas 2024: What caused you to be in Saqar?

43.Safi Kaskas 2024: They will say, "We were not among those who prayed,

44.Safi Kaskas 2024: nor did we feed the disabled.

45.Safi Kaskas 2024: And we used to indulge in vain discussions with those who indulged [in mocking the believers]

46.Safi Kaskas 2024: And we used to deny the Day of Judgment

47.Safi Kaskas 2024: until the Certain End came upon us."

48.Safi Kaskas 2024: The intercession of intercessors will not help them.

49.Safi Kaskas 2024: Why then are they turning away from this reminder

50.Safi Kaskas 2024: as if they were panicked donkeys

51.Safi Kaskas 2024: fleeing from a lion?

52.Safi Kaskas 2024: Yet, every one of them wishes to be given scriptures unrolled before their very eyes.

53.Safi Kaskas 2024: No! But they do not fear the Hereafter.

54.Safi Kaskas 2024: No! This is but a reminder

55.Safi Kaskas 2024: and whoever wills may take it to heart.

56.Safi Kaskas 2024: But they will not remember, unless God so wills. He is the Source of all righteousness, and the source of all forgiveness.

75.SurahEnglishNames: The Rising of the Dead, Resurrection

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: I swear by the Day of Resurrection,

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: And I swear by the self-reproaching soul.

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: Does the human being think that We will not reassemble his bones?

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: Yes indeed. We are even able to reshape his fingertips.

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: Yet, the human being wants to deny what lies ahead of him.

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: He asks, "When is this Day of Resurrection?"

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: When vision is dazzled,

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: the moon is eclipsed

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: and the sun and the moon are joined together,

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: on that Day, man will say, "Where is the escape?"

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: No indeed! There is no refuge.

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: Your Lord is the final destination on that Day.

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: On that Day, the Human being will be informed of all deeds he put forward for this day and everything that should have been left behind.

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: Rather, the human being will give evidence against himself

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: in spite of any excuses he presents.

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Prophet], do not move your tongue attempting to rush your memorization of the Revelation.

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: Its collection and recitation are up to Us.

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: So, when We recite it, follow its recitation,

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: it is then, up to Us, to make it all clear

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: But you love this brief life

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: and disregard the Hereafter.

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: There are faces on that Day that will be bright,

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: looking toward their Lord.

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: While other faces on that Day, will be gloomy with despair,

25.Safi Kaskas 2024: realizing that a backbreaking blow has befallen them.

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: But when the last breath has reached the throat

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: and It is said, "Who will heal him now?"

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: And he realizes that it is parting time,

29.Safi Kaskas 2024: when one leg is entwined with the other,

30.Safi Kaskas 2024: that Day the journey is to your Lord.

31.Safi Kaskas 2024: He neither believed, nor prayed,

32.Safi Kaskas 2024: but he denied and turned away.

33.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then he went to his people, full of himself and false pride.

34.Safi Kaskas 2024: Your demise is getting closer to you and closer,

35.Safi Kaskas 2024: yet closer and closer still.

36.Safi Kaskas 2024: Does the human being think that he [was created] to be forgotten?

37.Safi Kaskas 2024: Was he not the sperm of ejaculated semen that fertilized the ovum?

38.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then he became a clot. And [God] created and proportioned,

39.Safi Kaskas 2024: and made of him the two sexes, the male and the female.

40.Safi Kaskas 2024: Is not that [Creator] able to bring the dead to life?

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: Has there come upon the human being a span of time when he was nothing to be mentioned?

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: We created the human being from a fertilized ovum to test him; and We gave him hearing and sight.

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then We guided him to the right path, whether he choose to be grateful or ungrateful.

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have prepared chains, shackles and a Searing Fire for the unbelievers.

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: But the righteous will drink from a cup whose mixture is Kafour,

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: a spring from which God’s worshipers shall drink, making it gush abundantly at will.

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: They are the ones who fulfill their vows and fear a Day whose evil will be widespread.

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: They feed the needy, the orphan, and the prisoner, for the love of Him.

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: [Saying], "We feed you for the sake of God. We want neither compensation, nor gratitude from you.

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: We simply dread an austere and stressful Day promised by our Lord."

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: So God will spare them the evil of that Day and will give them radiance and joy,

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: and will reward them for what they patiently endured with a Garden and silk,

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: reclining there on couches. They will not experience there either burning sun or bitter cold.

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: Shades cover them, and its fruit hanging close ready to be picked.

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: Circulated among them are vessels of silver, and cups of pure crystal

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: clear glasses made from silver according to their own measure.

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: They will be given a drink mixed with ginger

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: from a spring there named Salsabeel.

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: Passing among them are immortal youths. If you see them, you would think they were like sprinkled pearls.

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: If you were to look around, you would see a heavenly and vast kingdom.

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: They will wear green garments of fine silk and brocade. And they will be adorned with silver bracelets. Their Lord will give them a purified drink.

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: This is a reward for you. Your efforts are well appreciated.

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: It is We who have sent down the Qur’an to you in gradual revelations.

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: So await your Lord’s Judgment with patience; and do not obey a sinner or a denier of the truth from among them.

25.Safi Kaskas 2024: Remember to call on the name of your Lord morning and evening

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: And during the night bow down to Him and exalt His limitless glory long into the night.

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: These people love the present life, and leave behind a Heavy Day.

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have created them, and strengthened their frame; and if we wish, We can replace them with others like them.

29.Safi Kaskas 2024: This is a reminder. Let whoever wills, take a path to his Lord.

30.Safi Kaskas 2024: Yet, you cannot will it unless you align your free will with the Will of God. God is Knowing and Wise.

31.Safi Kaskas 2024: He admits whom He wills into His mercy. But He has prepared a painful punishment for the unjust.

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: By those [winds] sent forth in gusts

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: and those violently storming,

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: consider these [messages] that spread [the Truth] far and wide,

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: thus separating [right and wrong] with all clarity,

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: and then delivering a reminder,

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: [promising] freedom from blame or [offering] a warning,

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: what you are promised will surely happen.

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: So when the stars are extinguished,

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: the heaven is split open,

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: the mountains are blown away,

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: And when the messengers are called together to an appointed time,

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: for what Day was it postponed?

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: For the Day of Decision.

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: And what do you know about the Day of Decision?

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: How horrible is that Day for those who deny the truth.

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: Did We not destroy the earlier people?

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: And We shall make the latter follow them.

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: This is how We deal with those who forced others to reject Our messages

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: How horrible is that Day for those who reject the truth.

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: Did We not create you from an  insignificant liquid?

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then lodged it in a secure place,

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: for a known term?

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: And We determined it, how excellently We determine.

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: How terrible is that Day for the deniers of the truth.

25.Safi Kaskas 2024: Have We not made the Earth a home

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: for the living and the dead?

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: And We placed firmly embedded mountains in it, rising high, and given you sweet water to drink.

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: How terrible is that Day for the deniers of the truth.

29.Safi Kaskas 2024: Proceed to what you used to deny.

30.Safi Kaskas 2024: “Proceed to a shadow with three columns,

31.Safi Kaskas 2024: that has no shade and will not prevent you from the flame.

32.Safi Kaskas 2024: It shoots sparks [as huge] as a fortress,

33.Safi Kaskas 2024: like giant fiery ropes.

34.Safi Kaskas 2024: How terrible is that Day for those who deny the truth.

35.Safi Kaskas 2024: On that Day they will be speechless,

36.Safi Kaskas 2024: and they not be given permission to offer any excuses.

37.Safi Kaskas 2024: How terrible is that Day for those who deny the truth.

38.Safi Kaskas 2024: This is the Day of Decision; We will have gathered you together with the earlier people.

39.Safi Kaskas 2024: So if you have a ploy, then use it against my plan now.

40.Safi Kaskas 2024: How terrible is that Day for those who deny the truth.

41.Safi Kaskas 2024: The God-conscious will be amidst shades and springs,

42.Safi Kaskas 2024: and any fruits they desire,

43.Safi Kaskas 2024: Eat and drink and enjoy it as a reward for your deeds.

44.Safi Kaskas 2024: This is how We reward those who do good.

45.Safi Kaskas 2024: How terrible is that Day for those who deny the truth.

46.Safi Kaskas 2024: You are but dissenters. So eat and enjoy yourselves a little [while you can].

47.Safi Kaskas 2024: How terrible is that Day for the deniers of the truth.

48.Safi Kaskas 2024: And when It is said to them, "Bow down [in prayer]," they do not bow.

49.Safi Kaskas 2024: How terrible is that Day for those who denied the truth.

50.Safi Kaskas 2024: In what message beyond this will they believe?

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: What are they wondering about?

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: About the huge announcement

3.Safi Kaskas 2024: over which they are in disagreement.

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: They will know.

5.Safi Kaskas 2024: For sure they will know.

6.Safi Kaskas 2024: Have We not made the Earth a cradle?

7.Safi Kaskas 2024: And the mountains as pegs?

8.Safi Kaskas 2024: And We created you in pairs?

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: And made your sleep to rest?

10.Safi Kaskas 2024: And made the night a cover?

11.Safi Kaskas 2024: And made the day for livelihood?

12.Safi Kaskas 2024: And constructed above you seven strong [heavens]?

13.Safi Kaskas 2024: And made [the sun] a glowing lamp?

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: And sent down from the clouds pouring water

15.Safi Kaskas 2024: to produce with it grain, vegetation

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: and luxuriant gardens?

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: The Day of Decision has been appointed.

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: The Day the Horn is blown and you will come forth in droves.

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: And the heavens are opened and becomes gateways.

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: And the mountains are set in motion and will become a mirage.

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: Hell has been lying in wait,

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: to be a home for the oppressors,

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: to stay in for a long, long time,

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: They will not taste any coolness there or drink,

25.Safi Kaskas 2024: except for boiling water and sizzling pus.

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: An appropriate reward.

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: They were not expecting to be held accountable.

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: And utterly rejected Our verses.

29.Safi Kaskas 2024: We have recorded everything in writing.

30.Safi Kaskas 2024: So feel it, We will only increase your punishment.

31.Safi Kaskas 2024: For those who were mindful of God there is a great achievement,

32.Safi Kaskas 2024: gardens and grapevines,

33.Safi Kaskas 2024: splendid, well matched spouses,

34.Safi Kaskas 2024: and a full cup.

35.Safi Kaskas 2024: There, they will hear no gossip or lies.

36.Safi Kaskas 2024: A reward from your Lord, a fitting gift,

79.SurahEnglishNames: Those Who Drag Forth, Soul-snatchers, Those Who Pulled Out

2.Safi Kaskas 2024: and those who draw out gently

4.Safi Kaskas 2024: and yet some overtake [others] swiftly

9.Safi Kaskas 2024: and eyes are humbled.

14.Safi Kaskas 2024: and they will be awake and above ground.

16.Safi Kaskas 2024: When his Lord called out to him in the sacred valley of Tuwa,

17.Safi Kaskas 2024: Go to Pharaoh. For he has transgressed,

18.Safi Kaskas 2024: and ask him, “Would you be willing to purify yourself?

19.Safi Kaskas 2024: And I will guide you to your Lord so you would be in awe of Him.

20.Safi Kaskas 2024: And he showed him the greatest sign,

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: but Pharaoh rejected the offer and disobeyed.

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: Then he hastily turned away,

23.Safi Kaskas 2024: and gathered [his people] and proclaimed,

24.Safi Kaskas 2024: "I am your lord, the most high."

25.Safi Kaskas 2024: So God seized him with punishment, as an example, in the life to come as well as in this life:

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: In this, there is a warning for whomever would fear [God].

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: Are you more difficult to create or is the heaven that He built?

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: He raised it high and proportioned it.

29.Safi Kaskas 2024: He darkened its night and brought out its morning light.

30.Safi Kaskas 2024: After that He spread out the Earth.

31.Safi Kaskas 2024: From it, He produced its water and its pasture,

32.Safi Kaskas 2024: And He set the mountains firmly in place

33.Safi Kaskas 2024: for you and for your animals to enjoy.

34.Safi Kaskas 2024: But when the Great Calamity arrives,

35.Safi Kaskas 2024: a Day when the human being will remember what he has done,

36.Safi Kaskas 2024: and Hell will be there for all to see,

37.Safi Kaskas 2024: for him who transgressed

38.Safi Kaskas 2024: and preferred the life of this world,

39.Safi Kaskas 2024: for indeed Hell will be his abode.

40.Safi Kaskas 2024: But as for him who feared to stand one day in front of his Lord and therefore restrained himself from following his whims and desires,

41.Safi Kaskas 2024: then Heaven will be home.

42.Safi Kaskas 2024: They ask you about the Hour, “When will it take place?”

43.Safi Kaskas 2024: How can you possibly know that?

44.Safi Kaskas 2024: Its time is only known to your Lord.

45.Safi Kaskas 2024: You are only to warn those who dread it.

46.Safi Kaskas 2024: On the Day they see it, it will seem as though they only stayed an evening or a morning.

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: He frowned and turned away

26.Safi Kaskas 2024: and caused the soil to break open,

27.Safi Kaskas 2024: and grew grains in it,

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: and grapes and legumes

30.Safi Kaskas 2024: and luxurious gardens

31.Safi Kaskas 2024: and fruits and vegetable,

33.Safi Kaskas 2024: But when the Deafening Blast comes,

36.Safi Kaskas 2024: his wife and his children ,

82.SurahEnglishNames: The Cleaving, The Cleaving Asunder, Bursting Apart

21.Safi Kaskas 2024: open to be witnessed by those brought near [to God].

28.Safi Kaskas 2024: a spring from which those near [to God] drink.

36.Safi Kaskas 2024: Have the unbelievers been rewarded for their deeds?

1.Safi Kaskas 2024: When the sky is ruptured,

22.Safi Kaskas 2024: But the unbelievers say it is lies,
